quotes.message: One remedy for the fear of not being loved is to remember how good it feels to love someone. If you're feeling unloved and you want to feel better, go love someone, and see what happens.
quotes.name: Dossie Easton

quotes.message: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: No one realized that, being left out in the cold, I was also very much in the dark.
quotes.name: Deborah Curtis

quotes.message: When we feel left out, inadequate, or lonely, can we take a warriors perspective and contact bodhichitta?
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: In a way it's not so terrible to be left out, because then you could see at a very early age that there's an entire motherlode of stories that belong to you and nobody else.
quotes.name: Maxine Hong Kingston

quotes.message: Our society distributes itself into Barbarians, Philistines, and Populace; and the America is just ourselves, with the Barbarians quite left out, and the Populace nearly.
quotes.name: Matthew Arnold

quotes.message: My face looks like a wedding cake left out in the rain.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: I left the room with silent dignity, but caught my foot in the mat.
quotes.name: George Grossmith

quotes.message: God seems to have left the receiver off the hook, and time is running out.
quotes.name: Arthur Koestler

quotes.message: The writer is free to work in whatever place and whatever time he chooses; he is free to idle if he feels ill or dispirited.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Sports metaphors are one of the ways women feel left out of the language of the office.
quotes.name: Jan Levinson-Gould

quotes.message: Sometimes I get the feeling the world kinda left us behind a long time ago.
quotes.name: Randal Graves

quotes.message: In this world, feeling left out and alone . Thousands around you yet you're out there on . Your own . Let the power guide you like tittle David and the . Stone . And come, and come, come on home.
quotes.name: Dave Clark and Mike Smith

quotes.message: I used to watch all the couples going by . Feeling left out and so alone . But now I feel so much a part of them . Because I've got a man of my own . It's never too late to fall in love again . And I know, and I know . That it's true . You treat me with so much tenderness, love and respect . And I just love everything that you do.
quotes.name: Carole King

quotes.message: I used to hide in a party crowd . Bottled up inside . Feeling so left out . Standing in a corner wearing concrete shoes . With my frozen smile . And my lighted fuse . Now every time I start to feel like that . I roll my heart out like a welcome mat . Oh watch me go . I'm a happy girl . Everybody knows . That the sweetest thing that you'll ever see . In the whole wide world . Is a happy girl.
quotes.name: Annie Roboff and Beth Nielsen Chapma

quotes.message: At least—to pray—is left—is left— . Oh Jesus—in the Air— . I know not which thy chamber is— . I'm knocking—everywhere— . Thou settest Earthquake in the South— . And Maelstrom, in the Sea— . Say, Jesus Christ of Nazareth— .
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: I don’t feel like feeling anymore . I sit here in my thoughts . Trying to make sense . Of what I am supposed to think. . But all I get is pain . From the heart to my head . A knife digging in . To the very core of my soul.
quotes.name: Devon Cote

quotes.message: I've always been more afraid of being left alone or left out than of things that go bump in the night.
quotes.name: Nelson Gidding

quotes.message: If love is universal, no one can be left out.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Let's continue to stand up for those who are vulnerable to being left out or marginalized.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: If nobody will help you, do it alone.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: It is only alone, truly alone that one bursts apart, springs forth.
quotes.name: Maria Isabel Barreno

quotes.message: Be an outcast; be pleased to walk alone.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: I used to think the worst thing in life is to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel all alone.
quotes.name: Robin Williams

quotes.message: The only thing worse than not knowing where she belonged was knowing where she didn't.
quotes.name: Tessa Shaffer

quotes.message: In order to find out who you are, you will, at some point, have to feel really isolated, left out, different.
quotes.name: Jenna Marbles

quotes.message: If you care about somebody, you should want them to be happy. Even if you wind up being left out.
quotes.name: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.message: Having come to live in this age is as though one were to have entered another country. Learn its language or risk being left out.
quotes.name: Theodore Bikel

quotes.message: Never say you are alone for you are not alone, your God and your genius is within.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Are you desperate or determined? With desperation comes frustration. With determination comes purpose, achievement, and peace.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: But you might as well bid a man struggling in the water, rest within arm's length of the shore! I must reach it first, and then I'll rest.
quotes.name: Emily Bronte

quotes.message: Courage is the foundation of determination. Determination and courage are the cornerstones of success.
quotes.name: M. K. Soni

quotes.message: Determination allows mere mortals to soar to unimaginable, new heights.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Determination becomes obsession and then it becomes all that matters.
quotes.name: Jeremy Irvine

quotes.message: Determination burns within each one of us. Whether or not it will heat the room or the whole house depends on how much time we spend feeding the fire.
quotes.name: Michelle C. Ustaszeski

quotes.message: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Determination is like a muscle. If you do not use it regularly, it fades away.
quotes.name: Lynn Jennings

quotes.message: Determination is the wake-up call to the human will.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbin

quotes.message: Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Don't wait for your ship to come in, swim out to it
quotes.name: Cathy Hopkins

quotes.message: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength.
quotes.name: Lora Leigh

quotes.message: I have willpower and determination. I am very resilient, like rock.
quotes.name: Carnie Wilson

quotes.message: I just hate losing and that gives you an extra determination to work harder.
quotes.name: Wayne Rooney

quotes.message: I ran and ran and ran every day, and I acquired this sense of determination, this sense of spirit that I would never, never give up, no matter what else happened.
quotes.name: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.message: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I'd still swim. And I'd despise the one who gave up.
quotes.name: Abraham Maslow

quotes.message: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: If you try anything, if you try to lose weight, or to improve yourself, or to love, or to make the world a better place, you have already achieved something wonderful, before you even begin. Forget failure. If things don't work out the way you want, hold your head up high and be proud. And try again. And again.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: It's all about your determination, I think, as much as anything. There are a lot of people with talent, but it's that determination.
quotes.name: Judy Blume

quotes.message: I've always found that anything worth achieving will always have obstacles in the way and you've got to have that drive and determination to overcome those obstacles on route to whatever it is that you want to accomplish.
quotes.name: Chuck Norris

quotes.message: Keep on sowing your seed, for you never know which will grow -- perhaps it all will.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
quotes.name: Hal Borland

quotes.message: Life is not only merriment,It is desire and determination.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Never go backward. Attempt, and do it with all your might. Determination is power.
quotes.name: Charles Simmons

quotes.message: Nobody trips over mountains. It is the small pebble that causes you to stumble. Pass all the pebbles in your path and you will find you have crossed the mountain.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Nothing is impossible in this world. Firm determination, it is said, can move heaven and earth. Things appear far beyond one's power, because one cannot set his heart on any arduous project due to want of strong will.
quotes.name: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.message: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
quotes.name: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.message: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
quotes.name: George A. Sheehan

quotes.message: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don't wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.
quotes.name: President Barack Obama

quotes.message: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.name: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.message: The most essential factor is persistence - the determination never to allow your energy or enthusiasm to be dampened by the discouragement that must inevitably come.
quotes.name: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.message: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: The world's greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focused on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
quotes.name: Roopleen

quotes.message: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.name: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.message: Those who don't understand determination call determination stubbornness or too driven.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference, and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.
quotes.name: Sonia Johnson

quotes.message: What makes the difference between wishing and realizing our wishes? Lots of things, and it may take months or years for wish to come true, but it's far more likely to happen when you care so much about a wish that you'll do all you can to make it happen.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: When a person really desires something, all the universe conspires to help that person to realize his dream.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Within each of us is a hidden store of determination. Determination to keep us in the race when all seems lost.
quotes.name: Roger Dawson

quotes.message: You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.name: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.message: Some risks that are thought to be unknown, are not unknown. With some foresight and critical thought, some risks that at first glance may seem unforeseen, can in fact be foreseen. Armed with the right set of tools, procedures, knowledge and insight, light can be shed on variables that lead to risk, allowing us to manage them.
quotes.name: Daniel Wagner

quotes.message: Never take both hands off the pump. As an entrepreneur, you need to be on constant lookout for opportunity, and that will involve risk. But you minimize those risks by keeping one hand on the pump that is producing for you.
quotes.name: Kenneth E. Behring

quotes.message: A major lesson in risk management is that a 'receding sea' is not a lucky offer of an extra piece of free beach, but the warning sign of an upcoming tsunami.
quotes.name: Jos Berkemeijer

quotes.message: Risk comes with the territory when you are breaking new ground. Learn how to evaluate and mitigate these risks rather than take away people’s power and autonomy.
quotes.name: Leena Patel

quotes.message: Opportunity and risk come in pairs
quotes.name: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.message: If you don't invest in risk management, it doesn't matter what business you're in, it's a risky business.
quotes.name: Gary Cohn

quotes.message: Keeping the risk management plan up to date can transform it from a door stop into a vital project management tool. Remember: what you don't know can kill your project.
quotes.name: Bruce Pittman

quotes.message: Risk management is a more realistic term than safety. It implies that hazards are ever-present, that they must be identified, analyzed, evaluated and controlled or rationally accepted.
quotes.name: Jerome F. Lederer

quotes.message: If you treat risk management as a part-time job, you might soon find yourself looking for one.
quotes.name: Deloitte white paper

quotes.message: Risk management is a culture, not a cult. It only works if everyone lives it, not if it's practiced by a few high priests.
quotes.name: Tom Wilson

quotes.message: Here's the essence of risk management: Risk no more than you can afford to lose, and also risk enough so that a win is meaningful. If there is no such amount, don't play.
quotes.name: Ed Seykota

quotes.message: The first step in the risk management process is to acknowledge the reality of risk. Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.name: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.message: Not taking risks one doesn't understand is often the best form of risk management.
quotes.name: Raghuram G. Rajan

quotes.message: Being able to be repeated controllably is one key element in risk management.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: The risk management needs to lift up from risk control to risk intelligence which can identify the potential business growth opportunities
quotes.name: Pearl Zhu

quotes.message: Alignment of business strategy and risk appetite should minimize the firm's exposure to large and unexpected losses. In addition, the firm's risk management capabilities need to be commensurate with the risks it expects to take.
quotes.name: Jerome Powell

quotes.message: The essence of risk management lies in maximizing the areas where we have some control over the outcome while minimizing the areas where we have absolutely no control over the outcome.
quotes.name: Peter L. Bernstein

quotes.message: Managing risk is very different from managing strategy. Risk management focuses on the negative-threats and failures rather than opportunities and successes.
quotes.name: Robert S. Kaplan

quotes.message: Risk management is about people and processes and not about models and technology.
quotes.name: Trevor Levine

quotes.message: If everything is a matter of luck, risk management is a meaningless exercise. Invoking luck obscures truth, because it separates an event from its cause.
quotes.name: Peter Bernstein

quotes.message: Risk management should be an enterprisewide exercise and engrained in the business culture of the organization.
quotes.name: OSFI Superintendent Julie Dickson

quotes.message: Thoughtfully assessing and addressing enterprise risk and placing a high value on corporate transparency can protect the one thing we cannot afford to lose: trust.
quotes.name: Dale E. Jones

quotes.message: The key to risk management is never putting yourself in a position where you cannot live to fight another day.
quotes.name: Richard S Fuld Jr

quotes.message: Total enterprise risk management is critical, but implementing it is both expensive and easier said than done. Even the most sophisticated financial institutions are still basically silo risk managers.
quotes.name: Danny Klinefelter

quotes.message: Risk managers and investment bankers and actually, all kinds of investors took on more risk than they expected. So there was a failure of risk management. There was a failure to recognize how much risk there was in some of these securities that people bought.
quotes.name: Robert F. Engle

quotes.message: Anything that government and industry learn from hackers must be seen through the lens of their own risk management needs.
quotes.name: Paul Proctor

quotes.message: Let's be honest: starting, owning and running a business is inherently risky. Creating the right systems is what helps you manage the risk. And risk management is incredibly important.
quotes.name: Tom Corson-Knowles

quotes.message: All of life is the management of risk, not its elimination.
quotes.name: Walter Wriston

quotes.message: Good risk management fosters vigilance in times of calm and instills disciplie in times of crisis.
quotes.name: Dr Michael Ong

quotes.message: Doing all the little tricky things it takes to grow up, step by step, into an anxious and unsettling world.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: Don't try to make children grow up to be like you, or they may do it.
quotes.name: Russell Baker

quotes.message: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun.
quotes.name: Nina Dobrev

quotes.message: For, after all, you do grow up, you do outgrow your ideals, which turn to dust and ashes, which are shattered into fragments; and if you have no other life, you just have to build one up out of these fragments.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: Growing old is mandatory. Growing up is optional.
quotes.name: Chili Davis

quotes.message: Growing up happens in a heartbeat. One day you're in diapers; the next day you're gone. But the memories of childhood stay with you for the long haul.
quotes.name: The Wonder Years

quotes.message: Growing up happens when you start having things you look back on and wish you could change.
quotes.name: Cassandra Clare

quotes.message: Growing up is hard, love. Otherwise everyone would do it.
quotes.name: Kim Harrison

quotes.message: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: Growing up is never easy. You hold on to things that were. You wonder what's to come. But that night, I think we knew it was time to let go of what had been, and look ahead to what would be. Other days. New days. Days to come. The thing is, we didn't have to hate each other for getting older. We just had to forgive ourselves... for growing up.
quotes.name: The Wonder Years

quotes.message: Growing up is never straight forward. There are moments when everything is fine, and other moments where you realize that there are certain memories that you'll never get back, and certain people that are going to change, and the hardest part is knowing that there's nothing you can do except watch them.
quotes.name: Alden Nowlan

quotes.message: Growing up is such a barbarous business, full of inconvenience and pimples.
quotes.name: J.M. Barrie

quotes.message: I am convinced that most people do not grow up...We marry and dare to have children and call that growing up. I think what we do is mostly grow old. We carry accumulation of years in our bodies, and on our faces, but generally our real selves, the children inside, are innocent and shy as magnolias.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I think she is growing up, and so begins to dream dreams, and have hopes and fears and fidgets, without knowing why or being able to explain them.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: I think, as you're growing up, your emotions are just as deep as they are when you're an adult. You're ability to feel lonely, longing, confused or angry are just as deep. We don't feel things more as we get older.
quotes.name: Spike Jonze

quotes.message: I would have given anything to keep her little. They outgrow us so much faster than we outgrow them.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: If growing up is the process of creating ideas and dreams about what life should be, then maturity is letting go again.
quotes.name: Mary Beth Danielson

quotes.message: If growing up means it would be beneath my dignity to climb a tree, I'll never grow up, never grow up, never grow up! Not me!
quotes.name: J.M. Barrie

quotes.message: If you're gonna screw up, do it while you're young. Older you get, the harder it is to bounce back.
quotes.name: Winston Groom

quotes.message: In this day and age, some turn 18 and think they're a man or a woman and that's it, but that's just not true. You have to establish your manhood or your womanhood with actions.
quotes.name: Orlando McGuire

quotes.message: It happens to everyone as they grow up. You find out who you are and what you want, and then you realize that people you've known forever don't see things the way you do. So you keep the wonderful memories, but find yourself moving on.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Most of us won't see one another after graduation, and even if we do it will be different. We'll be different. We'll be adults--cured, tagged and labeled and paired and identified and placed neatly on our life path, perfectly round marbles set to roll down even, well-defined slopes.
quotes.name: Lauren Oliver

quotes.message: One of the oddest things about being grown-up was looking back at something you thought you knew and finding out the truth of it was completely different from what you had always believed.
quotes.name: Patricia Briggs

quotes.message: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.
quotes.name: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.message: Part of growing up was learning not to be quite that honest - learning when it was better to lie, rather than to hurt someone with the truth.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Sometimes we're so concerned about giving our children what we never had growing up, we neglect to give them what we did have growing up.
quotes.name: James Dobson

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to grow up before you appreciate how you grew up.
quotes.name: Daniel Black

quotes.message: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
quotes.name: Max Lerner

quotes.message: Too many people grow up. That's the real trouble with the world, too many people grow up. They forget. They don't remember what it's like to be 12 years old. They patronize, they treat children as inferiors. Well I won't do that.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Until you're grown-up they send you to reform school. After you're grown-up they send you to the penitentiary.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.name: E. E. Cummings

quotes.message: Part of growing up is just taking what you learn from that and moving on and not taking it to heart.
quotes.name: Beverley Mitchell

quotes.message: The trick is growing up without growing old.
quotes.name: Casey Stengel

quotes.message: We had so many dreams as children.
quotes.name: Helen Hollick

quotes.message: You know your children are growing up when they stop asking you where they came from and refuse to tell you where they're going.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: This is growing up, having to stomp out love, this is how people turn terrible.
quotes.name: Michelle Tea

quotes.message: I had a lot of growing up to do. A lot of times, I learned the hard way.
quotes.name: Allen Iverson

quotes.message: We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.
quotes.name: May Lamberton Becker

quotes.message: I know that in my past I was young and irresponsible - but that's what growing up is. You learn from your mistakes.
quotes.name: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.message: No matter where you are or where you grow up, you always go through the same awkward moments of being a teenager and growing up and trying to figure out who you are.
quotes.name: Aimee Teegarden

quotes.message: You grow up the day you have your first real laugh -- at yourself.
quotes.name: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.message: Everything I was afraid of when I was growing up, I've become. I've taken on my nightmares, like the devil and the end of the world, and I've become those things.
quotes.name: Marilyn Manson

quotes.message: It is as important for children to grow up fit as it is to grow up smart.
quotes.name: Todd Whitaker, Dale Lumpa

quotes.message: Most people don't really grow up. What they do is grow old, they grow tiresome even and self-righteous maybe, for it is very hard to grow.
quotes.name: Larry Chang

quotes.message: Children who grow up with plenty can learn to give, just as children who grow up receiving love can learn to express it.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: To grow up to be healthy, very young children do not need to know how to read, but they need to know how to play.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: Let's learn to grow up, before we grow old.
quotes.name: Martin H. Manser

quotes.message: Instead, by speaking the truth in a spirit of love, we must grow up in every way to Christ, who is the head.
quotes.name: Martin H. Manser

quotes.message: Life is to be enjoyed, not endured. So follow your dreams, embrace change and live what you love.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: Encourage them to follow one of many dreams that they have been chasing for years.
quotes.name: Antawn Barb & Joe Barb lll

quotes.message: Regardless of parentage, heritage or origin, dreams are meant to be pursued and grasped and pulled from the sky. If you work hard, educate yourself, strive, and never forget to be kind to others, your dreams can come true.
quotes.name: Michael Lee-Chin

quotes.message: Dream the biggest dream for yourself. Hold the highest vision of life for yourself.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Lord knows . Dreams are hard to follow . But don't let anyone . Tear them away . Hold On . There will be tomorrow . In time you'll find the way.
quotes.name: Mariah Carey

quotes.message: It just made me realize how important life is, how short time is, how important it is to follow your dreams and your goals. That's part of who you are and you take away from it by not doing it.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
quotes.name: Jackson

quotes.message: If you haven't dream that you will get there, you will not think about ever taking the steps to be there.
quotes.name: Max Robinson

quotes.message: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hardwork.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Don't be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it.
quotes.name: Belva Davis

quotes.message: Exercise the right to dream. You must face reality-- that which is. But the dream of the reality that ought to be, that must be.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Man, alone can transform the power of his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone can dream, and make his dream come true.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
quotes.name: Kobe Yamada

quotes.message: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
quotes.name: Wim Wenders

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: If you follow your dreams and keep your desire for success at its highest peak, there is nothing in this world that you can't achieve.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: The sooner you start taking your dreams seriously, the less time it will take for them to become a reality.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: Wishful thinking is a delusion. Only action and perseverance will bring your dreams to fruition.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the action stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.name: Anaïs Nin

quotes.message: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
quotes.name: James Michener

quotes.message: It's not what the dream is, it's what the dream does.
quotes.name: John Harrold Johnson

quotes.message: Reason may fail you. If you are going to do anything with life, you have sometimes move away from it, beyond all measurements. You must follow sometimes visions and dreams.
quotes.name: Bede Jarrett

quotes.message: The only person who can stop you from achieving your goals and dreams is you--your thoughts and beliefs.
quotes.name: Harish Muralidhar

quotes.message: The artist's relative lack of adaptation turns out to his advantage; it enables him to follow his own yearnings far from the beaten path and to discover what it is that would meet the unconscious needs of his age.
quotes.name: C.G. Jung

quotes.message: Chasing dreams . A sense following . Realizing . Making dreams of tomorrow . Today's memories.
quotes.name: Mary Steffen

quotes.message: Tell me why does following your dreams . Take you far away from me and I knew that it would . Tell me how to feel the space you left behind . And how to laugh instead of cry and how to say goodbye.
quotes.name: Hailey Steele

quotes.message: It's hard enough trying to live your life . But not following your dreams made you dead inside . If you don't love what you do.
quotes.name: Daniel O'Donoghue

quotes.message: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Follow your dreams. I am not saying it’s going to be easy, but I am saying it’s going to be worth it.
quotes.name: Moffat Machingura

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Magic is the happiness that we create when we give ourselves permission to follow our dreams.
quotes.name: Nattie Kate Mason

quotes.message: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.name: Pablo Picaso

quotes.message: Believe in your dreams, no matter how impossible they seem.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
quotes.name: Paul Brandt

quotes.message: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Commitment leads to action. Action brings your dream closer.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: It is precisely the possibility of realizing a dream that makes life interesting.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: When you stop chasing your dreams, your dreams start chasing you.
quotes.name: Dez Del Rio

quotes.message: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The only boundaries for me are those I place on myself. I can make my own dreams come true.
quotes.name: Shelly Wu

quotes.message: As soon as you start to pursue a dream, your life wakes up and everything has meaning.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.
quotes.name: Anna Quindlen

quotes.message: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Once in awhile it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
quotes.name: Alan Keightley

quotes.message: I have accepted fear as a part of life- specifically the fear of change. I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Figure out what your purpose is in life, what you really and truly want to do with your time and your life; then be willing to sacrifice everything and then some to achieve it. If you are not willing to make the sacrifice, then keep searching.
quotes.name: Quintina Ragnacci

quotes.message: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further then a great idea that inspires no one.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: It was the man's dream, and his inspiring attempt to make them come true that remain important.
quotes.name: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.message: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.name: Joel Barker

quotes.message: When your heart is in your dreams, no request is too extreme.
quotes.name: Jiminy Cricket

quotes.message: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: Get mocked at for as much as you can, fail as much as you can, but don't quit. Let every mockery, every failure, be a source of inspiration for you to reach for greatness, and that greatness will silence your critics.
quotes.name: Ajaero Tony Martins

quotes.message: Chase the vision, not the money. The money will end up following you.
quotes.name: Tony Hsieh

quotes.message: The only thing worse than starting something and failing ... is not starting something.
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.name: Venus Williams

quotes.message: I knew that if I failed I wouldn't regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
quotes.name: Jeff Bezos

quotes.message: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.name: Harriet Tubman

quotes.message: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Don't ever let someone tell you, you can't do something. Not even me. You got a dream, you got to protect it.
quotes.name: Steven Conrad

quotes.message: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing that I wanted to do.
quotes.name: Georgia O'Keefe

quotes.message: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there's love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.name: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.message: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no passion to be found playing small-in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
quotes.name: Mae Jemison

quotes.message: Follow your passions, follow your heart, and the things you need will come.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.message: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humour, some style.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Perhaps the biggest tragedy of our lives is that freedom is possible, yet we can pass our years trapped in the same old patterns.
quotes.name: Tara Brach

quotes.message: Do something wonderful. People may imitate it.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Swim out of your little pond.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Any dream worth dreaming, is worth the effort to make it come true
quotes.name: Evan Gourley

quotes.message: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: Cherish your visions and you dreams, as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Capture your dreams and your life becomes full.
quotes.name: Nikita Koloff

quotes.message: A dead end street is a good place to turn around.
quotes.name: Naomi Judd

quotes.message: If you start trying to figure out yourself from the image everyone has of you, you run into a dead end.
quotes.name: Sam Shepard

quotes.message: It is a sure sign that a culture has reached a dead end when it is no longer intrigued by its myths.
quotes.name: Greil Marcus

quotes.message: People go on exploration; they're trying to find places that weren't known before. But it is an inevitable fact of research, as is in any other form of exploration of the unknown, that some people find they go down a dead end.
quotes.name: Mark Walport

quotes.message: Worry compounds the futility of being trapped on a dead-end street. Thinking opens new avenues.
quotes.name: Cullen Hightower

quotes.message: If things go wrong and you hit a dead end-as you will-it's just life's way of saying it's time to change course.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: I think that people who get to a certain position, and then try to ferociously defend it or build on it, it's kind of a dead-end street. You see people becoming miserable that way.
quotes.name: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.message: The longer a dead-end, the more it looks like a road.
quotes.name: Mikhail Turovsky

quotes.message: There are no dead ends in life, only dead end thinking.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: People who inspire others are those who see invisible bridges at the end of dead-end streets.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: It is only in God that we discover our origin, our identity, our meaning, our purpose, our significance, and our destiny. Every other path leads to a dead end.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: I'm sure that in the fullness of time we'll learn that one or more of these seemingly promising technologies were dead ends. And that's the nature of innovation, and that's why we should spread our bets; we should not put our eggs in any one basket. Some of these will be grand successes, some of them will be average, and some of them will be abject failures.
quotes.name: Jay Inslee

quotes.message: There are ends, occasionally, with projects. That happens. But they are natural dead ends. It's usually the outside situation that demands an ending. I never really settle for one.
quotes.name: Aleksandra Mir

quotes.message: An ordinary mistake is one that leads to a dead end, while a profound mistake is one that leads to progress. Anyone can make an ordinary mistake, but it takes a genius to make a profound mistake.
quotes.name: Frank Wilczek

quotes.message: Those who deny the change in consciousness that the divine process of creation now brings about-or actually imposes on us-and fail to develop their intuition accordingly will sooner or later find themselves at a dead end.
quotes.name: Carl Johan Calleman

quotes.message: I suppose it’s easier to see the way out of anything when you’ve found your way out of that maze. When you’re stuck in the middle, in a series of dead-ends making circles, it’s difficult to make any sense of anything.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: As the rain falls and the sun shines, they grow, grow, grow; minds so open, they go through life aware and accepting, seeing light where there's dark, seeing possibility in dead ends, tasting victory as others spit out failure, questioning where others accept. Just a little less jaded, a little less cynical.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: There are no dead ends, just detours.
quotes.name: Nora Roberts

quotes.message: Arrogance and fanaticism cause the hardening of positions taken and entrenchment can only lead to a dead end.
quotes.name: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople

quotes.message: Negative expectations are a quick route to dead-end thinking.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: In science, a path that turns out to be a dead end is very useful because you don't devote resources to focusing on that; you go elsewheres.
quotes.name: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.message: In our age of nuclear and biological weapons and the ever more efficient exploitation of nature, the mix of high technology and an ethos of domination could take us to an evolutionary dead end.
quotes.name: Riane Eisler

quotes.message: It may seem like I came out of the blue. But, my road was long, windy, full of hurdles, and even some dead ends. I lost family. I lost friends. I even lost my way. When I reached what felt like rock bottom, I realized I had a responsibility to everyone who believed in me and to kids, like me, who just needed a chance and something to believe in.
quotes.name: Victor Cruz

quotes.message: When we attempt to find meaning in the pursuit of pleasure, the commitment to a job, or through plumbing intellectual depths, we all eventually find in each of these pursuits a dead end.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: Thinking that what you want equals what's best for you is a dead end.
quotes.name: Byron Katie

quotes.message: Work at what you love the most, even if you're only a two. Trust that your love for what your are doing will see you through. That's not easy, but better to grow into what you love than to pretend you're satisfied with a developmental dead end.
quotes.name: Laurence Boldt

quotes.message: Some of us have become so addicted to pointing fingers at others for all the wrong that happens in our lives that self-assessment has become synonymous with blaming the victim.
quotes.name: LZ Granderson

quotes.message: Never point a finger where you never lent a hand.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.name: Louis Nizer

quotes.message: All of us should be much more humble and contrite when we point the finger at somebody else, because four more fingers are pointing back at us.
quotes.name: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.message: When we assign blame we are pointing the finger to who or what is responsible for a fault or for a wrong doing. We are trying to make others accountable. Blaming does not solve a problem it usually only makes people defensive.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: ‎When you point your finger at someone, anyone, it is often a moment of judgement. We point our fingers when we want to scold someone, point out what they have done wrong. But each time we point, we simultaneously point three fingers back at ourselves.
quotes.name: Christopher Pike

quotes.message: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Most of us can read the writing on the wall; we just assume it's addressed to someone else.
quotes.name: Ivern Ball

quotes.message: Blaming is pointing out there, rather than in here, into your own mind, when you find yourself in a painful or uncomfortable experience. Blame means shifting the responsibility for where you are onto someone or something else, rather than accepting responsibility for your role in the experience.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: One of the annoying things about believing in free will and individual responsibility is the difficulty of finding somebody to blame your problems on. And when you do find somebody, it's remarkable how often his picture turns up on your driver's license.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Blame is just a lazy person’s way of making sense of chaos.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: Men are forever pointing at others, which is why I always follow the knuckle and not the nail.
quotes.name: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.message: FOREFINGER, n. The finger commonly used in pointing out two malefactors.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Stop pointing fingers and placing blame on others. Your life can only change to the degree that you accept responsibility for it.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Clean your finger before you point at my spots.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I think that the most politically correct finger-pointing that anyone can ever do is to finger-point while standing in front of a really big mirror.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: When you point your finger at someone, look where the other fingers point.
quotes.name: Jamaican Proverb

quotes.message: Never point out the mistakes of another with a dirty finger.
quotes.name: Italian Proverb

quotes.message: The one who points his fingers has three pointing back at him.
quotes.name: Native American Proverb

quotes.message: Everybody wants to take responsibility when you win, but when you fail, all these fingers are pointing.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: Wherever you find a problem, you will usually find the finger-pointing of blame. Society is addicted to playing the victim.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: It's always the ones with the dirty hands pointing the fingers.
quotes.name: Sonya Teclai

quotes.message: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
quotes.name: Robert Bloch

quotes.message: Responsibility: A detachable burden easily shifted to the shoulders of God, Fate, Fortune, Luck or one's neighbor. In the days of astrology it was customary to unload it upon a star.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Don't focus on the speck in your brother's eye while ignoring the log in your own eye.
quotes.name: Jesus in Matthew 7:5

quotes.message: Blame is for God and small children.
quotes.name: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.message: Before pointing fingers make sure your hands are clean.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: At the end of the day, you are solely responsible for your success and your failure. And the sooner you realize that, you accept that, and integrate that into your work ethic, you will start being successful. As long as you blame others for the reason you aren't where you want to be, you will always be a failure.
quotes.name: Erin Cummings

quotes.message: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
quotes.name: Albert Ellis

quotes.message: All too often we have been pulled away from being honest with ourselves and drawn into a game of blaming others for bad situations.
quotes.name: Joseph E. McGuire

quotes.message: When you blame yourself, you learn from it. If you blame someone else, you don't learn nothing, cause hey, it's not your fault, it's his fault, over there.
quotes.name: Joe Strummer

quotes.message: All of the things that have happened in my life have been self-propelled. I can't blame anybody else or point a finger at anybody.
quotes.name: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.message: Psychologically, it's always more pleasurable to blame others for our problems than it is to acknowledge our own responsibility.
quotes.name: Barry Eisler

quotes.message: The blame game is a waste of time. Any time you're busy fixing blame, you're wasting energy and not fixing the problem.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: The human race is facing all kinds of problems, and all we are doing is pointing fingers and saying, 'Your interpretation of the problem is different from my interpretations of the problem.
quotes.name: Shane Smith

quotes.message: It's so much easier to point a finger than to take responsibility yourself, isn't it? Maybe it isn't so simple as this person's fault or that one. Maybe we make up the dance together, as we go along, and no one knows what the result will be.
quotes.name: Claire Cross

quotes.message: When we blame, we give away our power.
quotes.name: Greg Anderson

quotes.message: Blaming others is nothing more than excusing yourself.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: You can blame the other guy for saying it, or you can look at yourself and say, 'I must have contributed to this.
quotes.name: Nick Saban

quotes.message: Your 'hand-shake' can encourage tens of people while your 'finger-pointing' can turn ten thousands away from you!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: It’s always easy to blame others. You can spend your entire life blaming the world, but your success and failures are entirely your own responsibility.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Solutions are not found by pointing fingers; they are reached by extending hands.
quotes.name: Aysha Taryam

quotes.message: When others, a man begins to blame . He'll soon find himself alone, . The same.
quotes.name: Nigel Bloomfield

quotes.message: And so, pointing fingers become pointing guns, because nobody listens to fingers.
quotes.name: Jeff Shaara

quotes.message: Stop the blame game.
quotes.name: Eric Thomas

quotes.message: If you are looking to inspire people then blaming is the last thing you want to do. To inspire others, focus your attention on the solution not the blame. No good comes from blame, good comes from finding a way to correct the situation.
quotes.name: Kate Summers

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to blame yourself before you can blame others.
quotes.name: Joe Bonamassa

quotes.message: Easy to judge the mistakes of others, difficult to recognize our own mistakes.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.name: Deborah Reber

quotes.message: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: You can only lose what you cling to.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.name: Helen Hollick

quotes.message: Letting go helps us to to live in a more peaceful state of mind and helps restore our balance. It allows others to be responsible for themselves and for us to take our hands off situations that do not belong to us. This frees us from unnecessary stress.
quotes.name: Melody Beattie

quotes.message: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: Inner peace can be reached only when we practice forgiveness. Forgiveness is letting go of the past, and is therefore the means for correcting our misperceptions.
quotes.name: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.message: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: We need to learn to let go as easily as we grasp and we will find our hands full and our minds empty.
quotes.name: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.message: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace.
quotes.name: Ajahn Chah

quotes.message: One of the simplest ways to stay happy is by letting go of the things that make you sad.
quotes.name: Tinku Razoria

quotes.message: I must let go of the life I've planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for me.
quotes.name: Kumar Anupam

quotes.message: What does it matter, if you let go? For the weight that is on you means nothing and never meant anything.
quotes.name: Jeremy Limn

quotes.message: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday's gone. There's nothing you can do to bring it back. You can't should've done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I realise there's something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they're experts at letting things go.
quotes.name: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.message: You cannot let go of anything if you cannot notice that you are holding it. Admit your 'weaknesses' and watch them morph into your greatest strengths.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try, the world is beyond the winning.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Absorb what is useful. Discard what is not. Add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: We must learn to let go, to give up, to make room for the things we have prayed for and desired.
quotes.name: Charles Fillmore

quotes.message: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.
quotes.name: Isabelle Eberhardt

quotes.message: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: Surrender to what is. Let go of what was. Have faith in what will be.
quotes.name: Sonia Ricotti

quotes.message: Keep what is worth keeping and with the breath of kindness blow the rest away.
quotes.name: Dinah McCraik

quotes.message: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Vengeance is God's job, not ours.
quotes.name: F. LaGard Smith

quotes.message: Part of me wants justice for this. Part of me wants to never cause harm to another.
quotes.name: Ken Scholes

quotes.message: The city guardsmen were like the keres, doom-bringers of merciless vengeance.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: A tardy vengeance shares the tyrant's guilt.
quotes.name: Edward Young

quotes.message: Vengeance taken will often tear the heart and torment the conscience.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: And though the villain 'scape a while, he feels. Slow vengeance, like a bloodhound, at his heels.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: To treat a man with kindness rather than vengeance is the way to move him. Vengeance may break his spirit; but kindness will break his heart.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: For vengeance is an emptiness and he that seeketh it wasteth himself.
quotes.name: Jeffery Farnol

quotes.message: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Vengeance cannot abide the agony of grace.
quotes.name: Anne Elisabeth Stengl

quotes.message: In high vengeance there is noble scorn.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: I'm not violent, I don't believe in killing people, but standing up for yourself, speaking out against injustice, is another form of vengeance.
quotes.name: Eva Gabrielsson

quotes.message: Vengeance is mine; I will repay.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Vengeance is not the point; change is. But the trouble is that in most people's minds the thought of victory and the thought of punishing the enemy coincide.
quotes.name: Barbara Deming

quotes.message: There was a time when metal ruled the world and I don't see any reason why it should be different now.
quotes.name: Zacky Vengeance

quotes.message: When critics sit in judgment it is hard to tell where justice leaves off and vengeance begins.
quotes.name: Chuck Jones

quotes.message: Vengeance is sweet. Vengeance taken when the vengee isn't sure who the venger is, is sweeter still.
quotes.name: Gary D. Schmidt

quotes.message: Vengeance has no foresight.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: The thirst for vengeance was the beautiful nature which Homer imitated.
quotes.name: Johann Georg Hamann

quotes.message: Retribution often means that we eventually do to ourselves what we have done unto others.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Just vengeance does not call for punishment.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: Vengeance is in my heart, death in my hand, blood and revenge are hammering in my head.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: One good act of vengeance deserves another.
quotes.name: John Jefferson

quotes.message: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: Vengeance is one of life's great motivators.
quotes.name: K.S. Brooks

quotes.message: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: The paradox of vengefulness is that it makes men dependent upon those who have harmed them, believing that their release from pain will come only when they make their tormentors suffer.
quotes.name: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.message: Vengeance is a form of reciprocity in which each deed begets another. Each act of vengeance is a response to a previous wrong.
quotes.name: James T. Sie

quotes.message: Always seek justice, but love only mercy. To love justice and hate mercy is but a doorway to more injustice.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Vengeance is a monster of appetite, forever bloodthirsty and never filled.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Cries for justice are often the bitter laments of the vengeful.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: I don't believe in the death penalty, but I understand personal vengeance.
quotes.name: Ian Mcshane

quotes.message: To the extent that our conceptions of justice contain recognizable traces of vengeance, they remain half-baked, primitive and immature.
quotes.name: James P. Sterba

quotes.message: Vengeance is the act of turning anger in on yourself. On the surface it may be directed at someone else, but it is a surefire recipe for arresting emotional recovery.
quotes.name: Jane Goldman

quotes.message: Something of vengeance I had tasted for the first time; as aromatic wine it seemed, on swallowing, warm and racy: its after-flavour, metallic and corroding, gave me a sensation as if I had been poisoned.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: Now just vengeance is taken only for that which is done unjustly; hence that which provokes anger is always something considered in the light of an injustice.
quotes.name: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: A society built upon a foundation of vengeance is a society doomed to destroy itself.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: I know there are people who believe you should forgive and forget. For the record, I'd like to say I'm a big fan of forgiveness as long as I'm given the opportunity to get even first.
quotes.name: Sue Grafton

quotes.message: And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers.
quotes.name: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.message: In theory it may seem all right to some, but when it comes to being made the instrument of the Lord's vengeance, I myself don't like it.
quotes.name: Robert Shaw

quotes.message: Deep vengeance is the daughter of deep silence.
quotes.name: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.message: On wrongs swift vengeance waits.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: If you're betrayed, release disappointment at once. By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Nothing is more costly, nothing is more sterile, than vengeance.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Vengeance is a delicious fruit, that must ripen in order that we may fully enjoy it.
quotes.name: Émile Gaboriau

quotes.message: You are not special. You are not a beautiful or unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else.
quotes.name: Tyler Durden

quotes.message: Sometimes it feels as if everything in life is just something we haul to the grave.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.
quotes.name: Richard L Evans

quotes.message: You are a piece of the puzzle of someone else's life. You may never know where you fit, but others will fill the holes in their lives with pieces of you.
quotes.name: Bonnie Arbon

quotes.message: Self-pity in its early stages is as snug as a feather mattress. Only when it hardens does it become uncomfortable.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Self-pity is our worst enemy and if we yield to it, we can never do anything wise in this world.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: When one realizes that his life is worthless he either commits suicide or travels.
quotes.name: Edward Dahlberg

quotes.message: Self-confidence gives you the freedom to make mistakes and cope with failure without feelingthat your world has come to an end or that you are a worthless person.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The pleasure we derive from doing favors is partly in the feeling it gives us that we are not altogether worthless. It is a pleasant surprise to ourselves.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: I don't deserve a soul, yet I still have one. I know because it hurts.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: I'm tired of feeling worthless. I'm tired of feeling hopeless. But above all, I'm tired of feeling tired.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless.
quotes.name: Luan

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it for anyone else.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Feeling sorry for yourself, and your present condition, is not only a waste of energy but the worst habit you could possibly have.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Honestly sitting around feeling sorry for yourself won't change anything. If you want your life to change you have to do something about it.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Of all our infirmities, the most savage is to despise our being.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Never feel self-pity, the most destructive emotion there is. How awful to be caught up in the terrible squirrel cage of self.
quotes.name: Millicent Fenwick

quotes.message: Self-pity dries up our sympathy for others.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Self-pity is like a snake that gets in your brain and lays its eggs there.
quotes.name: Steve Chandler

quotes.message: God does not love us because we are valuable; rather we are valuable because God loves us.
quotes.name: Kevin Martin

quotes.message: When your self-worth goes up, your net worth goes up with it.
quotes.name: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.message: When I am not desperate, I am worthless.
quotes.name: Ivo Andric

quotes.message: Whether you think you can or think you can't you are right.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Self-care is never a selfish act it is simply good stewardship of the only gift I have, the gift I was put on earth to offer to others.
quotes.name: Parker Palmer

quotes.message: Pity is best taught by fellowship in woe.
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.message: Pity costs nothing, and it ain't worth nothing.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: No one has the right to be sorry for himself for a misfortune that strikes everyone.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: You must realize that one day you will die. Until then you are worthless.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless.
quotes.name: Aleister Crowley

quotes.message: Many great ideas go unexecuted, and many great executioners are without ideas. One without the other is worthless.
quotes.name: Tim Blixseth

quotes.message: Real men are sadly lacking in this world, for when they are put to the test they prove worthless.
quotes.name: Franz Liszt

quotes.message: If worthless men are sometimes at the head of affairs, it is, I believe, because worthless men are at the tail and the middle.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: An idea is worthless unless you use it.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Find value in what we've been taught is worthless.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: One day you'll discover that the opinions of worthless people are worthless.
quotes.name: Piers Anthony

quotes.message: Whatever you seize for yourself is worthless. Only what is given you has value.
quotes.name: Gerald Morris

quotes.message: You are worthless to others if you don't know your own self and self-worth.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Even the most worthless thing in the world can be beautiful, it just takes the right touch
quotes.name: Robert McCammon

quotes.message: The currency of this world will be worthless at our death or at Christ's return, both of which are imminent.
quotes.name: Randy Alcorn

quotes.message: Anyone who has accustomed himself to regard the life of any living creature as worthless is in danger of arriving also at the idea of worthless human lives.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Worrying is worthless. When you stop focusing on what has already happened and what may never happen, then you'll be in the present moment. Then you'll begin to experience joy in life.
quotes.name: Brian Weiss

quotes.message: If it requires a uniform, it's a worthless endeavor.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: Consider before acting, to avoid foolishness. It is the worthless man who speaks and acts thoughtlessly.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: No human being, when you understand his desires, is worthless. No one's life is nothing.
quotes.name: Speaker for the Dead

quotes.message: The mirror is a worthless invention. The only way to truly see yourself is in the reflection of someone else's eyes.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Socialists make the mistake of confusing individual worth with success. They believe you cannot allow people to succeed in case those who fail feel worthless.
quotes.name: Kenneth Baker

quotes.message: I think the saddest people always try their hardest to make people happy because they know what it's like to feel absolutely worthless and they don't want anyone else to feel like that.
quotes.name: Robin Williams

quotes.message: Every human being has the same potential. Whatever makes you feel I am worthless is wrong. Absolutely wrong. You are deceiving yourself. We all have the power of thought, so what could you possibly be lacking? If you have the willpower, then you can do anything.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: I learned that you are not free until you stop others from making you feel worthless. Because if you do not, you will eventually accept that you are worthless.
quotes.name: Ishmael Beah

quotes.message: Any problem, big or small, within a family, always seems to start with bad communication. Someone isn't listening.
quotes.name: Emma Thompson

quotes.message: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: In every dispute between parent and child, both cannot be right, but they may be, and usually are, both wrong. It is this situation which gives family life its peculiar hysterical charm.
quotes.name: Isaac Rosenfeld

quotes.message: Most couples have not had hundreds of arguments; they've had the same argument hundreds of times.
quotes.name: Gay Hendricks

quotes.message: Family quarrels have a total bitterness unmatched by others. Yet it sometimes happens that they also have a kind of tang, a pleasantness beneath the unpleasantness, based on the tacit understanding that this is not for keeps; that any limb you climb out on will still be there later for you to climb back.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what kind of problems a family is having; it should always stay in the family.
quotes.name: Scott Weiland

quotes.message: We're a very close family and we're a very real family, and I think every real family has real problems.
quotes.name: Emilio Estevez

quotes.message: I can't say it's not painful being estranged from most of my family. I wish it could be otherwise.
quotes.name: LaToya Jackson

quotes.message: Family problems come in all shapes and sizes; some are short-lived and easily managed, while others are more chronic and difficult to handle.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes problems don't require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: How many solutions are found to family problems if we take time to reflect? If we think of a husband or wife and we dream about their good qualities that they have? Don't ever lose the illusion of when you were boyfriend and girlfriend!
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: I don't think a female running a house is a problem, a broken family. It's perceived as one because of the notion that a head is a man.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: You can't teach a son to be loyal if the father is not loyal. The same applies with the mother and her daughter.
quotes.name: Mercy Pheona

quotes.message: The American family is not simply changing; it is getting weaker. . . . Family decline drives some of our most urgent social problems. . . . The heart of the family problem lies in the steady breakup of the two-parent home.
quotes.name: David Popenoe

quotes.message: A busy mother makes slothful daughters.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: Otherwise, you just become partners managing the kids and life, and that makes your marriage more vulnerable to problems down the road.
quotes.name: Laura Berman

quotes.message: The old problems - love, money, security, status, health, etc. - are still here to plague us or please us.
quotes.name: Shelley Berman

quotes.message: Pick a dysfunction and it's a family problem.
quotes.name: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.message: Families and their problems go on and on, and they aren't solved, they're dealt with.
quotes.name: Roger Ebert

quotes.message: I was the black sheep of the family, and my mother never really understood me.
quotes.name: Andre Rieu

quotes.message: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.name: William R. Alger

quotes.message: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The two of you — father and son— should take walks in the evening and talk (without purpose or routes) about this and that.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: My father left me his words. From them I remember both his outlook on life and his voice, positive, and clear. He was someone who didn't worry about small problems. His advice here—leave it; let it go— is inspiring.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Where but in Kenya can a man whose grandfather was a cannibal watch a really good game of polo?
quotes.name: Marina Sulzberger

quotes.message: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: Sometimes life can be difficult. Life happens.
quotes.name: Brooke Jorden

quotes.message: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: A family harmony would make so essential a part of my happiness that I could never enjoy myself without it.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: We have been a scattered family. If some of my children could now be collected round the parent Hive it appears to me, that it would add much to the happiness of our declining years.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: I want to spend more time with my family, but I'm not sure they want to spend more time with me.
quotes.name: Esther Rantzen

quotes.message: My father is a bastard . My Ma's an S.O.B.. My grandpa's always plastered . My grandma pushes tea . My sister wears a moustache . My brother wears a dress . Goodness gracious, that's why I'm a mess.
quotes.name: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.message: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: All happy families resemble one another, but each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Do not display to others your family's ugly problems.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: There is no school equal to decent home and no teachers equal to honest virtuous parents.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: There is too much stress today on material things. Teach your children not so much the value of cents but the sense of values.
quotes.name: Morris Franklin

quotes.message: The family has become too scared of its children; the children too insecure in their remoteness from their parents; and the church too much of a social welfare organization for the good of the family, the church, or society.
quotes.name: A. Whitney Griswold

quotes.message: The best legacy a parent can leave his children is more of his time every day.
quotes.name: O.A. Battista

quotes.message: It is only necessary to make war with five things; . with the maladies of the body . the ignorances of the mind . with the passions of the body . with the seditions of the city . and the discords of families.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don't let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: If we're sitting at dinner and there's no conversation going on because everybody's got their head someplace else in their iPhone, that's a family problem that needs to be solved.
quotes.name: Ross W. Greene

quotes.message: The more you’re loving and understanding, the more your kids will sing.
quotes.name: Maxime Lagace

quotes.message: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching — they are your family.
quotes.name: Jim Butcher
