quotes.message: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.name: Anthony Brandt

quotes.message: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Pretending that we live doesn't make us alive.
quotes.name: Serj Tankian

quotes.message: Pretending to know everything closes the door to finding out what's really there.
quotes.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.message: I hope you have not been leading a double life, pretending to be wicked and being good all the time. That would be hypocrisy.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The best way to not get your heart broken, is pretending you don't have one.
quotes.name: Charlie Sheen

quotes.message: Duty largely consists of pretending that the trivial is critical.
quotes.name: John Fowles

quotes.message: You can't wake a person who is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.name: American Indian Proverb, Navajo

quotes.message: Pretending is not just play. Pretending is imagined possibility. Pretending, or acting, is a very valuable life skill and we do it all the time.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: When one is pretending the entire body revolts.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Wearing a mask wears you out. Faking it is fatiguing. The most exhausting activity is pretending to be what you know you aren't.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: The only good in pretending is the fun we get out of fooling ourselves that we fool somebody.
quotes.name: Booth Tarkington

quotes.message: Wisdom consists partly in not pretending anymore, in discarding artifice.
quotes.name: Julian Barnes

quotes.message: It's much more interesting to embrace who you really are rather than waste energy pretending to be someone else.
quotes.name: Adam Levine

quotes.message: The terrible immoralities are the cunning ones hiding behind masks of morality, such as exploiting people while pretending to help them.
quotes.name: Vernon Howard

quotes.message: You're pretending this isn't your life. You think it's going to happen some other time. When you're dead you'll realise you were alive now.
quotes.name: Caryl Churchill

quotes.message: Everybody wants to lie to himself, pretending that there's something else besides only the normal life you're living in.
quotes.name: Gaspar Noe

quotes.message: There’s no use of pretending to be good in front of people who are also doing same to us.. Mutual deceptions don’t lead anywhere.
quotes.name: Rajneesh Sharma

quotes.message: Everyone in a position of authority is hysterical, and everyone else is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.name: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.message: Nobody really knows what they're doing. Some are just better at pretending like they do.
quotes.name: Kumail Najiani

quotes.message: Half the trouble in life is caused by pretending there isn't any.
quotes.name: Edith Warthon

quotes.message: There is weakness in pretending to know more than you know or in stating less than you know.
quotes.name: Robert Henri

quotes.message: You don't get anything worth getting by pretending to know things you don't know.
quotes.name: Sam Harris

quotes.message: Pretending that there are no choices to be made - reading only books, for example, which are cheery and safe and nice - is a prescription for disaster for the young.
quotes.name: Louis Lowry

quotes.message: You gain power by pretending to be weak.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: Confidence is very important - even pretending to be confident. If you make a mistake but do not let your opponent see what you are thinking then he may overlook the mistake.
quotes.name: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.message: We are born knowing how to be just. And we die knowing we spent a lifetime pretending we didn't.
quotes.name: Susan Meissner

quotes.message: Good people protect people they love even if that means that pretending that everything is okay.
quotes.name: Ron McLarty

quotes.message: I think any hardship is better than pretending to do what one is paid for, and never really doing it.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
quotes.name: Bo Bennett

quotes.message: I take rejection as someone blowing a bugle in my ear to wake me up and get going, rather than retreat.
quotes.name: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.message: Rejection can disappoint you, depress you and may even stop you in your tracks... learn not to take rejection so personally... if you're honest with yourself and believe in your work, others will too.
quotes.name: Bev Jozwiak

quotes.message: Artistic rejection is like taking cod liver oil; they say it's good for you, you know they're right, but it can be still tough to swallow.
quotes.name: Ian Semple

quotes.message: Rejection doesn't have to mean you aren't good enough; it often just means the other person failed to notice what you have to offer.
quotes.name: Ash Sweeney

quotes.message: Dear to us are those who love us but dearer are those who reject us as unworthy, for they add another life; they build a heaven before us whereof we had not dreamed, and thereby supply to us new powers out of the recesses of the spirit.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Every rejection is incremental payment on your dues that in some way will be translated back into your work.
quotes.name: James Lee Burke

quotes.message: Rejection is the sand in the oyster, the irritation that ultimately produces the pearl.
quotes.name: Burke Wilkinson

quotes.message: A boo is a lot louder than a cheer. If you have 10 people cheering and one person booing, all you hear is the booing.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: Human rejection can be God's divine protection.
quotes.name: Paula Hendricks

quotes.message: Rejection gives you more power to push forward.
quotes.name: Jeremy Limn

quotes.message: Rejection is part of the game. Or rather, rejection is part of the profession. A profession which at times can feel like a game.
quotes.name: Robin Black

quotes.message: You get used to the rejection and you don't take it personally.
quotes.name: Daniel Craig

quotes.message: Rejection is merely a redirection; a course correction to your destiny.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Each rejection brings us closer to acceptance.
quotes.name: Ramesh Lohia

quotes.message: We are always afraid to ask because we aren't afraid of the answer but the feeling of rejection.
quotes.name: Anna R.

quotes.message: There's nothing like rejection to make you do an inventory of yourself.
quotes.name: James Lee Burke

quotes.message: Do not waste yourself in rejection; do not bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The effects of rejection can either kill your muse or change your life.
quotes.name: Jane Champagne

quotes.message: It is necessary to put yourself out for rejection, and accept that you will be rejected.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Learn to eat rejection; it will make you stronger.
quotes.name: Bob Ragland

quotes.message: A clear rejection is always better than a fake promise.
quotes.name: Rihanna A Mohammed

quotes.message: Rejection isn't a sign that something is wrong for you it's a sign that they're wrong for you.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Don't feel bad if someone rejects you or ignore you. People usually reject and ignore expensive things because they can't afford them.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Rejected pieces aren't failures; unwritten pieces are.
quotes.name: Greg Daugherty

quotes.message: I always feel like rejection is my petrol. That's what keeps me going.
quotes.name: Laura Kightlinger

quotes.message: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Just because you are different does not mean that you have to be rejected.
quotes.name: Eartha Kitt

quotes.message: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Don't let anyone, or any rejection, keep you from what you want.
quotes.name: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.message: Rejection is, of course, part of any successful model's career, as ironic as that sounds. It's how you pick yourself up and get on with the job.
quotes.name: Erin O'Connor

quotes.message: Better a friendly refusal than an unwilling consent.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: A soft refusal is not always taken, but a rude one is immediately believed
quotes.name: Alexander Chase

quotes.message: You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches.
quotes.name: Dita Von Teese

quotes.message: Social rejection doesn't just cause emotional pain; it affects our physical being.
quotes.name: Leonard Mlodinow

quotes.message: Rejection isn't failure. Failure is giving up. Everyone gets rejected. It's how handle it that determines where you'll end up.
quotes.name: Richard Castle

quotes.message: If we live for people's acceptance, we will die from their rejection.
quotes.name: Lecrae

quotes.message: Don't get discouraged from all the rejection.
quotes.name: Joey King

quotes.message: There's no point in dwelling on rejection.
quotes.name: Isabel Lucas

quotes.message: Rejection is a challenge.
quotes.name: Veronica Purcell

quotes.message: Practice, practice, practice until you eventually get numb on rejections.
quotes.name: Brian Klemmer

quotes.message: I think all great innovations are built on rejections.
quotes.name: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

quotes.message: To be no part of any body, is to be nothing.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: You've got to love this business. You have to be able to take rejection.
quotes.name: Jessica Biel

quotes.message: Rejection is a big part of show business. It can be tough on anyone who doesn't have fairly good self-esteem. Especially kids, as they try to discover who they are.
quotes.name: Angela Cartwright

quotes.message: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self rejection.
quotes.name: Henri Nouwen

quotes.message: Human beings, like plants, grow in the soil of acceptance, not in the atmosphere of rejection.
quotes.name: John Powell

quotes.message: The better you are at communicating, negotiating, and handling your fear of rejection, the easier life is.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Sometimes rejection in life is really redirection.
quotes.name: Tavis Smiley

quotes.message: You have to know how to accept rejection and reject acceptance.
quotes.name: Ray Bradbury

quotes.message: The most important element of a free society, where individual rights are held in the highest esteem, is the rejection of the initiation of violence.
quotes.name: Ron Paul

quotes.message: Artistic creation is a demand for unity and a rejection of the world.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Often, out of our greatest rejection comes our greatest direction.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
quotes.name: Jimmy Valvano

quotes.message: Rejection and the fear of rejection is the biggest impediment we face to choosing ourselves.
quotes.name: James Altucher

quotes.message: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit
quotes.name: E.E. Cummings

quotes.message: What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
quotes.name: Vivica A. Fox

quotes.message: With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence in one's ability, one can build a better world.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
quotes.name: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.message: You need an incredible amount of self-confidence to go digging around in someone's brain.
quotes.name: Benjamin Carson

quotes.message: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.name: Golda Meir

quotes.message: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.name: Peter T. Mcintyre

quotes.message: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.name: Dr. Benjamin Spock

quotes.message: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
quotes.name: Earl Gray Stevens

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams and live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Confidence thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
quotes.name: Tim Gunn

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.
quotes.name: Katy Perry

quotes.message: I've finally stopped running away from myself.
quotes.name: Goldie Hawn

quotes.message: Low self-confidence isn't a life sentence. Self-confidence can be learned, practiced, and mastered - just like any other skill. Once you master it, everything in your life will change for the better.
quotes.name: Barrie Davenport

quotes.message: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: Turn back.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: It is confidence in our bodies, minds and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: Embracing your true self radiates a natural beauty that cannot be diluted or ignored.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
quotes.name: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.message: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
quotes.name: Richard Kline

quotes.message: A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: To establish true self-esteem we must concentrate on our successes and forget about the failures and the negatives in our lives.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Our self-respect tracks our choices. Every time we act in harmony with our authentic self and our heart, we earn our respect. It is that simple. Every choice matters.
quotes.name: Dan Coppersmith

quotes.message: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.name: Louise L. Hay

quotes.message: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
quotes.name: Robert Hand

quotes.message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Who has confidence in himself will gain the confidence of others.
quotes.name: Leib Lazarow

quotes.message: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion.
quotes.name: Billie Jean King

quotes.message: You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can't have it.
quotes.name: Dr. Robert Anthony

quotes.message: Confidence is half of victory.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: There's one blessing only, the source and cornerstone of beatitude: confidence in self.

quotes.message: Confidence is that feeling by which the mind embarks on great and honorable courses with a sure hope and trust in itself.

quotes.message: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
quotes.name: Marcus Garvey

quotes.message: The strongest single factor in prosperity consciousness is self-esteem: believing you can do it, believing you deserve it, believing you will get it.
quotes.name: Jerry Gillies

quotes.message: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: The most important key to the permanent enhancement of esteem is the practice of positive inner-talk.
quotes.name: Dennis Waitley

quotes.message: All prosperity begins in the mind and is dependent only on the full use of our creative imagination.
quotes.name: Ruth Ross

quotes.message: Prosperity is only an instrument to be used, not a deity to be worshipped.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things. Poverty is a way of living and thinking, and not just a lack of money or things.

quotes.message: Prosperity's right hand is industry and her left hand is frugality.

quotes.message: To rejoice in the prosperity of others is to partake of it.

quotes.message: You can't borrow your way to prosperity.
quotes.name: Terry Branstad

quotes.message: Prosperity in the form of wealth works exactly the same as everything else. You will see it coming into your life when you are unattached to needing it.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity.

quotes.message: There are many roads to prosperity, but one must be taken. Inaction leads nowhere.
quotes.name: Robert Zoellick

quotes.message: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider.

quotes.message: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The fact is prosperity has a purpose. It's to allow us to pursue 'the better angels,' to give us time to think and grow.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate: adversity the great.

quotes.message: In prosperity prepare for a change; in adversity hope for one.
quotes.name: James Burgh

quotes.message: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
quotes.name: Matt D. Miller

quotes.message: The desire for economic prosperity is itself not culturally determined but almost universally shared.
quotes.name: Francis Fukuyama

quotes.message: The world of prosperity maintains the world of adversity.
quotes.name: James Lendall Basford

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
quotes.name: Rose Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A sustainable world means working together to create prosperity for all.
quotes.name: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.message: There is no way to prosperity, prosperity is the way.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Opportunity today, prosperity tomorrow.
quotes.name: Julian Castro

quotes.message: As much as we need a prosperous economy, we also need a prosperity of kindness and decency.
quotes.name: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: Prosperity is the surest breeder of insolence I know.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: It is easy when we are in prosperity to give advice to the afflicted.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: True prosperity is the result of well-placed confidence in ourselves and our fellow man.
quotes.name: Benjamin Burt

quotes.message: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
quotes.name: Ralph Seger

quotes.message: There are no bad business and investment opportunities, but there are bad entrepreneurs and investors.
quotes.name: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: In the short run, the market is a voting machine, but in the long run it is a weighing machine.
quotes.name: Benjamin Graham

quotes.message: Never depend on single income. Make investment to create a second source.
quotes.name: Warren Buffet

quotes.message: Investing in yourself is the best thing you can do. If you've got talents, no one can take them from you.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Earn as much as you can. Save as much as you can. Invest as much as you can. Give as much as you can.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The best investment is in the tools of one's own trade.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Never stop investing. Never stop improving. Never stop doing something new.
quotes.name: Bob Parsons

quotes.message: You should invest in a business that even a fool can run, because someday a fool will.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Whenever you make an investment in yourself, you're making an investment in your future.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
quotes.name: Ben Graham

quotes.message: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
quotes.name: Charles A. Jaffe

quotes.message: Build into each budget the cost of hiring and don't lump yourself with capital investment.
quotes.name: Ann Macbeth

quotes.message: Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Graham

quotes.message: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: When you invest you are buying a day that you don't have to work.
quotes.name: Aya Laraya

quotes.message: The four most dangerous words in investing are: this time it's different.
quotes.name: John Templeton

quotes.message: Those who are unwilling to invest in the future haven't earned one.
quotes.name: Harold Lewis

quotes.message: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
quotes.name: Warren Buffet

quotes.message: Investing isn't about beating others at their game. It's about controlling yourself at your own game.
quotes.name: Benjamin Graham

quotes.message: Anyone who is not investing now is missing a tremendous opportunity.
quotes.name: Carlos Slim

quotes.message: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.message: An important key to investing is to remember that stocks are not lottery tickets.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.message: The best investment with the least risk and the greatest dividend is giving.
quotes.name: John Templeton

quotes.message: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The greatest investment we can ever make is to invest our life in the life of someone else.
quotes.name: Scott Lee

quotes.message: Be picky with who you invest your time in. Wasted time is worse than wasted money.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
quotes.name: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.message: You cannot save time for future use, but you can invest it for the future!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you want your children to turn out well, invest twice as much time with them and half as much money.
quotes.name: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.message: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Some of your activities should be viewed as an investment and not a sacrifice.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Investors should purchase stocks like they purchase groceries, not like they purchase perfume.
quotes.name: Ben Graham

quotes.message: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: The entrance strategy is actually more important than the exit strategy.
quotes.name: Edward Lampert

quotes.message: It's not whether you're right or wrong that's important, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong.
quotes.name: George Soros

quotes.message: You will come to know that what appears today to be a sacrifice will prove to be the greatest investment that you will ever make.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinkley

quotes.message: The stock market is never obvious. It is designed to fool most of the people, most of the time.
quotes.name: Jesse Livermore

quotes.message: Bottoms in the investment world don't end with four-year lows; they end with 10- or 15-year lows.
quotes.name: Jim Rogers

quotes.message: The secret to investing is to figure out the value of something and then pay a lot less.
quotes.name: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.message: Don't look for the needle in the haystack.
quotes.name: John Bogle

quotes.message: In many ways, the stock market is like the weather in that if you don’t like the current conditions all you have to do is wait a while.
quotes.name: Low Simpson

quotes.message: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.
quotes.name: Mellody Hobson

quotes.message: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
quotes.name: Paul Samuelson

quotes.message: Although it’s easy to forget sometimes, a share is not a lottery ticket it’s part ownership of a business.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.message: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
quotes.name: Phillip Fisher

quotes.message: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
quotes.name: Robert Arnott

quotes.message: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
quotes.name: Robert G. Allen

quotes.message: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: To be a successful business owner and investor, you have to be emotionally neutral to winning and losing Winning and losing are just part of the game.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Don’t work for money; make it work for you.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: If you want to be truly successful, invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
quotes.name: Sydney Madwed

quotes.message: Do not put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Rule #1: Never lose money; Rule #2: Don’t forget rule #1.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Risk comes from not knowing what you are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The first rule of investment is: Don't Lose. And the second rule of investment is: Don't forget the first rule.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Men must necessarily be the active agents of their own well-being and well-doing... they themselves must in the very nature of things be their own best helpers.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: Responsibility is the price of greatness.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Accountability breeds response-ability.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: If you want children to keep their feet on the ground, put some responsibility on their shoulders.
quotes.name: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.message: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: The willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life is the source from which self-respect springs.
quotes.name: Joan Didion

quotes.message: Responsibility's like a string we can only see the middle of. Both ends are out of sight.
quotes.name: William McFee

quotes.message: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Success on any major scale requires you to accept responsibility. . .In the final analysis, the one quality that all successful people have is the ability to take on responsibility.
quotes.name: Michael Korda

quotes.message: The man who complains about the way the ball bounces is likely to be the one who dropped it.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: All blame is a waste of time. No matter how much fault you find with another, and regardless of how much you blame him, it will not change you.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: It is easy to dodge our responsibilities, but we cannot dodge the consequences of dodging our responsibilities.
quotes.name: Josiah Charles Stamp

quotes.message: Responsibility walks hand in hand with capacity and power.
quotes.name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.message: Man must cease attributing his problems to his environment, and learn again to exercise his will - his personal responsibility.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I must do something' always solves more problems than Something must be done.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.name: Louis Nizer

quotes.message: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
quotes.name: Bob Dylan

quotes.message: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Responsibility is the thing people dread most of all. Yet it is the one thing in the world that develops us, gives us manhood or womanhood fiber.
quotes.name: Frank Crane

quotes.message: It is easy to ignore responsibility when one is only an intermediate link in a chain of action.
quotes.name: Stanley Milgram

quotes.message: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: A man carries his success or his failure with him, it does not depend on outside conditions.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Trine

quotes.message: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: A man, as a general rule, owes very little to what he is born with -- a man is what he makes of himself.
quotes.name: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.message: Accept the consequences of your actions in order to become the agent of your mental, physical, spiritual and material success.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: It is not only what we do, but also what we do not do for which we are accountable.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: It is a painful thing to look at your own trouble and know that you yourself and no one else has made it.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: A sign of wisdom and maturity is when you come to terms with the realization that your decisions cause your rewards and consequences. You are responsible for your life, and your ultimate success depends on the choices you make.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Peak performance begins with your taking complete responsibility for your life and everything that happens to you.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: No man is fit to command another that cannot command himself.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: No alibi will save you from accepting the responsibility.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Work on yourself first, take responsibility for your own progress.
quotes.name: I Ching

quotes.message: Until you accept responsibility for your life, someone else runs your life.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: To say you have no choice is to relieve yourself of responsibility.
quotes.name: Patrick Ness

quotes.message: People think responsibility is hard to bear. It's not. I think that sometimes it is the absence of responsibility that is harder to bear. You have a great feeling of importance.
quotes.name: Henry Kissinger

quotes.message: I am only one; but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; I will not refuse to do something I can do.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: No man was ever endowed with a right without being at the same time saddled with a responsibility.
quotes.name: Gerald W Johnson

quotes.message: Never trouble another for what you can do for yourself.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: To decide to be at the level of choice, is to take responsibility for your life and to be in control of your life.
quotes.name: Arbie M. Dale

quotes.message: Stand up and be responsible for yourself...Be aware of your mind and take responsibility for yourself.
quotes.name: Suzuki Shosan

quotes.message: It is not only for what we do that we are held responsible but also for what we do not do.
quotes.name: Jean Baptiste Moliere

quotes.message: If each one sweeps before his own door, the whole street is clean.
quotes.name: Yiddish Saying

quotes.message: I believe that every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeler

quotes.message: None of us are responsible for our birth. Our responsibility is the use we make of life.
quotes.name: Joshua Henry Jones

quotes.message: Man is asked to make of himself what he is supposed to become to fulfill his destiny.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: If there is any appalling, spiritually murderous sensation on earth, it is a knowledge that on a certain date or at a given time and place you have got to be somewhere doing some set, prescribed, definite thing.
quotes.name: Christopher Morley

quotes.message: Our definitions of 'responsibility' have always placed a heavy emphasis on self-control but 'response-ability' means responsivity or it means nothing at all.
quotes.name: Philip Slater

quotes.message: You can listen to what everybody says, but the fact remains that you've got to get out there and do the thing yourself
quotes.name: Joan Sutherland

quotes.message: Take your life in your own hands and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: The madman is not the man who has lost his reason. The madman is the man who has lost everything except his reason.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Those who will not reason, perish in the act. Those who will not act, perish for that reason.
quotes.name: W H Auden

quotes.message: Perhaps the reason we are unable to love is that we yearn to be loved, that is, we demand something (love) from our partner instead of delivering ourselves up to him demand-free and asking for nothing but his company.
quotes.name: Milan Kundera

quotes.message: An idle reason lessens the weight of the good ones you gave before.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Human reason has this peculiar fate that in one species of its knowledge it is burdened by questions which, as prescribed by the very nature of reason itself, it is not able to ignore, but which, as transcending all its powers, it is also not able to answer.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Reason must be deluded, blinded, and destroyed. Faith must trample underfoot all reason, sense, and understanding, and whatever it sees must be put out of sight and, know nothing but the word of God.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Love is a passion for life shared with another person. You fall in love with a person who you think is wonderful. It's your deepest appreciation of the value of that individual, and that individual is a reflection of what you value most in life. Love, for sound reasons, can be one of life's greatest rewards.
quotes.name: Terry Goodkind

quotes.message: And if your parents have you for a reason, then that reason better exist. Because once it's gone, so are you.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: The past shouldn't be forgotten. It should be used as a guide for future situations and not used as a reason to avoid making difficult decisions. There was always a choice.
quotes.name: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.message: I understand the reasons behind his keeping a distance from a girl he cares about. Because the truth is, sometimes getting close to the fire does actually burn you.
quotes.name: Simone Elkeles

quotes.message: When bad things turn good, the reason can usually be found in the human heartâ€”sometimes in the hearts of great masses of people, sometimes in the heart of a solitary soul.
quotes.name: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.message: What does reason know? Reason only knows what it has succeeded in learning.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: Reason is the greatest enemy that faith has: it never comes to the aid of spiritual things.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Reason can discover things only near,--sees nothing that's above her.
quotes.name: Francis Quarles

quotes.message: The true triumph of reason is that it enables us to get along with those who do not possess it.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: The last function of reason is to recognize that there are an infinity of things which surpass it.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: The voice of reason is more to be regarded than the bent of any present inclination; since inclination will at length come over to reason, though we can never force reason to comply with inclination.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Every man's Reason is sufficient for his guidance, if used.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Reason must know the heart's reasons and every other reason
quotes.name: Leonora Carrington

quotes.message: The reason 'closure' is a cliche is that it is used too often, too imprecisely, and doesn't in any case reflect reality. In reality, such closure in broken friendships and much else in life is rarely achieved; only death brings closure and then not always for those still living.
quotes.name: Joseph Epstein

quotes.message: What was the point in such loneliness among people. At least if you were by yourself, you had a good reason to be lonely.
quotes.name: Janet Fitch

quotes.message: Where we have reasons for what we believe, we have no need of faith; where we have no reasons, we have lost both our connection to the world and to one another.
quotes.name: Sam Harris

quotes.message: Sometimes we have to do a thing in order to find out the reason for it. Sometimes our actions are questions, not answers.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: If we are bound to improve, we need not trouble to improve. The pure doctrine of progress is the best of all reasons for not being a progressive.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Losing your way on a journey is unfortunate. But, losing your reason for the journey is a fate more cruel.
quotes.name: H. G. Wells

quotes.message: There's never any reason to trust someone. If there's a reason, then it's not trust.
quotes.name: Gerald Morris

quotes.message: We cannot reason ourselves out of our basic irrationality. All we can do is learn the art of being irrational in a reasonable way.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Because of fear, they made shelter and found food and grew things. For the same reason, weapons were stored, waiting.
quotes.name: Lois Lowry

quotes.message: There is no good reason. Don't waste your life waiting for good reasons...You'll wait and wait.
quotes.name: Susan Minot

quotes.message: Reason enslaves all whose minds are not strong enough to master her.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Reason is itself a matter of faith. It is an act of faith to assert that our thoughts have any relation to reality at all.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: A lot of women don't know how to love because there's deep reasons for them not knowing how to love. And what I mean by deep reasons is deep and dark reasons.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Reason, however able, cool at best, Cares not for service, or but serves when prest, Stays till we call, and then not often near.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: The supreme function of reason is to show man that some things are beyond reason.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Our reason may prove what it will: our reason is only a feeble ray that has issued from Nature.
quotes.name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.message: If you follow reason far enough it always leads to conclusions that are contrary to reason.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: He that cannot reason is a fool. He that will not is a bigot. He that dare not is a slave.
quotes.name: William Drummond

quotes.message: Reason has always existed, but not always in a reasonable form.
quotes.name: Karl Marx

quotes.message: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
quotes.name: J.P. Morgan

quotes.message: The reason for the unreason with which you treat my reason , so weakens my reason that with reason I complain of your beauty.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.message: Reason can never reconcile one to life: nothing allays the wants one cannot explain.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.message: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Smiling without good reason is demeaning.
quotes.name: Ellen Raskin

quotes.message: People wonder why the novel is the most popular form of literature; people wonder why it is read more than books of science or books of metaphysics. The reason is very simple; it is merely that the novel is more true than they are.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: People don't just disappear. There's always a reason, or an enemy with a grudge. There's always a loose thread that starts to unravel.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: We were meant to survive because of our minds' ability to reason, our ability to live with frustration in order to maintain our virtue. We wore smiling masks while dying inside.
quotes.name: Anchee Min

quotes.message: Reason is the only thing that makes us men, and distinguishes us from the beasts.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: Never surrender opportunity for security.
quotes.name: Branch Rickey

quotes.message: Nothing in the world is as fearsome as a bloody, battered opponent who will never surrender.
quotes.name: Gerry Spence

quotes.message: If we are to be who we are; if we are to accomplish great things; then we must learn the heart's most essential rule: NEVER SURRENDER DREAMS
quotes.name: J. Michael Straczynski

quotes.message: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Never surrender, it's all about the faith you got: don't ever stop, just push it 'till you hit the top and if you drop, at least you know you gave your all to be true to you, that way you can never fall.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: We'll never surrender, we'll win or die you've got to fight the next generation and the next .....
quotes.name: Omar Mukhtar

quotes.message: An honest man can never surrender an honest doubt.
quotes.name: Walter Malone

quotes.message: Here's a summary for the time or attention challenged: Never surrender freedom for laws that can't affect criminals; they disobey laws for a living.
quotes.name: Wayne LaPierre

quotes.message: We shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be, we shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Do not yield. Do not flinch. Stand up. Stand up with our President and fight. We're Americans. We're Americans, and we'll never surrender. They will.
quotes.name: John McCain

quotes.message: For to save mankind's future freedom, we must face up to any risk that is necessary.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: We never surrendered. We always kept in our hearts the most noble, beautiful feeling that sets human beings apart: hope.
quotes.name: Manel Loureiro

quotes.message: Never surrender to cynicism, even if you suspect it would get the critics on your side.
quotes.name: Roselyn Bosch

quotes.message: Never surrender to you're passions. Dream and live to excess.
quotes.name: Truth Devour

quotes.message: Letting go of someone we love is the hardest thing we will ever do. Some people never surrender to love for the fear of being hurt. But to not have loved, to not have felt the immense joy it brings, would have been a far worse kind of death.
quotes.name: Goldie Hawn

quotes.message: Israel will never surrender to hatred.
quotes.name: Benny Gantz

quotes.message: Lovers never surrender to each other, lovers simply surrender to love.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Every difficulty slurred over will be a ghost to disturb your repose later on.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
quotes.name: Niels Bohr

quotes.message: The difficulty we have in accepting responsibility for our behavior lies in the desire to avoid the pain of the consequences of that behavior.
quotes.name: M. Scott Peck

quotes.message: Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Difficulty is the nurse of greatness.
quotes.name: William C. Bryant

quotes.message: A difficulty is a light. An insurmountable difficulty is a sun.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Every difficulty draws us toward a higher power than ourselves.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: The greatest difficulty with the world is not its ability to produce, but the unwillingness to share.
quotes.name: Roy L. Smith

quotes.message: The greatest difficulty always comes right before the birth of a dream.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Difficulty is what wakes up the genius.
quotes.name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.message: Difficulty comes not only because of your mistakes, but once you try to make an excuse or accuse someone else, your mind stops thinking.
quotes.name: Masayoshi Son

quotes.message: The difficulty with any sort of esteem is that more is expected of you.
quotes.name: Judi Dench

quotes.message: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
quotes.name: Stanisław I Leszczyński

quotes.message: Difficulty is one of the prices that we pay for our blessings.
quotes.name: Sterling W Sill

quotes.message: Life must pass through difficulty in order to achieve any modicum of beauty.
quotes.name: Colum Mccann

quotes.message: The difficulty for most of us in the modern world is that the old-fashioned idea of God has become incredible or implausible.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: The apprenticeship of difficulty is one which the greatest of men have had to serve.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: The difficulty is not making a decision, it's living with the consequences.
quotes.name: Micah Baldwin

quotes.message: Difficulty shows what men are.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts.
quotes.name: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.message: When you are face to face with a difficulty, you are up against a discovery.
quotes.name: Lord Kelvin

quotes.message: Every difficulty requires new strategy to overcome it.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Difficulty is inevitable. Drama is a choice.
quotes.name: Anita Renfroe

quotes.message: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
quotes.name: Epicurus

quotes.message: Difficulty attracts the man of character because it is in embracing it that he realizes himself.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Facing a difficulty requires a willingness of heart.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: There is no difficulty that enough love will not conquer.
quotes.name: Emmet Fox

quotes.message: You gain strength with every difficulty, which you boldly overcome.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Difficulty is our most reliable narrative engine.
quotes.name: Leslie Jamison

quotes.message: The difficulty is to try and teach the multitude that something can be true and untrue at the same time.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: The difficulty is that we try to perfect others before we perfect ourselves.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: It is only when a person gets into difficulty that one can truly see his heart.
quotes.name: Matthew Polly

quotes.message: You have to push through every difficulty to achieve the goal.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: People seem to sometimes have a difficulty drawing that line between the character and the person.
quotes.name: Clark Duke

quotes.message: The difficulty is not to write, but to write what you mean.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: It is not the path which is the difficulty; rather, it is the difficulty which is the path.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself. If we don't have that we never grow, we never learn, and sure as hell we should never teach.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Almost any difficulty will move in the face of honesty. When I am honest I never feel stupid. And when I am honest I am automatically humble.
quotes.name: Hugh Prather

quotes.message: A difficulty journey is more revealing of character than any discussion or analysis.
quotes.name: Michael Treanor

quotes.message: Every difficulty is an opportunity for personal growth.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: Where there is no difficulty there is no praise.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The difficulty is to know conscience from self-interest.
quotes.name: William Dean Howells

quotes.message: If most people are not willing to see the difficulty, this is mainly because, consciously or unconsciously, they assume that it will be they who will settle these questions for the others, and because they are convinced of their own capacity to do this.
quotes.name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.message: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
quotes.name: Allan Bloom

quotes.message: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
quotes.name: Chanakya

quotes.message: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.

quotes.message: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

quotes.message: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.

quotes.message: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.

quotes.message: Without education, we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.

quotes.message: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.

quotes.message: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

quotes.message: The aim of education should be to teach us rather how to think, than what to think rather to improve our minds, so as to enable us to think for ourselves, than to load the memory with thoughts of other men.

quotes.message: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.

quotes.message: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.

quotes.message: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.

quotes.message: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.

quotes.message: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.

quotes.message: Education: the inculcation of the incomprehensible into the indifferent by the incompetent.

quotes.message: Education is the process of driving a set of prejudices down your throats.

quotes.message: Every renaissance comes to the world with a cry, the cry of the human spirit to be free.

quotes.message: I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit.

quotes.message: One radical free spirit nonconformist is pretty much like another.

quotes.message: Here the free spirit of mankind, at length, Throws its last fetters off; and who shall place A limit to the giant's unchained strength, Or curb his swiftness in the forward race?

quotes.message: I am a free spirit. I tell the truth, and I like to mix it up.

quotes.message: There are incalculable resources in the human spirit, once it has been set free.

quotes.message: I realize I'm a free spirit. I like to be happy. I have to have more control of my happiness.

quotes.message: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: I die, as I have lived, a free spirit, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers, heavenly or earthly.

quotes.message: If you try to tame her she will fly away, because pretty little spirits like her, never like to be caged.

quotes.message: I am living breathing freedom

quotes.message: He had a free spirit. He was so far-reaching, he's the person who likes the wind in his hair.

quotes.message: Your happiness doesn't come free, but you need to be free to be happy.

quotes.message: I like to be a free spirit.

quotes.message: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: I am a leaf on the wind.
quotes.name: Joss Whedon

quotes.message: The human spirit: Unbreakable. Relentless. Free.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: I'm a free spirit and that definitely comes from my upbringing, so it's definitely shaped me as an artist.

quotes.message: Defeat should never be a source of discouragement but rather a fresh stimulus.

quotes.message: Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.

quotes.message: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.

quotes.message: You've got to learn to survive a defeat. That's when you develop character.

quotes.message: Nothing but education. Nothing but the first step to something better.

quotes.message: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.

quotes.message: When we are worrying about something that might happen, we are not trusting that we simply do have all the wisdom and information about this particular issue and ultimately things will work out as they will whether it is what we thought we wanter or not.

quotes.message: Life is too short for worrying.

quotes.message: Worrying is the one skill that can be applied to everything in life.

quotes.message: We complain about our worrying, but let someone say something bad about worrying or try to take it away from us and we are ready to challenge Goliath himself.

quotes.message: Somehow, worrying doesn't have the same status as 'doing'.

quotes.message: The result was that we spent time vividly worrying about a terrible problem that was almost guaranteed not to happen.

quotes.message: Something is worrying me, yeah and that something is driving me in misery, oh. I can tell the way things change.

quotes.message: Ain't no need to worrying. What the night is gonna bring because it will be all over in the morning.

quotes.message: Why you keep on worrying yourself? Keep worrying yourself, so much. If your love is mine then let me know.

quotes.message: Worrying is like rocking in a chair -it's something to do, but you don't get anywhere.

quotes.message: Worrying is a waste of time and energy.

quotes.message: I feel I will have nothing to worry about if I could just stop worrying.

quotes.message: Don't worry about worrying; it's as simple as that.

quotes.message: Worrying is stupid. It's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.

quotes.message: If you are worrying, quit; if you haven't started, don't.

quotes.message: Stop worrying.

quotes.message: Providing for tomorrow is good, but worrying about tomorrow is a sin because God is the God of tomorrow just as He is the God of today.
quotes.name: Lamentations 3:23

quotes.message: By worrying about tomorrow, many believers miss the victory God would give them today,
quotes.name: John MacArthur

quotes.message: Instead of worrying about problems we cannot solve, we should say, 'Lord, you are bigger than history. You own everything in the entire universe. You can do anything you want to do. You love me and promise I will never be without the things I need.

quotes.message: Doing the right thing for someone else was like a tonic for me; it was like some magic ointment that made a wound disappear.
quotes.name: Susie Bright

quotes.message: You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, but you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.

quotes.message: You have to do the right thing... You may never know what results come from your action. But if you do nothing, there will be no result.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: Remember not only to say the right thing in the right place, but far more difficult still, to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.

quotes.message: My basic principle is that you don't make decisions because they are easy; you don't make them because they are cheap; you don't make them because they're popular; you make them because they're right.

quotes.message: The time is always right to do what is right.

quotes.message: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.

quotes.message: The right way is not always the popular and easy way. Standing for right when it is unpopular is a true test of moral character.

quotes.message: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.

quotes.message: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes.message: Next to doing the right thing, the most important thing is to let people know you are doing the right thing.

quotes.message: Happiness and personal fulfillment are the natural consequences of doing the right thing.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Doing the right thing is more important than doing the thing right.
