quotes.message: Doing the right thing for someone else occasionally means doing something that feels wrong to you.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: If you have to do it, then you're doing the right thing.
quotes.name: Kathy Valentine

quotes.message: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: We must not allow ourselves to become like the system we oppose.
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Always do right - this will gratify some and astonish the rest.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no wrong time to do the right thing.
quotes.name: Charles M. Blow

quotes.message: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Keep your feet on the ground and your thoughts at lofty heights.
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: Honestly, if you don't fit in then you're probably doing the right thing.
quotes.name: Lights Poxlietner

quotes.message: People will always try to stop you from doing the right thing if it is unconventional.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Doing the right thing daily, compounds over time.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: If you are doing the right thing for the earth, she's giving you great company.
quotes.name: Vandana Shiva

quotes.message: Doing the right thing isn't always easy - in fact, sometimes it's real hard - but just remember that doing the right thing is always right.
quotes.name: David Cottrell

quotes.message: Pissing people off doesn't mean you're doing the right things, but doing the right things will almost inevitably piss people off.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Doing the Right Thing - Sometimes doing the right thing, is to do nothing at all.
quotes.name: Mike Gafka

quotes.message: What is right for one soul may not be right for another. It may mean having to stand on your own and do something strange in the eyes of others.
quotes.name: Eileen Caddy

quotes.message: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Easily say no when you want to... and feel great instead of guilty while doing so.
quotes.name: Shelley Rachanow

quotes.message: A duty dodged is like a debt unpaid; it is only deferred, and we must come back and settle the account at last.
quotes.name: Joseph Fort Newton

quotes.message: Where it is a duty to worship the sun it is pretty sure to be a crime to examine the laws of heat.
quotes.name: John Morley

quotes.message: Let us resolve to look on the bright side, to make the best of whatever may befall, to maintain faith that doing the right thing will ultimately bring victory.
quotes.name: B.C. Forbes

quotes.message: Politics is a jungle— torn between doing the right thing and staying in office.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: It takes less time to do a thing right than to explain why you did it wrong.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: It is not only what we do, but also what we do not do, for which we are accountable.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: The world is divided into people who do things and people who get the credit. Try, if you can, to belong to the first class. There's far less competition.
quotes.name: Dwight Morrow

quotes.message: Thinking well is wise; planning well;, wiser; doing well wisest and best of all.
quotes.name: Persian Proverb

quotes.message: Doing is the great thing. for if, resolutely, people do what is right, in time they come to like doing it.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: Initiative consists of doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.name: Irving Mack

quotes.message: Motherhood is a choice you make every day, to put someone else's happiness and well-being ahead of your own, to teach the hard lessons, to do the right thing even when you're not sure what the right thing is... and to forgive yourself, over and over again, for doing everything wrong.
quotes.name: Donna Ball

quotes.message: The best time to do a thing is when it can be done.
quotes.name: William Pickens

quotes.message: I try to do the right thing at the right time. They may be just little things, but usually they make the difference between winning and losing.
quotes.name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.message: One must learn by doing the thing. For though you think you know it, you have no certainty until you try.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
quotes.name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.message: We are so busy doing the urgent that we don't have time to do the important.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: You must give some time to your fellow man. Even if it's a little thing, do something for those who have need of help., something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it. For remember, you don't live in a world all your own. Your brothers are here, too.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Never let your sense of morals get in the way of doing what's right.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: Our confidence in Christ does not make us lazy, negligent, or careless, but on the contrary it awakens us , urges us on, and maks us active in living righteous lives and doing good. There is no self-confidence to compare with this.
quotes.name: Ulrich Zwingli

quotes.message: When I have a problem of deciding right from wrong, I always give it three tests. First, I give it the common-sense test, and ask if it is reasonable. Then I give it a prayer test. I ask God if it is good and edifying. Then I give it a scripture test. I see if the Bible has anything to say for or against it.
quotes.name: Billy Garaham

quotes.message: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. There are too many people who think that the only thing that's right is to get by, and the only thing that's wrong is to get caught.
quotes.name: J.C. Watts

quotes.message: What one thinks is right is not always the same as what others think is right; no one can be always right.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: It is never wrong to do what is right.
quotes.name: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.message: Life is too short to try and please everyone. Take charge and do what’s right -- not what’s popular.
quotes.name: Farshad Asl

quotes.message: Sometimes it's best to do what feels safe, and sometimes it's better to do what you know is right, even though the cost may be high.
quotes.name: Deborah Wiles

quotes.message: The extraordinary thing about having absolute conviction that you're doing the right thing is that you’ll do it – whatever that may be, no matter how difficult, dangerous or improbable.
quotes.name: John Golembiewski

quotes.message: Doing the right thing even when no one is looking is easy if I remember that I am not in this life alone and that my task is to please God... not people.
quotes.name: Sandra C. Bibb

quotes.message: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
quotes.name: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.message: Quitting is the easiest thing to do.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: You can always quit, so why quit now.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: When your own mind tells you to quit, you must ignore your negative thoughts and press on.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Strategic quitting is the secret of successful organizations
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: Failing is not the worst thing in the world; quitting is.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: It's always too early to quit.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.name: Ted Turner

quotes.message: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Most people who succeed in the face of seemingly impossible conditions are people who simply don't know how to quit.
quotes.name: Robert Schuller

quotes.message: A man is not finished when he is defeated. He is finished when he quits.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: Quit now, you'll never make it. If you disregard this advice, you'll be halfway there.
quotes.name: David Zucker

quotes.message: Rest but never quit. Even the sun has a sinking spell each evening. But it always rises the next morning. At sunrise, every soul is born again.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: One of the most common causes of failure is the habit of quitting when one is overtaken by temporary defeat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Never Quit.... Never ever Quit... You might feel weak when there is someone stronger and more skilled than you are, but if you don't quit there is a chance to prove your determination....
quotes.name: Swetha Dhanagari

quotes.message: Quitting is not the answer. Life is not fair, and you can't quit every time something unfair happens to you.
quotes.name: John Grisham

quotes.message: Quitting is a hiccup for losers. And down they go.
quotes.name: Lorenz Font

quotes.message: Of all the stratagems, to know when to quit is the best.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ...
quotes.name: Gerard de Marigny

quotes.message: Next time you want to quit, think who you want to be. Quitters never win.
quotes.name: Julie Hebert

quotes.message: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does not give up can move mountains.
quotes.name: Ernest Hello

quotes.message: Things can always get worse, but only quitters quit!
quotes.name: Nina Sakura

quotes.message: Quitting is leading too.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: The problem with self-improvement is knowing when to quit.
quotes.name: David Lee Roth

quotes.message: When faced with a mountain, I will not quit! I will keep on striving until I climb over, find a pass through, tunnel underneath - or simply stay and turn the mountain into a gold mine, with God's help!
quotes.name: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.message: Quit while you're ahead.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: The first time you quit, it's hard. The second time, it gets easier. The third time, you don't even have to think about it.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: No one wants to quit when he's losing and no one wants to quit when he's winning.
quotes.name: Richard Petty

quotes.message: Fight the tendency to quit while you're behind.
quotes.name: Dave Weinbaum

quotes.message: Hard times ain't quit and we ain't quit.
quotes.name: Meridel Le Sueur

quotes.message: It's a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired, you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.name: Robert Strauss

quotes.message: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
quotes.name: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.message: There's only one way you can fail, and that's to quit.
quotes.name: Brian Hays

quotes.message: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.name: Mike Ditka

quotes.message: I never tried quitting, and I never quit trying.
quotes.name: Dolly Parton

quotes.message: The difference in winning and losing is most often not quitting.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The best way to guarantee a loss is to quit.
quotes.name: Morgan Freeman

quotes.message: How am I to know what I can achieve if I quit?
quotes.name: Jason Bishop

quotes.message: I might lack in technicality, I might lack in strength, but there's no quit in me...I don't give up.
quotes.name: Dan Hardy

quotes.message: Quitting doesn't enter my mind.
quotes.name: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.message: The day I quit is the day I die.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you feel like quitting, remember why you started.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Forgiveness is unlocking the door to set someone free and realising you were the prisoner!
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Those who cannot forgive others break the bridge over which they themselves must pass.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: To begin loving people today, we must close the door on the past. And that cannot happen without forgiveness! Forgive those who have hurt you for your sake, not because they deserve it.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Whatever our religion, we know that if we really want to love, we must first learn to forgive before anything else.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: We all agree that forgiveness is a beautiful idea until we have to practice it.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: The hatred you're carrying is a live coal in your heart far more damaging to yourself than to them.
quotes.name: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.message: Good to forgive, best to forget.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self giving love.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a sign that the person who has wronged you means more to you than the wrong they have delt.
quotes.name: Ben Greenhalgh

quotes.message: True forgiveness is when you can say, thank you for that experience.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
quotes.name: Robert Muller

quotes.message: Without forgiveness, there is no future.
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
quotes.name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.message: Forgiveness is not always easy. At times, it feels more painful than the wound we suffered, to forgive the one that inflicted it. And yet, there is no peace without forgiveness.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Forgiveness is God's invention for coming to terms with a world in which people are unfair to each other and hurt each other deeply. He began by forgiving us. And He invites us all to forgive each other.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Forgiveness is giving up the hope that the past could have been any different, it's accepting the past for what it was, and using this moment and this time to help yourself move forward.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were.
quotes.name: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.message: By far the strongest poison to the human spirit is the inability to forgive oneself or another person. Forgiveness is no longer an option but a necessity for healing.
quotes.name: Caroline Myss

quotes.message: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Forgiveness is an inner correction that lightens our heart and frees us to live in the present. It is for our peace of mind first. Being at peace, we now have peace to extend to others, and this is the most permanent and valuable gift we can possibly give.
quotes.name: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.message: Forgiveness in no way requires that you trust the one you forgive.
quotes.name: William P. Young

quotes.message: One forgives to the degree that one loves.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Genuine forgiveness does not deny anger but faces it head on.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: If you can't forgive and forget, pick one.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: Forgiving is not forgetting. Forgiving is remembering without pain.
quotes.name: Celia Cruz

quotes.message: Forgiveness unleashes joy. It brings peace. It washes the slate clean. It sets all the highest values of love in motion. In a sense, forgiveness is Christianity at its highest level.
quotes.name: John Macarthur

quotes.message: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what's bitter and move on.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: Not to forgive is to be imprisoned by the past, by old grievances that do not permit life to proceed with new business.
quotes.name: Lance Morrow

quotes.message: Forgiveness is for yourself because it frees you. It lets you out of that prison you put yourself in.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the remission of sins. For it is by this that what has been lost, and was found, is saved from being lost again.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Forgiveness is like faith. You have to keep reviving it.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: The forgiving state of mind is a magnetic power for attracting good. No good thing can be withheld from the forgiving state of mind.
quotes.name: Catherine Ponder

quotes.message: Forgiveness is almost a selfish act because of its immense benefits to the one who forgives.
quotes.name: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: A winner rebukes and forgives. A loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: If you choose to forgive someone who has wronged you rather than to hate that person, you shift the frequency of your Light.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: A fault confessed is half redressed.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: A grudge is a heavy thing to carry.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Charity covers a multitude of sins.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Don't make a mountain out of a molehill.
quotes.name: Henry Ellis

quotes.message: Forgive and forget.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If God were not willing to forgive sin, heaven would be empty.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Let bygones be bygones.
quotes.name: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.message: Record only the sunny hours.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Repay evil with kindness.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Temper justice with mercy.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Learn to recognize good luck when it’s waving at you, hoping to get your attention.
quotes.name: Sally Koslow

quotes.message: Luck is a goddess not to be coerced and forcibly wooed by those who seek her favors.
quotes.name: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.message: Luck is what we make it, not what is thrust upon us. You’ve shown initiative and it has nothing to do with luck.
quotes.name: George Bellairs

quotes.message: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
quotes.name: Ray Kroc

quotes.message: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
quotes.name: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.message: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
quotes.name: Channing Pollock

quotes.message: I’ve always believed in luck. I love the fact that people can change their lives instantly.
quotes.name: Fiona Barton

quotes.message: You don’t get lucky while sitting in the sofa with arms crossed doing nothing. You can be lucky only when you are prepared.
quotes.name: Nesta Jojoe Erskine

quotes.message: Good luck is when opportunity meets preparation, while bad luck is when lack of preparation meets reality.
quotes.name: Eliyahu Goldratt

quotes.message: I’ve found that what most people call luck is often little more than raw talent combined with the ability to make the most of opportunities.
quotes.name: Timothy Zahn

quotes.message: Being deeply learned and skilled, being well trained and using well-spoken words: this is good luck.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The universe works in crazy ways. Your good luck will come in waves, and so does your bad, so you have to take the good with the bad and press forward.
quotes.name: Nick Cummins

quotes.message: You know, in life there are only three or four fundamental decisions to make. The rest is just luck.
quotes.name: Raymond Aubrac

quotes.message: With luck, you have other things to do than wait for lightning to strike.
quotes.name: Paul Lauterbur

quotes.message: Luck is merely an illusion, trusted by the ignorant and chased by the foolish.
quotes.name: Timothy Zahn

quotes.message: You can't just trust to luck; you have to really listen to what that character is telling you.
quotes.name: Estelle Parsons

quotes.message: Luck is the by-product of busting your fanny.
quotes.name: Don Sutton

quotes.message: Luck when your burst of energy doesn't run afoul of someone else's.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Go and wake up your luck.
quotes.name: Persian Saying

quotes.message: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
quotes.name: Larry King

quotes.message: Luck never made a man wise.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: I am great believer in luck. The harder work I work, the more of it I seem to have.
quotes.name: Coleman Cox

quotes.message: I believe in luck: how else can you explain the success of those you dislike?
quotes.name: Jean Cocteau

quotes.message: The thing about luck is that it's like a fever. You can take fever meds and lie in bed and drink chicken broth and sleep seventeen hours in a row, but basically your fever will break when it wants to break.
quotes.name: Cynthia Kadohata

quotes.message: Luck is not only having the best hand dealt to you but having someone to raise.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Luck will occasionally blow some wind into wings that were not made to properly support flight.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Here’s luck!’ while waitin’ for the luck that never comes.
quotes.name: Henry Lawson

quotes.message: We all have bad luck some times, but it mends.
quotes.name: Clarence Michael

quotes.message: So Good-Luck came, and on my roof did light, like noiseless snow, or as the dew of night.
quotes.name: Robert Herrick

quotes.message: The beginner's luck, now don't mess it up if you get too stuck just bluff the beginner's luck is tough.
quotes.name: King Gizzard

quotes.message: The Lord above gave man an arm of iron but, with a little bit of luck, with a little bit of luck
quotes.name: Stanley Holloway

quotes.message: Nobody gives a break when you're down on your luck everybody's on the take.
quotes.name: Thin Lizzy

quotes.message: Some guys have all the luck, all the luck what you gonna do when your luck begins to run.
quotes.name: Robert Palmer

quotes.message: You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from.
quotes.name: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.message: The sun doesn't just hang on one family's tree.
quotes.name: Anchee Min

quotes.message: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: I'm a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I wandered everywhere, through cities and countries wide. And everywhere I went, the world was on my side.
quotes.name: Roman Payne

quotes.message: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
quotes.name: Harry Golden

quotes.message: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
quotes.name: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.message: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Luck is a very thin wire between survival and disaster, and not many people can keep their balance on it.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: The only sure thing about luck is that it will change.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Luck never gives; it only lends.
quotes.name: Swedish Proverb

quotes.message: Luck is what you have left over after you give 100 percent.
quotes.name: Langston Coleman

quotes.message: It's hard to detect good luck - it looks so much like something you've earned.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: People always call it luck when you've acted more sensibly than they have.
quotes.name: Anne Tyler

quotes.message: Luck, good or bad, is the invisible play of mind upon affairs, the effect of mental aptitudes and habits which are not in sight, but which work and bring forth their due issues.
quotes.name: James Vila Blake

quotes.message: What we call luck is the inner man externalized. We make things happen to us.
quotes.name: Robertson Davies

quotes.message: Luck was something you either earned or invented through strength of character. You had to come by it honestly; you could not trick or bluff your way into it.
quotes.name: Patrick Dewitt

quotes.message: When luck is on your side it is not the time to be modest or timid. It is the time to go for the biggest success you can possibly achieve.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: Luck is not chance. It's Toil. Fortune's expensive smile is earned.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Luck affects everything; let your hook always be cast; in the stream where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men.
quotes.name: E.B. White

quotes.message: Luck is the residue of design.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Chance corrects us of many faults that reason would not know how to correct.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Depend on the rabbit's foot if you will, but remember it didn't work for the rabbit.
quotes.name: R. E. Shay

quotes.message: Good luck beats early rising.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: I think luck is the sense to recognize an opportunity and the ability to take advantage of it. The man who can smile at his breaks and grab his chances gets on.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: Nothing happens by chance, my friend... No such thing as luck. A meaning behind every little thing, and such a meaning behind this. Part for you, part for me, may not see it all real clear right now, but we will, before long.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Luck is the idol of the idle.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have got it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.
quotes.name: Garrison Keillor

quotes.message: Luck is tenacity of purpose.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Chance favors the prepared mind.
quotes.name: Louis Pasteur

quotes.message: The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
quotes.name: Edward Gibbon

quotes.message: Ability is of little account without opportunity.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Fortune brings in some boats that are not steered.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: If one does not know to which port is sailing, no wind is favorable.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The amount of good luck coming your way depends on your willingness to act.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: Luck always seems to be against the man who depends on it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Good luck is the willing handmaid of a upright and energetic character, and conscientious observance of duty.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: A lucky man is rarer than a white crow.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Luck generally comes to those who look for it, and my notion is that it taps, once in a lifetime, at everybody's door, but if industry does not open it luck goes away.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Better an ounce of luck than a pound of gold.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: Throw a lucky man in the sea, and he will come up with a fish in his mouth.
quotes.name: Arab Proverb

quotes.message: Luck sometimes visits a fool, but it never sits down with him.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Men have made an idol of luck as an excuse for their own thoughtlessness.
quotes.name: Democritus

quotes.message: The champion makes his own luck.
quotes.name: Red Blaik

quotes.message: Balanced emotions are crucial to intuitive decision making.
quotes.name: Michael D. Eisner

quotes.message: Whenever it comes to decision making, Remember the part about having confidence.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: The key to good decision making is not knowledge... It's whether our work fulfills us.
quotes.name: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.message: Find ways to decentralize. Move decision making authority down and out. Encourage a more entrepreneurial approach.
quotes.name: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.message: The art of good decision making is looking forward to and celebrating the tradeoffs, not pretending they don't exist.
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: We unfortunately live in a corporate world where group decision making is made to avoid failure rather than to achieve success.
quotes.name: Bill Cahan

quotes.message: Most of society's decision making for young people happens without young people, and that could not happen without adultcentrism.
quotes.name: Adam Fletcher

quotes.message: In part because individual judgement is not accurate enough or consistent enough, cognitive diversity is essential to good decision making.
quotes.name: James Surowiecki

quotes.message: Without women's full inclusion at the decision making table, we cannot have any healthy decision making that is good for men and women alike.
quotes.name: Zainab Salbi

quotes.message: Every individual can make a difference ... if we continue to leave decision making to the so-called decision makers, things will never change.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: The key to good decision making is not knowledge. It is understanding. We are swimming in the former. We are desperately lacking in the latter.
quotes.name: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.message: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: The strength of collective decision making and political responsibility is not only a question of recognizing other people's ability. It is also recognizing one's own limitations.
quotes.name: Aruna Roy

quotes.message: Obedience brings peace in decision making. If we have firmly made up our minds to follow the commandments, we will not have to redecide which path to take when temptation comes our way.
quotes.name: James E. Faust

quotes.message: The essence of the phenomenon of gambling is decision making. The act of making a decision consists of selecting one course of action, or strategy, from among the set of admissible strategies.
quotes.name: Richard Arnold Epstein

quotes.message: The major mistake people pursue in decision making is to surround themselves with negatively minded people. People who are going nowhere will never take you anywhere; people who are going everywhere can take you somewhere.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
quotes.name: Michelle Obama

quotes.message: Effective decision-making can be seen as an optimal link between memory of the past, ground-realities of the present and insights of the future.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Decision making and problem solving are not the same. To solve a problem, one needs to find a solution. To make a decision, one needs to make a choice.
quotes.name: Michael J. Marx

quotes.message: Always make decisions that prioritize your inner peace.
quotes.name: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.message: Decision making is an art only until the person understands the science.
quotes.name: Pearl Zhu

quotes.message: Visionary decision-making happens at the intersection of intuition and logic.
quotes.name: Paul O'Brien

quotes.message: The art of decision making includes the art of questioning.
quotes.name: Pearl Zhu

quotes.message: The speed of decision making is the essence of good governance.
quotes.name: Piyush Goyal

quotes.message: Usually, when you make a decision in life, unless you have access to parallel universes, you can't truly judge how right that decision was.
quotes.name: Tibor Fischer

quotes.message: Design is nothing if not decision making.
quotes.name: Henry Petroski

quotes.message: Courage and confidence are what decision making is all about.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: A graphic is never an end in itself; it is a moment in the process of decision making.
quotes.name: Jacques Bertin

quotes.message: One of the major biases in risky decision making is optimism. Optimism is a source of high-risk thinking.
quotes.name: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.message: Decision making in a democracy depends above all on knowledge and not just the intel available to presidents and policymakers.
quotes.name: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.message: Decisions should be based on facts, objectively considered — what I call the fact-founded, thought-through approach to decision making.
quotes.name: Marvin Bower

quotes.message: Understanding the true nature of instinctive decision making requires us to be forgiving of those people trapped in circumstances where good judgment is imperiled.
quotes.name: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.message: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
quotes.name: Sujit Lalwani

quotes.message: Long term thinking and planing enhances short term decision making. Make sure you have a plan of your life in your hand, and that includes the financial plan and your mission.
quotes.name: Manoj Arora

quotes.message: The key to good decision making is evaluating the available information - the data - and combining it with your own estimates of pluses and minuses. As an economist, I do this every day.
quotes.name: Emily Oster

quotes.message: I think one of the major results of the psychology of decision making is that people's attitudes and feelings about losses and gains are really not symmetric. So we really feel more pain when we lose $10,000 than we feel pleasure when we get $10,000.
quotes.name: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.message: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: So, do it. Decide. Is this the life you want to live? Is this the person you want to love? Is this the best you can be? Can you be stronger? Kinder? More compassionate? Decide. Breathe in. Breathe out & decide.
quotes.name: Meredith Grey

quotes.message: I don't want other people to decide what I am. I want to decide that for myself.
quotes.name: Emma Watson

quotes.message: If you don't make a choice, life makes it for you and then you're stuck with what it decides. Take control of your destiny so that doesn't happen.
quotes.name: Steward Stafford

quotes.message: Decide. Take one of the most unsettling things you feel exist in your life and decide. Decide to meet it with love and understanding. Decide to meet it with a proactive spirit that believes that a solution, an ease, a peaceful resolve rests in the meeting.
quotes.name: David Ault

quotes.message: Think a hundred times before you take a decision, but once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.message: Every decision brings with it some good, some bad, some lessons, and some luck. The only thing that’s for sure is that indecision steals many years from many people who wind up wishing they’d just had the courage to leap.
quotes.name: Doe Zantamata

quotes.message: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.name: Maimonides

quotes.message: Decision is a sharp knife that cuts clean and straight; indecision, a dull one that hacks and tears and leaves ragged edges behind it.
quotes.name: Gordon Graham

quotes.message: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
quotes.name: Thomas Huxley

quotes.message: Do not plant your dreams in the field of indecision, where nothing ever grows but the weeds of 'what-if.
quotes.name: Dodinsky

quotes.message: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
quotes.name: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: In order to get what you want, you must first decide what you want. Most people really foul up at this crucial first step because they simply can't see how it's possible to get what they want, so they don't even let themselves want it.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: It doesn’t matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Nothing happens until you decide. Make a decision and watch your life move forward.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Nothing is more difficult, and therefore more precious, than to be able to decide.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Seize what's been handed you. Make smart decisions. Make decisions because life is a temporary situation.
quotes.name: James Patterson

quotes.message: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
quotes.name: Ben Stein

quotes.message: To be passive is to let others decide for you. To be aggressive is to decide for others. To be assertive is to decide for yourself. And to trust that there is enough, that you are enough.
quotes.name: Edith Eva Eger

quotes.message: There is only one way to make your dream a reality: make the decision and then not change it.
quotes.name: Dragos Bratasanu

quotes.message: Be decisive. A wrong decision is generally less disastrous than indecision.
quotes.name: Bernhard Langer

quotes.message: On the plains of hesitation bleach the bones of countless millions who, at the dawn of decision, sat down to wait, and waiting died.
quotes.name: George W. Cecil

quotes.message: Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.
quotes.name: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.message: If you obsess over whether you are making the right decision, you are basically assuming that the universe will reward you for one thing and punish you for another. The universe has no fixed agenda. Once you make any decision, it works around that decision. There is no right or wrong, only a series of possibilities that shift with each thought, feeling, and action that you experience. If this sounds too mystical, refer again to the body. Every significant vital sign—body temperature, heart rate, oxygen consumption, hormone level, brain activity, and so on—alters the moment you decide to do anything… decisions are signals telling your body, mind, and environment to move in a certain direction.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: On an important decision one rarely has 100% of the information needed for a good decision no matter how much one spends or how long one waits. And, if one waits too long, he has a different problem and has to start all over. This is the terrible dilemma of the hesitant decision maker.
quotes.name: Robert K. Greenleaf

quotes.message: When you're my age, you'll see that it is wiser to make your own decisions than let time make decisions for you.
quotes.name: Charles Finch

quotes.message: Make your own decision, based on your deepest intuitive wisdom and knowledge. You may make the right decision or the wrong one, but whatever happens, it is your best shot, and you will strengthen your capacity for future action.
quotes.name: David Deida

quotes.message: To decide is to walk facing forward with nary a crick in your neck from looking back at the crossroads.
quotes.name: Betsy Cañas Garmon

quotes.message: Decision making is easy when your values are clear.
quotes.name: Roy Disney

quotes.message: One good decision can totally change the trajectory of our lives. And that one good decision will lead to better decisions. But it starts by making the right decision when no one is looking.
quotes.name: Mark Batterson

quotes.message: I've learned that whenever I decide something with an open heart, I usually make the right decision.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: To decide is to make peace within and let the chips fall where they may.
quotes.name: Lisa Tabak

quotes.message: Decisiveness is a characteristic of high-performing men and women. Almost any decision is better than no decision at all.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: I've asked myself what is the worst thing that can happen if I take this decision and go along with it. Very often, I find that the worst thing that can happen is something that I can live with. And if that's the case, I will do it.
quotes.name: Margrethe Vestager

quotes.message: A wise person decides slowly but abides by these decisions.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires a great deal of strength to decide what to do.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.name: H. L. Hunt

quotes.message: Decisions become easier when your will to please God outweighs your will to please the world.
quotes.name: Anso Coetzer

quotes.message: Life is the sum of all your choices.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: A PSYCHOLOGICAL TIP: Whenever you're called on to make up your mind, . and you're hampered by not having any, . the best way to solve the dilemma, you'll find, . is simply by spinning a penny. . No — not so that chance shall decide the affair . while you're passively standing there moping; . but the moment the penny is up in the air, . you suddenly know what you're hoping.
quotes.name: Piet Hein

quotes.message: You can try to make the right decision all the time, but it's better to just make a decision. I have done wrong so many times, but nine times out of 10, I have learned from my failure. Don't wait for something; just go for it.
quotes.name: Bobby Bones

quotes.message: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You’re on your own. And you know what you know. You are the guy who’ll decide where to go.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: It is not your talents that make you great, but your decisions.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Not to decide…is to decide.
quotes.name: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.message: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
quotes.name: Michelle Obama

quotes.message: The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live.
quotes.name: Flora Whittemore

quotes.message: Some persons are very decisive when it comes to avoiding decisions.
quotes.name: Brendan Francis

quotes.message: Everything is something you decide to do, and there is nothing you have to do.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: In order to decide, judge; in order to judge, reason; in order to reason, decide (what to reason about).
quotes.name: Philip Johnson-Laird

quotes.message: When there aren’t any smart decisions, I suppose you just have to pick the stupid decision you like best.
quotes.name: Orson Scott Card

quotes.message: Who we are in the present includes who we were in the past.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: There is one single thread binding my way together the way of the Master consists in doing one's best that is all
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: They must often change who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Be the change you want to see in this world.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
quotes.name: Maurice Young

quotes.message: Live with fulfillment, serve with passion so in this lifetime you will have the ablility to die with no regrets.
quotes.name: Randy Gonzales

quotes.message: Everybody wants to be somebody; nobody wants to grow.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: What we think, we become.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I am always doing that which I can not do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: What ever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: What the society thinks is of no interest to me. All that's important is how I see myself. I know who who I am. I know the value of my work.
quotes.name: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.message: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: A man's true delight is to do the things he was made for.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: What we fear of doing most is usually what we most need to do.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: In a very real sense we have two minds, one that thinks and one that feels.
quotes.name: Daniel Goleman

quotes.message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Change and growth take place when a person has risked himself and dares to become involved with experimenting with his own life.
quotes.name: Herbert Otto

quotes.message: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Being bridled, or yielding obediently to restraint, is necessary for our personal growth and progression.
quotes.name: James E. Faust

quotes.message: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Life is never incomplete if it is an honorable one. At whatever point you leave life, if you leave it in the right way, it is whole.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Know who you are, and be it.
quotes.name: Carroll Bryant

quotes.message: Knowledge planted in truth grows in truth. Strength born of peace loses nothing to hate.
quotes.name: Aberjhani

quotes.message: We cannot consume our way into personal growth. Yet, millions of us have bought into this cynical concept of faux identity.
quotes.name: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.message: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: We must become the change we want to see.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: For my own personal growth I had to set out on my own.
quotes.name: Frank Press

quotes.message: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.name: Fredrick Nietzsche

quotes.message: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbour. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Your inner strength is your outer foundation.
quotes.name: Allan Rufus

quotes.message: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Sometimes I attract roles that are necessary either for personal growth or enlightenment.
quotes.name: Vera Farmiga

quotes.message: There are times when I am so unlike myself that I might be taken for someone else of an entirely opposite character.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: Absorb what is useful, Discard what is not, Add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: In our struggle for freedom, truth is the only weapon we possess.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: If pain doesn't lead to humility, you have wasted your suffering.
quotes.name: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.message: Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Any ideas, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.name: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Exert your talents, and distinguish yourself, and don't think of retiring from the world, until the world will be sorry that you retire.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The only journey is the journey within.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: Taxes on consumption, like those on capital or income, to be just, must be uniform.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Taxes, well laid and well spent, insure domestic tranquility, provide for the common defense, and promote the general welfare. Taxes protect property and the environment; taxes make business possible. Taxes pay for roads and schools and bridges and police and teachers. Taxes pay for doctors and nursing homes and medicine.
quotes.name: Jill Lepore

quotes.message: Taxes are like and unlike the rain, they fall upon the just and the unjust; most hardly upon the just because they will not resort to devious ways to escape the imposition.
quotes.name: Paul Carus

quotes.message: Collecting more taxes than is absolutely necessary is legalized robbery.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Taxes on capital, taxes on labor, inflation, bureaucratic regulation, minimum wage laws, are all - to different degrees - unnecessary slices of the wedge that stand between an individual's effort and reward for that effort.
quotes.name: Jack Kemp

quotes.message: The payment of taxes gives a right to protection.
quotes.name: James M. Wayne

quotes.message: Taxes are nothing but a game of pick pocket.
quotes.name: Joseph Bonkowski

quotes.message: Taxes are way too complicated, and people spend way too much time worrying about ways to get them lower.
quotes.name: Steve Mnuchin

quotes.message: Taxes grow without rain.
quotes.name: Jewish Proverb

quotes.message: Taxes are like hot potatoes that get passed around. The poor man who does not pay for water at home may pay for it when he buys coffee downtown, where tax-paying businesses pass the cost on to consumers.
quotes.name: K. Filip Palda

quotes.message: Like mothers, taxes are often misunderstood, but seldom forgotten.
quotes.name: Lord Bramwell

quotes.message: Taxes are collected by governments in order to finance their expenditures and also for purposes of stabilization, distribution and allocation. Particular taxes may cause changes in people's behaviour and have an impact on aggregate demand that, therefore, influences the level of economic activity. Taxes are the instruments through which governments redistribute income and wealth and, moreover, they are an integral part of a government's fiscal policy as they are used to stabilize aggregate demand.
quotes.name: Nikolaos Karagiannis

quotes.message: Taxes are paid in the sweat of every man who labors.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Taxes are the lifeblood of government and no taxpayer should be permitted to escape the payment of his just share of the burden of contributing thereto.
quotes.name: Arthur Vanderbilt

quotes.message: Tax reform is taking the taxes off things that have been taxed in the past and putting taxes on things that haven't been taxed before.
quotes.name: Art Buchwald

quotes.message: Taxes are never popular.
quotes.name: Luis Videgaray Caso

quotes.message: Taxes are just too high - that's obviously a priority.
quotes.name: Scott Garrett

quotes.message: Taxes are simply contributions demanded of citizens as their share of the expenses of government.
quotes.name: Paul Leroy

quotes.message: Taxes are not levied for the benefit of the taxed.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Taxes are how we pool our money for public health and safety, infrastructure, research, and services--from the development of vaccines and the Internet to public schools and universities, transportation, courts, police, parks, and safe drinking water.
quotes.name: Holly Sklar

quotes.message: Taxes are what we pay for civilized society, for modernity, and for prosperity. The wealthy pay more because they have benefitted more.
quotes.name: Jill Lepore

quotes.message: Taxes are like a double chain which by keeping the peasants in the commune where they were born, fixes them still to the soil; though they are no longer, by law, attached to their master, they are always, by law, attached to each other.
quotes.name: Joseph Wilbois

quotes.message: In theory, taxes should be like shopping. What I buy is government services. What I pay are my taxes.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Taxation is the price which civilized communities pay for the opportunity of remaining civilized.
quotes.name: Albert Bushnell Hart

quotes.message: Taxes, after all, are dues that we pay for the privileges of membership in an organized society.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: Taxes are like the wheat poured into the public hopper; rent, in whatever form, may be described as the flour that comes from the public mill. The privileged man, who is allowed to carry off the grist, eats his bread, as it were, at the taxpayer's expense.
quotes.name: Charles Bowdoin Fillebrown

quotes.message: Any tax is a discouragement and therefore a regulation so far as it goes.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.message: Tax is never a stand alone issue. Tax is what you collect from the prosperity of the people, so if businesses are not thriving and individuals have no income, there is nothing to call tax.
quotes.name: Taiwo Oyedele

quotes.message: Taxes are the chief business of a conqueror of the world.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The power of taxing people and their property is essential to the very existence of government.
quotes.name: James Madison

quotes.message: In the midst of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: We all have the strength to endure the misfortunes of others.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Without the strength to endure the crisis, one will not see the opportunity within. It is within the process of endurance that opportunity reveals itself.
quotes.name: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.message: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: To learn strong faith is to endure great trials. I have learned my faith by standing firm amid severe testings.
quotes.name: George Mueller

quotes.message: It is more difficult to stay on top than to get there.
quotes.name: Mia Hamm

quotes.message: Endurance pierces marble.
quotes.name: Moroccan Proverb

quotes.message: Life asks not merely what you can do; it asks how much can you endure and not be spoiled.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: It is the nature of the strong heart, that like the palm tree it strives ever upwards when it is most burdened.
quotes.name: Philip Sidney

quotes.message: If you're going to go through hell... I suggest you come back learning something.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: To struggle when hope is banished! To live when life's salt is gone! To dwell in a dream that's vanished.
quotes.name: Ben Jonson

quotes.message: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Children's talent to endure stems from their ignorance of alternatives.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Endurance is not a young person's game. I thought I might even be better at 60 than I was at 30. You have a body that's almost as strong, but you have a much better mind.
quotes.name: Diana Nyad

quotes.message: Solitude, isolation, are painful things and beyond human endurance.
quotes.name: Jules Verne

quotes.message: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
quotes.name: Virgil

quotes.message: At the end of the day it's about how much you can bear, how much you can endure. Being together, we harm nobody; being apart, we extinguish ourselves.
quotes.name: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.message: People have to learn sometimes not only how much the heart, but how much the head, can bear.
quotes.name: Maria Mitchell

quotes.message: I learned from the example of my father that the manner in which one endures what must be endured is more important than the thing that must be endured.
quotes.name: Dean Acheson

quotes.message: To be or not to be isn't the question. The question is how to prolong being.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: Yes, as my swift days near their goal, 'Tis all that I implore: in life and death a chainless soul with courage to endure.
quotes.name: Emity Bronte

quotes.message: All philosophy lies in two words, sustain and abstain.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Those who can bear all can dare all.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: Life is not a PG feel-good movie. Real life often ends badly. Literature tries to document this reality, while showing us it is still possible for us to endure nobly.
quotes.name: Matthew Quick

quotes.message: No matter how much falls on us, we keep plowing ahead. That's the only way to keep the roads clear.
quotes.name: Greg Kincaid

quotes.message: Life was not longer something to endure, but to live.
quotes.name: Hubert Selby Jr.

quotes.message: Unless you have courage, a courage that keeps you going, always going, no matter what happens, there is no certainty of success. It is really an endurance race.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: The bird that flutters least is longest on the wing.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: He conquers who endures.
quotes.name: Persius

quotes.message: If God sends us on strong paths, we are provided strong shoes.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Nothing happens to any man that he is not formed by nature to bear.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Don't fear the gods. Don't worry about death; What is good is easy to get, and what is terrible is easy to endure.
quotes.name: Epicurus

quotes.message: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.
quotes.name: Virgil

quotes.message: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: For to be poised against fatality, to meet adverse conditions gracefully, is more than simple endurance; it is an act of aggression, a positive triumph.
quotes.name: Thomas Mann

quotes.message: Find out what you're afraid of and go live there.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: Endurance is patience concentrated.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Not in achievement, but in endurance, of the human soul, does it show its divine grandeur and its alliance with the infinite.
quotes.name: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.message: A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on. Ideas have endurance without death.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: The limits of tyrants are prescribed by the endurance of those whom they oppress.
quotes.name: Frederick Douglass

quotes.message: If you can learn to endure pain, you can survive anything. Some people learn to embrace it- to love it. Some endure it through drowning it in sorrow, or by making themselves forget. Others turn it into anger.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.message: No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.
quotes.name: David Hume

quotes.message: If you are losing faith in human nature, go out and watch a marathon.
quotes.name: Kathrine Switzer

quotes.message: In the darkest hour the soul is replenished and given strength to continue and endure.
quotes.name: Heart Warrior Chosa

quotes.message: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue; courage is only the second virtue.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Don't speak evil of someone if you don't know for certain, and if you do know ask yourself, why am I telling it?
quotes.name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.message: The things most people want to know about are usually none of their business.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Fire and swords are slow engines of destruction, compared to the tongue of a Gossip.
quotes.name: Sir Richard Steele

quotes.message: Gossip is a sort of smoke that comes from the dirty tobacco-pipes of those who diffuse it: it proves nothing but the bad taste of the smoker.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: And all who told it added something new, And all who heard it made enlargements too.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: The only time people dislike gossip is when you gossip about them.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Gossip is what no one claims to like, but everybody enjoys.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: Gossiping and lying go hand in hand.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Whoever gossips to you will gossip about you.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Lettin' the cat outta the bag is a whole lot easier 'n puttin' it back in.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Count not him among your friends who will retail your privacies to the world.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Loose tongues are worse than wicked hands.
quotes.name: Jewish Proverb

quotes.message: What you don't see with your eyes, don't witness with your mouth.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: Gossip needn't be false to be evil - there's a lot of truth that shouldn't be passed around.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: Gossip about a person and his shadow will appear.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: How awful to reflect that what people say of us is true!
quotes.name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.message: When of a gossiping circle it was asked, What are they doing? The answer was, Swapping lies.
quotes.name: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.message: Conversation is three women stand on the corner talking. Gossip is when one of them leaves.
quotes.name: Herb Shriner

quotes.message: Who speaks ill of others to you will speak ill of you to others.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: There are a terrible lot of lies going about the world, and the worst of it is that half of them are true.
quotes.name: Winston Churchil

quotes.message: Gossip needs no carriage.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: He gossips habitually; he lacks the common wisdom to keep still that deadly enemy of man, his own tongue.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Gossip is sometimes referred to as halitosis of the mind.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Of every ten persons who talk about you, nine will say something bad, and the tenth will say something good in a bad way.
quotes.name: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.message: Your friend has a friend, and your friend's friend has another friend so know when to keep quiet.
quotes.name: Jewish Proverb

quotes.message: If someone cannot even keep his own secrets, don't count on him to keep someone else's.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Alas! they had been friends in youth; but whispering tongues can poison truth.
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.message: A great relationship doesn't happen because of the love you had in the beginning, but how well you continue building love until the end.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A great relationship is about two things, first, find out the similarities, second, respect the differences.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A healthy relationship is built on unwavering trust.
quotes.name: Beau Mirchoff

quotes.message: A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out you do not go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A relationship is like a rose. How long it lasts, no one knows. Love can erase an awful past, love can be yours, you'll see at last. To feel that love, it makes you sigh. To have it leave, you'd rather die. You hope you've found that special rose, cause you love and care for the one you choose.
quotes.name: Cella

quotes.message: A relationship is lovely if you're happy, comfortable in it and you really like the person. I can think of nothing better. But there's nothing worse than having a relationship in which you feel no interest.
quotes.name: Susannah York

quotes.message: A relationship, I think, is like a shark. You know? It has to constantly move forward or it dies. And I think what we got on our hands is a dead shark.
quotes.name: Woody Allen Annie Hall

quotes.message: A true relationship is when you can tell each other anything and everything. No secrets and no lies.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: All relationships have one law. Never make the one you love feel alone, especially when you're there.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: An intimate relationship does not banish loneliness. Only when we are comfortable with who we are can we truly function independently in a healthy way, can we truly function in a relationship. Two halves do not make a whole when it comes to a healthy relationship. It takes two wholes.
quotes.name: Patricia Fry

quotes.message: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.name: Henry Winkler

quotes.message: Before we can have a successful relationship with anyone, we first need a perfect personal relationship.
quotes.name: Russ Von Hoelscher

quotes.message: Don't settle for a relationship that prevents you from being yourself.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.name: Mike Murdock

quotes.message: Eighty percent of life's satisfaction comes from meaningful relationships.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Every good relationship, especially marriage, is based on respect. If it's not based on respect, nothing that appears to be good will last very long.
quotes.name: Amy Grant

quotes.message: Human relationships always help us to carry on because they always presuppose further developments, a future - and also because we live as if our only task was precisely to have relationships with other people
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: I refuse to let my past relationships make me bitter.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: If a relationship is to evolve it must go through a series of endings.
quotes.name: Lisa Moriyama

quotes.message: In a relationship each person should support the other; they should lift each other up.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: In a relationship if you are giving and getting nothing back in return, stop giving so much, and spend time being. Give to yourself, be who you are.
quotes.name: Brenda Shoshanna

quotes.message: In reality, the only way a relationship will last is if you see your relationship as a place that you go to give, and not a place that you go to take.

quotes.message: No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: Our greatest joy and our greatest pain comes in our relationships with others
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement...all success... all achievement in real life grows.
quotes.name: Ben Stein

quotes.message: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Relationship is an art. The dream that two people create is more difficult to master than one.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Relationships are always stronger when you are best friends first and a couple second.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Relationships aren't designed for selfish individuals.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: Relationships may end in tears but no matter how many times we cry, we still end up on the same path all over again.

quotes.message: Relationships, marriages are ruined where one person continues to learn, develop and grow and the other person stands still.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Some of the biggest challenges in relationships come from the fact that most people enter a relationship in order to get something: they're trying to find someone who's going to make them feel good.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Sooner or later, we must all accept the fact that in a relationship, the only person you are dealing with is yourself.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: The best relationship is the one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The best relationship is when you two can act like lovers and best friends at the same time. It's when you have more playful moments than serious moments. It's when you can joke around, have unexpected hugs, and random stolen kisses. It's when you two give each other that specific stare and just smile. It's when you'll rather chill inside to watch movies, eat junk food, and cuddle than go out all the time. It's when you'll stay up all night just to settle your arguments and problems. It's when you can completely act yourself and they can still love you for who you are.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The most important ingredient we put into any relationship is not what we say or what we do, but what we are.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: The people we are in relationship with are always a mirror, reflecting our own beliefs, and simultaneously we are mirrors, reflecting their beliefs. So... relationship is one of the most powerful tools for growth...If we look honestly at our relationships, we can see so much about how we have created them.
quotes.name: Shakti Gawain

quotes.message: The purpose of a relationship is not to have another who might complete you, but to have another with whom you might share your completeness.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: The purpose of relationship is not to have another who might complete you, but to have another with whom you might share your completeness.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: The strongest relationships are between two people who can live without each other but don't want to.
quotes.name: Harriet Lerner

quotes.message: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but hold hands
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Three things I want in a relationship: Eyes that won't cry, lips that won't lie, and love that won't die.
quotes.name: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.message: We are born in relationship, we are wounded in relationship, and we can be healed in relationship.
quotes.name: Dr. Harville Hendrix

quotes.message: When both people in a relationship get their needs, met, then that relationship is going to be successful.
quotes.name: Dr. Phil McGraw,

quotes.message: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: People die, I think, but your relationship with them doesn't. It continues and is ever-changing.
quotes.name: Jandy Neslon

quotes.message: The most important relationship in your life is the relationship you have with yourself. Because no matter what happens, you will always be with yourself.

quotes.message: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.

quotes.message: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.

quotes.message: It's hard to communicate anything exactly and that's why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find.

quotes.message: We have to recognize that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty unless there is love, patience, persistence.

quotes.message: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.

quotes.message: I don't need a man to rectify my existence. The most profound relationship we'll ever have is the one with ourselves.
