quotes.message: If you're really a mean person you're going to come back as a fly and eat poop.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: Don't waste time on revenge. The people who hurt you will eventually face their own karma.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: If you give a good thing to the world, then over time your karma will be good, and you'll receive good.
quotes.name: Russell Simmons

quotes.message: Ancestral karma is not something that is permanently ingrained; with conscientious effort it can be modified and healed. It only requires you to be proactive and intentional in your efforts to heal.
quotes.name: Dr. Steven Farmer

quotes.message: Karma bides it's time. You will always have to watch out. Karma is unforgiving and always gets payback.
quotes.name: Benjamin Bayani

quotes.message: You cannot do harm to someone because someone has done harm to you. You will pay just like they will.
quotes.name: Ericka Williams

quotes.message: No need for revenge. Just sit back and wait. Those who hurt you will eventually screw up themselves and if you're lucky, God will let you watch.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Every action has equal and opposite reaction. This is law of the universe and spares none. Wrong done and injustice inflicted is paid back in the same coin. No one has escaped justice of the universe. It is only a matter of time.
quotes.name: Anil Sinha

quotes.message: Nobody deserves misery but sometimes it's just your turn.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is when you throw a banana in Mario Kart and you end up slipping on it.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Most times, how you treat your children is how they grow up to treat you.
quotes.name: Terry Mark

quotes.message: Don't envy those who make their wealth in an ungodly way. The wicked seem to prosper now and live without care but they will spend their eternity in terror and despair.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Whatever you give to life, it gives you back. Do not hate anybody. The hatred which comes out from you will someday come back to you. Love others. And love will comeback to you.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma has a surprising way of taking care of situations. All you have to do is to sit back and watch.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is like a boomerang, whatever you give out... will come back to you.
quotes.name: Rashida Rowe

quotes.message: The ones you judge today, may be the judgments you endure tomorrow.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Remember the unkindness, dishonesty, and deception you display toward others...dont be shocked when it comes back to bite you.
quotes.name: Sarah Moore

quotes.message: Every act done, no matter how insignificant, will eventually return to the doer with equal impact. Good will be returned with good; evil with evil.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Nature runs a restuarant called Karma. It's a place where there is no need to place any order. You are autimatically served what you deserve.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is not just about the troubles, but also about surmounting them.
quotes.name: Rick Springfield

quotes.message: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give wheter it's bad or good.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: Karma is the universe's way of letting you know that you just thought you got away with it.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: My actions are my only true belongings. I cannot escape the consequences of my actions. My actions are the ground upon which I stand.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Forgive the person and their actions, never give in to hate. Let it go, set it free, and karma will take care of what is meant to be.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Someone should have mentioned to him that karma was a venomous witch.
quotes.name: Courtney Cole

quotes.message: Like gravity, karma is so basic we often don't even notice it.
quotes.name: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.message: If justice is denied, let the law of karma take the ride. Nothing in this world is done without a price.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma has no problem getting back in touch with you when need be.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: When karma comes back to punch you in the face, I wanna be there just in case it needs help.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma, simply put, is an action for an action, good or bad.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: You are free to choose, but you are not free from the consequence of your choice.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Revenge will never solve anything, karma will.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: What goes around comes back around.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Do good and good will follow you.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Great Karma additionally interprets into great well being. At the point when an individual has a cheerful and delighted viewpoint in life, this will just add to the wellbeing of his or her wellbeing condition.
quotes.name: Emma Robertson

quotes.message: The results of karma, whether good or bad, may not manifest right away. In may happen in the same lifetime or in a future life. We may even receive both positive and negative reactions at the same time.
quotes.name: Benjawan Poomsan

quotes.message: Karma is intertwined in the fabric of our life, and training ourselves to be aware of this can transform how we live. We become more mindful and thoughtful, making choices with care, understanding that our past actions, present experiences, and future circumstances originate in our minds.
quotes.name: Thubten Chodron

quotes.message: Love your neighbor, even the ones who do not show you the same courtesy.
quotes.name: Alexandra Elle

quotes.message: If your actions were to boomerang back on you instantly, would you still act the same?
quotes.name: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.message: You cannot control the results, only your actions.
quotes.name: Allan Lokos

quotes.message: I believe in fate and I believe that things happen for a reason but I don't think that there's a high power, necessarily. I believe in karma very much though.
quotes.name: Amy Winehouse

quotes.message: Sooner or later in life, we will all take our own turn being in the position we once had someone else in.
quotes.name: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.message: But this was what happened when you didn’t want to visit and confront the past: the past starts visiting and confronting you.
quotes.name: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.message: When you see a good person, think of becoming like her.him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Even if things don't unfold the way you expected, don't be disheartened or give up. One who continues to advance will win in the end.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Life is painful. It has thorns, like the stem of a rose. Culture and art are the roses that bloom on the stem. The flower is yourself, your humanity. Art is the liberation of the humanity inside yourself.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Dangerous consequences will follow when politicians and rulers forget moral principles.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Not only is there often a right and wrong, but what goes around does come around, Karma exists.
quotes.name: Dr Ken Baker

quotes.message: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at this moment.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: This is your karma. You do not understand now, but you will understand later.
quotes.name: H. Raven Rose

quotes.message: Even chance meetings are the result of karma… Things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: A boomerang returns back to the person who throws it.
quotes.name: James C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Is Fate getting what you deserve, or deserving what you get?
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: If you send out goodness from yourself, or if you share that which is happy or good within you, it will all come back to you multiplied ten thousand times. In the kingdom of love there is no competition; there is no possessiveness or control. The more love you give away, the more love you will have.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Some day people will ask me what is the key to my success…and I will simply say, “Good Karma.
quotes.name: K. Crumley

quotes.message: But, mark my words; someday she’ll get what’s coming to her.
quotes.name: Kathleen Brooks

quotes.message: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that’s all you’re going to get back.
quotes.name: Kesha

quotes.message: When you plant a seed of love, it is you that blossoms.
quotes.name: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quotes.message: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
quotes.name: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quotes.message: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Dear Karma, I really hate you right now, you made your point.
quotes.name: Ottilie Weber

quotes.message: Strange things conspire when one tries to cheat fate.
quotes.name: Rick Riordan

quotes.message: Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another.
quotes.name: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.message: Contrary to popular misconception, karma has nothing to do with punishment and reward. It exists as part of our holographic universe’s binary or dualistic operating system only to teach us responsibility for our creations – and all things we experience are our creations.
quotes.name: Sol Luckman

quotes.message: I want revenge, but I don’t want to screw up my karma.
quotes.name: Susane Colasanti

quotes.message: Manipulation, fueled with good intent, can be a blessing. But when used wickedly, it is the beginning of a magician's karmic calamity.
quotes.name: T.F. Hodge

quotes.message: I’m a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it’s bad or good.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: Guilt is also a way for us to express to others that we are a person of good conscience.
quotes.name: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.message: Guilt is a useless feeling. It's never enough to make you change direction--only enough to make you useless.
quotes.name: Daniel Nayeri

quotes.message: Guilt is a destructive and ultimately pointless emotion.
quotes.name: Lynn Crilly

quotes.message: No guilt is forgotten so long as the conscience still knows of it.
quotes.name: Stefan Zweig

quotes.message: Every man is guilty of all the good he didn't do.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Guilt is the very nerve of sorrow.
quotes.name: Horace Bushnell

quotes.message: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Guilt is the price we pay willingly for doing what we are going to do anyway.
quotes.name: Isabelle Holland

quotes.message: Guilt is a rope that wears thin.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Successful guilt is the bane of society.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before accusation.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Guilt: the gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Guilt is to danger, what fire is to gunpowder; a man need not fear to walk among many barrels of powder, if he have no fire about him.
quotes.name: John Flavel

quotes.message: He that is conscious of guilt cannot bear the innocence of others: So they will try to reduce all others to their own level.
quotes.name: Charles James Fox

quotes.message: Guilt alone, like brain-sick frenzy in its feverish mood, fills the light air with visionary terrors, and shapeless forms of fear.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: Guilt upon the conscience, like rust upon iron, both defiles and consumes it, gnawing and creeping into it, as that does which at last eats out the very heart and substance of the metal.
quotes.name: Bishop Robert South

quotes.message: Guilt is always hungry, don't let it consume you.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Guilt is oftentimes the strongest witness against itself.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: The guilt you feel finally comes to an end when you fully express how it came into your consciousness.
quotes.name: Luke Garne

quotes.message: Guilt is the sum total of: All the negative feelings we have ever had about ourselves! Any form of self-hatred, self-rejection, feelings of worthlessness, sinfulness, inferiority, incompetence, failure, or emptiness. The feeling that there are things in us that are lacking or missing or incomplete.
quotes.name: Ken Wapnick

quotes.message: What is guilt? It is moral self-reproach--I did wrong when it was possible to have done otherwise.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.message: Make friends with guilt. Guilt is a beautiful emotion that alerts us when something is wrong so that we may achieve peace with our conscience. Without conscience there would be no morality. So we can greet guilt cordially and with acceptance, just as we do all other emotions. After we respond to guilt, it has done its job and we can release it.
quotes.name: Glenn R. Schiraldi

quotes.message: Guilt hath very quick ears to an accusation.
quotes.name: Henry Fielding

quotes.message: Guilt is something small people feel when they run out of excuses for their behavior.
quotes.name: Gaius Baltar

quotes.message: Repentant tears wash out the stain of guilt.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Guilt: punishing yourself before God doesn't.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Guilt is ever at a loss, and confusion waits upon it; when innocence and bold truth are always ready for expression.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: Where guilt is, rage and courage doth abound.
quotes.name: Ben Jonson

quotes.message: Guilt is an indulgence, it entangles you in the past.
quotes.name: Gregg Hurwitz

quotes.message: Guilt once harbored in the conscious breast, intimidates the brave, degrades the great.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Guilt has always its horrors and solicitudes; and, to make it yet more shameful and detestable, it is doomed often to stand in awe of those to whom nothing could give influence or weight but their power of betraying.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Guilt is a poor, helpless, dependent being. Without the alliance of able, diligent, and let me add, fortunate fraud, it is inevitably undone. If the guilty culprit be obstinately silent, it forms a deadly presumption against him; if he speaks, talking tends only to his discovery, and his very defence often furnishes the materials for his conviction.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: Guilt was never a rational thing; it distorts all the faculties of the human mind, it perverts them, it leaves a man no longer in the free use of his reason, it puts him into confusion.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: People incapable of guilt usually do have a good time.
quotes.name: Rust Cohle

quotes.message: The guilty think all talk is of themselves.
quotes.name: Chaucer

quotes.message: Guilt is abscent when the act is justified.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Guilt is anything you did and fear others to know about.
quotes.name: Mohammad

quotes.message: Guilt is the source of sorrows, the avenging fiend that follows us behind with whips and stings.
quotes.name: Nicholas Rowe

quotes.message: There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you're useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
quotes.name: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.message: You're making yourself too important. Guilt comes from feeling we're at the center of the universe. We're not.
quotes.name: Gloria Whelan

quotes.message: Guilt's just your ego's way of tricking you into thinking that you're making moral progress. Don't fall for it, my dear.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Like hatred, guilt can't be locked in the silence of forgetting, without taking part of your soul with it.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: You won't be free from guilt if you are constantly replaying the negative memories of your past.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Releasing guilt is like removing a huge weight from your shoulders. Guilt is released through the empowering thought of love and respect for yourself. Let go of standards of perfection and refuse to use up the precious currency of your life, the now, with thoughts that continue to frustrate and weaken you. Instead, vow to be better than you used to be, which is the true test of nobility.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Guilt is a lazy feeling that takes no action; the wings of integrity are the only thing that sets it free.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Guilt can interfere with our desires to move forward, to heal properly and to become a person who has the mental health and means of proper recompense.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Guilt is a waste of time unless you learn how to be more loving the next time a similar situation presents itself.
quotes.name: Annette Vaillancourt

quotes.message: Guilt is a manifestation of condemnation or aversion towards oneself, which does not understand the changing transformative quality of mind.
quotes.name: Joseph Goldstein

quotes.message: Guilt is really self- condemnation and self-invalidation of our worth and value as a human being.
quotes.name: David R. Hawkins

quotes.message: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
quotes.name: George Sewell

quotes.message: There is no greater guilt than discontentment.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: So full of artless jealousy is guilt, . It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The only art her guilt to cover, . To hide her shame from every eye, . To give repentance to her lover, . And wring his bosom, is — to die.
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: By the sympathy of your human hearts for sin ye shall scent out all the places — whether in church, bedchamber, street.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: What is our innocence, . what is our guilt? All are . naked, none is safe.
quotes.name: Marianne Moore

quotes.message: Remorse sleeps during a prosperous period but wakes up in adversity.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: But, R - e - m - o - r - s - e! . The water-wagon is the place for me; . . . . It is no time for mirth and laughter, .
quotes.name: George Ade

quotes.message: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.name: Amanda Cross

quotes.message: Of all means to regeneration Remorse is surely the most wasteful. It cuts away healthy tissue with the poisoned. It is a knife that probes far deeper than the evil.
quotes.name: E.M. Forster

quotes.message: True guilt is guilt at the obligation one owes to oneself to be oneself. False guilt is guilt felt at not being what other people feel one ought to be or assume that one is.
quotes.name: R. D. Laing

quotes.message: Guilt feelings so often arise from accusations rather than from crimes.
quotes.name: Iris Murdoch

quotes.message: Here’s the smell of the blood still: all the perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little hand.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: What hangs people ... is the unfortunate circumstance of guilt.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: If something makes you cry, you have to do something about it. That’s the difference between politics and guilt.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: I have many regrets, and I’m sure everyone does. The stupid things you do, you regret if you have any sense, and if you don’t regret them, maybe you’re stupid.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: O conscience, upright and stainless, how bitter a sting to thee is a little fault!
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: There is only one way to achieve happiness on this terrestrial ball, and that is to have either a clear conscience or none at all.
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.name: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.message: When lovely woman stoops to folly . And finds too late that men betray, . What charm can soothe her melancholy, .
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: My doctrine is this, that if we see cruelty or wrong that we have the power to stop, and do nothing, we make ourselves sharers in the guilt.
quotes.name: Anna Sewell

quotes.message: Remorse begets reform.
quotes.name: Wiliam Cowper

quotes.message: We can always get along better ty reason and love of truth than by worry of conscience and remorse Harmful are these, and evil.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Mothers, food, love, and career: the four major guilt groups.
quotes.name: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.message: Conscience reigns but it does not govern.
quotes.name: Paul Valéry

quotes.message: What the devil loves is that vague cloud of unspecified guilt feeling or unspecified virtue by which he lures us into despair or presumption. 'Details, please?' is the answer.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: All men alike stand condemned, not by alien codes of ethics, hut by their own, and all men therefore arc conscious of guilt.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: When we grieve, tears and guilt get mixed together.
quotes.name: Art Buchwald

quotes.message: Conscience is thoroughly well-bred and soon leaves off talking to those who do not wish to hear it.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: The fact that human conscience remains partially infantile throughout life is the core of human tragedy.
quotes.name: Erik H. Erikson

quotes.message: Each man’s soul is a menagerie where Conscience, the animal-tamer, lives with a collection of wild beasts.
quotes.name: Austin O’Malley

quotes.message: The voice of conscience is so delicate that it is easy to stifle; but it is also so clear that it is impossible to mistake.
quotes.name: Germaine De Staël

quotes.message: What we call real estate — the solid ground to build a house on — is the broad foundation on which nearly all the guilt of this world rests.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: How extraordinary it is that one feels most guilt about the sins one is unable to commit.
quotes.name: V.S. Pritchett

quotes.message: An excuse not requested betrays the guilt of him who makes it.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: He confesses his guilt who flees from his trial.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before being accused.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: He who is guilty believes that all men speak ill of him.
quotes.name: Italian Proverb

quotes.message: How difficult it is not to betray guilt by our looks.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: How near to guilt a man may approach without being guilty.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Measure your guilt, then stretch your legs.
quotes.name: Arabian Proverb

quotes.message: The act does not make the person guilty, unless the mind be guilty.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: The innocent are free from fear; but the guilty have always the dread of punishment before their eyes.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: A mind conscious of guilt is its own accuser.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: The one who secretly meditates a crime bears all the guilt of the deed.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: Enjoying someone else’s smell—the most modest form of guilt there is.
quotes.name: Francesco Pacifico

quotes.message: You may not be able to change the world, but at least you can embarrass the guilty.
quotes.name: Jessica Mitford

quotes.message: I think that everything he did, feeding the poor, giving money to friends in need, it was all a way of redeeming himself. And that, I believe, is what true redemption is, Amir jan, when guilt leads to good.
quotes.name: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.message: Everyone’s conscience in religion is between God and themselves, and it belongs to none other.
quotes.name: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.message: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
quotes.name: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.message: No amount of guilt can solve the past. No amount of anxiety can change the future.
quotes.name: Bruce Van Horn

quotes.message: Guilt before we act is called morality.
quotes.name: Jesse Fisher

quotes.message: Without the sensation of guilt, the hierarchy are afraid the individual would run free and there would be no order. Without order, there is no power. Guilt forces each of us to surrender our will, our souls to those who should not possess them.
quotes.name: Alessandro Farnese

quotes.message: Fear and guilt are sisters.
quotes.name: Trish Park

quotes.message: Hey, hey, hey. Come on. I know what guilt is. It's one of those touchy-feely words that people throw around that don't really mean anything... You know, like 'maternal' or 'addiction.
quotes.name: Karen Walker

quotes.message: I'm only human baby . Ain't I allowed to make mistakes . You put your guilt on me . And it's causing my poor heart to break, yeah .
quotes.name: Marcus Miller; Luther Vandross

quotes.message: There's a war between guilt and grace . And they're fighting for a sacred space . But I'm living proof .
quotes.name: Matthew West

quotes.message: Words can't describe the way it feels . When mercy floods a thirsty soul . A broken side begins to heal .
quotes.name: Matthew West

quotes.message: Oh! load of guilt! relentless misery! . Still, ever still the same where'er I fly; . No peace, no hope, not one poor moment's glimpse .
quotes.name: Thomas Oldham

quotes.message: Pray for my soul. More things are wrought by prayer Than this world dreams of: Wherefore, let they voice, Rise like a fountain for me night and day.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Prayer is a strong wall and fortress of the church; it is a goodly Christian weapon.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Prayer has mighty power to move mountains because the Holy Spirit is ready both to encourage our praying and to remove the mountains hindering us.
quotes.name: Wesley L Duewel

quotes.message: Prayer is simply talking to God like a friend and should be the easiest thing we do each day.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Heavenly citizenship and heavenly homesickness are in prayer. Prayer is an appeal from the lowness, from the emptiness, from the need of earth, to the highness, the fullness and to the all-sufficiency of heaven.
quotes.name: E.M. Bounds

quotes.message: We can be tired, weary, and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
quotes.name: Charles Stanley

quotes.message: Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Prayer is powerful. It can heal, prayer can give, and it can change lives.
quotes.name: Shane DeCreshio

quotes.message: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
quotes.name: Teresa of Avila

quotes.message: The prayer of the feeblest saint who lives in the Spirit and keeps right with God is a terror to Satan. The very powers of darkness are paralyzed by prayer; no spiritualistic seance can succeed in the presence of a humble praying saint. No wonder Satan tries to keep our minds fussy in active work till we cannot think in prayer.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: Prayer is one of the greatest assets that a Christian could possess, but sometimes it seems to be a real challenge to make it a full part of our devotional life.
quotes.name: Brian Johnston

quotes.message: Heavenly Father has given a simple pattern for us to receive the Holy Ghost not once but continually in the tumult of our daily lives. The pattern is repeated in the sacramental prayer: We promise that we will always remember the savior. We promise to take his name upon us. We promise to keep his commandments.
quotes.name: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.message: Prayer is the spirit speaking truth to Truth.
quotes.name: Philip James Bailey

quotes.message: Prayer is nothing but the breathing that out before the Lord, that was first breathed into us by the Spirit of the Lord.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks

quotes.message: Prayer is to our relationship with our divine source what conversation is to our most intimate human relationships. Like water for a plant, it's a condition for growth.
quotes.name: Daniel Murphy

quotes.message: Prayer is the easiest and hardest of all things; the simplest and the sublimest; the weakest and the most powerful; its results lie outside the range of human possibilities they are limited only by the omnipotence of God.
quotes.name: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.message: To pray rightly, you must make God your hope, stay, and all. Right prayer sees nothing substantial or worth being concerned about except God.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: Prayer is a confession of one's own unworthiness and weakness.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Prayer is not a discourse. It is a form of life, the life with God. That is why it is not confined to the moment of verbal statement.
quotes.name: Jacques Ellul

quotes.message: Daily prayers to God should never be seen as a task. It should be a necessity in our life just as air is a necessity for us in order to breathe and live.
quotes.name: Oliver Powell

quotes.message: Prayer requires more of the heart than of the tongue.
quotes.name: Adam Clarke

quotes.message: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: To give thanks in solitude is enough. Thanksgiving has wings and goes where it must go. Your prayer knows much more about it than you do.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: We can take our questions, doubts, needs, dreams, and circumstances to the Lord in prayer, asking him to reveal the answers in Scripture.
quotes.name: Joel Patchen

quotes.message: Each time, before you intercede, be quiet first, and worship God in His glory. Think of what He can do, and how He delights to hear the prayers of His redeemed people.
quotes.name: Andrew Murray

quotes.message: Rather than set aside daily time for prayer, I pray constantly and spontaneously about everything I encounter on a daily basis. When someone shares something with me, I'll often simply say, 'let's pray about this right now.
quotes.name: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.message: Pray absolutely for those things you may pray for absolutely. Pray conditionally for those things you may pray for conditionally. For those things you can't pray for don't.
quotes.name: Paul Gerhardt

quotes.message: And from the prayer of Want, and plaint of Woe, O never, never turn away thine ear! Forlorn, in this bleak wilderness below, Ah! what were man, should Heaven refuse to hear!
quotes.name: James Beattie

quotes.message: Prayer is no fitful, short-lived thing. It is no voice crying unheard and unheeded in the silence. It is a voice which goes into God's ear, and it lives as long as God's ear is open to holy pleas, as long as God's heart is alive to holy things.
quotes.name: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.message: True prayer is not asking God for love; it is learning to love, and to include all mankind in one affection. Prayer is the utilization of the love where with He loves us.
quotes.name: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.message: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: God shapes the world by prayer. The more praying there is in the world the better the world will be, the mightier the forces against evil.
quotes.name: E.M. Bounds

quotes.message: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.name: Meister Eckhart

quotes.message: Prayer lays hold of God's plan and becomes the link between His will and its accomplishment on earth. Amazing things happen, and we are given the privilege of being the channels of the Holy Spirit's prayer.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.message: Prayer is the forerunner of mercy. Turn to sacred history, and you will find that scarecely ever did a great mercy come to this world unheralded by supplication.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men. Do not pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for powers equal to your tasks. Then the doing of your work shall be no miracle, but you shall be the miracle.
quotes.name: Phillips Brooks

quotes.message: No one is a firmer believer in the power of prayer than the devil; not that he practices it, but he suffers from it.
quotes.name: Guy H. King

quotes.message: Praying without ceasing is not ritualized, nor are there even words. It is a constant state of awareness of oneness with God; it is a sincere seeking for a good thing; and it is a concentration on the thing sought, with faith that it is obtainable.
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.
quotes.name: Josephine Baker

quotes.message: Being light is turning the other cheek when you have been offended. Being light is not only publically forgiving a person that would choose to be your enemy, but it's also including your enemy in your prayers at night.
quotes.name: Matthew Robert Payne

quotes.message: God answers sharp and sudden on some prayers, And thrusts the thing we have prayed for in our face, A gauntlet with a gift in 't.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.message: Prayer is not only asking, but an attitude of mind which produces the atmosphere in which asking is perfectly natural.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: All vital praying makes a drain on a man's vitality. True intercession is a sacrifice, a bleeding sacrifice.
quotes.name: J.H. Jowett

quotes.message: Prayer is as natural an expression of faith as breathing is of life.
quotes.name: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.message: Our prayers are strengthened when we know God is listening and that he is faithful.
quotes.name: Dr. David Jeremiah

quotes.message: In my deepest, darkest moments, what really got me through was a prayer. Sometimes my prayer was 'Help me.' Sometimes a prayer was 'Thank you.' What I've discovered is that intimate connection and communication with my creator will always get me through because I know my support, my help, is just a prayer away.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: Lies require commitment.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: If you tell a big enough lie and tell it frequently enough, it will be believed.
quotes.name: Adolf Hitler

quotes.message: Things come apart so easily when they have been held together with lies.
quotes.name: Dorothy Allison

quotes.message: Man is not what he thinks he is, he is what he hides.
quotes.name: Andr_ Malraux

quotes.message: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Every violation of truth is not only a sort of suicide in the liar, but is a stab at the health of human society.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: There is nothing in the world more shameful than establishing one's self on lies and fables.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: A lie with a purpose is one of the worst kind, and the most profitable.
quotes.name: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.message: Lying increases the creative faculties, expands the ego, lessens the friction of social contacts. It is only in lies, wholeheartedly and bravely told, that human nature attains through words and speech the forbearance, the nobility, the romance, the idealism, that -- being what it is -- it falls so short of in fact and in deed.
quotes.name: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.message: I detest the man who hides one thing in the depth of his heart and speaks forth another.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: With lies you may go ahead in the world, but you can never go back.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousandfold.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A lie has speed, but truth has endurance.
quotes.name: Edgar J. Mohn

quotes.message: We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us. But every time we tell a lie, the thing that we fear grows stronger.
quotes.name: Tad Williams

quotes.message: When you tell a lie, you steal someone's right to the truth.
quotes.name: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.message: A single lie destroys a whole reputation of integrity.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: A lie does not consist in the indirect position of words, but in the desire and intention, by false speaking, to deceive and injure your neighbour.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: By a lie, a man...annihilates his dignity as a man.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: We lie loudest when we lie to ourselves.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: A successful lie cannot be brought into this world and capriciously abandoned; like any committed relationship, it must be maintained, and with far more devotion than the truth, which carries on being carelessly true without any help.
quotes.name: Lionel Shriver

quotes.message: People do not believe lies because they have to, but because they want to.
quotes.name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.message: A lie never lives to be old.
quotes.name: Sophocles quotes

quotes.message: The more you defend a lie, the angrier you become.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: Because everybody lies. It's part of living in society. Don't get me wrong - I think it's necessary. The last thing anyone wants is to live in a society where total honesty prevails. Can you imagine the conversations? You're short and fat, one person might say, and the other might answer, I know. But you smell bad. It just wouldn't work. So people lie by omission all the time. People will tell you most of the story...and I've learned that the part they neglect to tell you is often the most important part. People hide the truth because they're afraid.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: A lie will easily get you out of a scrape, and yet, strangely and beautifully, rapture possesses you when you have taken the scrape and left out the lie.
quotes.name: C. E. Montague

quotes.message: Falsehood is so easy, truth so difficult....Examine your words well, and you will find that even when you have no motive to be false, it is a very hard thing to say the exact truth, even about your own immediate feelings -- much harder than to say something fine about them which is_not_the exact truth.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Falsehoods not only disagree with truths, but usually quarrel among themselves.
quotes.name: Daniel Webster

quotes.message: The only form of lying that is absolutely beyond reproach is Iying for its own sake.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Falsehood is never so successful as when she baits her hook with truth, and no opinions so fatally mislead us as those that are not wholly wrong, as no watches so effectively deceive the wearer as those that are sometimes right.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: He who has not a good memory should never take upon him the trade of lying.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: It is a double pleasure to deceive the deceiver.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Lord, Lord, how this world is given to lying!
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: I do not mind lying, but I hate inaccuracy.
quotes.name: Joseph Butler

quotes.message: Though leaves are many, the root is one; . Through all the lying days of my youth . I swayed my leaves and flowers in the sun; . Now I may wither into the truth.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Truth, like light, blinds. Falsehood, on the contrary, is a beautiful twilight that enhances every object.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Deception is not as creative as truth. We do best in life if we look at it with clear eyes, and I think that applies to coming up to death as well.
quotes.name: Cicely Saunders

quotes.message: I count false words the foulest plague of all.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: To lie a little is not possible; whoever lies, lies a whole lie.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: The most common lie is that which one lies to himself; lying to others is relatively an exception.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: It reminds me of the small boy who jumbled his biblical quotations and said: A lie is an abomination unto the Lord, and a very present help in trouble.
quotes.name: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.message: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
quotes.name: Margot Asquith

quotes.message: Matilda told such Dreadful Lies, . It made one Gasp and Stretch one’s Eyes; . Her Aunt, who, from her Earliest Youth, . Had kept a Strict Regard for Truth, . Attempted to Believe Matilda: . The effort very nearly killed her.
quotes.name: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.message: Telling lies is a bit like tiling bathrooms—if you don’t know how to do it properly, it’s best not to try.
quotes.name: Tom Holt

quotes.message: A little inaccuracy sometimes saves tons of explanation.
quotes.name: Saki

quotes.message: O what a tangled web we weave, .
quotes.name: Walter Scott

quotes.message: Without lies humanity would perish of despair and boredom.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: There are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies and statistics.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Whoever would lie usefully should lie seldom.
quotes.name: Lord Hervey

quotes.message: The retort courteous…the quip modest…the reply churlish…the reproof valiant…the countercheck quarrelsome…the lie circumstantial…the lie direct.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: If you want truth to go round the world you must hire an express train to pull it; but if you want a lie to go round the world, it will fly: it is as light as a feather, and a breath will carry it. It is well said in the old proverb, ‘a lie will go round the world while truth is pulling its boots on.
quotes.name: C.H. Spurgeon

quotes.message: The cruellest lies are often told in silence.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: One of the most striking differences between a cat and a lie is that a cat has only nine lives.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Great is the power of steady misrepresentation.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: A deception that elevates us is dearer than a host of low truths.
quotes.name: Alexander Pushkin

quotes.message: Surely to tell these tall tales and others like them would be to speed the myth, the wicked lie, that the past is always tense and the future, perfect.
quotes.name: Zadie Smith

quotes.message: In human relations kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: Can we devise one of those lies—the kind which crop up as the occasion demands, which we were talking about not so long ago—so that with a single noble lie we can indoctrinate the rulers themselves, preferably, but at least the rest of the community?
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: There is no worse lie than a truth misunderstood by those who hear it.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: The Social Contract is nothing more or less than a vast conspiracy of human beings to lie to and humbug themselves and one another for the general Good. Lies are the mortar that bind the savage individual man into the social masonry.
quotes.name: H.G. Wells

quotes.message: Died some, pro patria, . non ‘dulce’ non ‘et decor’… . walked eye-deep in hell . believing in old men's lies, the unbelieving .
quotes.name: Ezra Pound

quotes.message: Anyone who tells a lie has not a pure heart, and cannot make a good soup.
quotes.name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.message: From all that terror teaches, . From lies of tongue and pen, . From all the easy speeches . That comfort cruel men, . From sale and profanation . Of honour and the sword, . From sleep and from damnation, .
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: If I ever said in grief or pride. I tired of honest things. I lied.
quotes.name: Edna Saint Vincent Millay

quotes.message: You cannot weave truth on a loom of lies.
quotes.name: Suzette Haden Elgin

quotes.message: So often the truth is told with hate, and lies are told with love.
quotes.name: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.message: The man who fears no truths has nothing to fear from lies.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Never believe anything a writer tells you about himself. A man comes to believe in the end the lies he tells himself about himself.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The trouble with lying and deceiving is that their efficiency depends entirely upon a dear notion of the truth that the liar and deceiver wishes to hide.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Hurt me with the truth. Don’t comfort me with a lie.
quotes.name: Rihanna

quotes.message: From long journeys long lies.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: If lies are to find credence, they must be patched with truth.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies and gossip have a wretched offspring.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies and Latin go round the world.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies have short legs and are soon overtaken.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies have short wings.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Lies melt the snow.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Lies that build are better than truths that destroy.
quotes.name: West African Proverb

quotes.message: Rabbits and lies easily multiply.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: No man understands dishonesty better than the abbot who has been a monk.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: Honesty brings success, dishonesty defeats itself.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: But liars we can never trust, . Even when they say what is true. . And he who does one fault at first . And lies to hide it, makes it two.
quotes.name: Isaac Watts

quotes.message: Sometimes I lie. . I'm a good storyteller, though I know not why .
quotes.name: Maria Anderson

quotes.message: This is not lying. This is creative reasoning.
quotes.name: Wayne Malloy

quotes.message: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Fight till the last gasp.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: When their adventures do not succeed, however, they run away; but it was the mark of a brave man to face things that are, and seem, terrible for a man, because it is noble to do so and disgraceful not to do so.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Bravery has no place where it can avail nothing.
quotes.name: Dr Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Brave men are all vertebrates; they have their softness on the surface and their toughness in the middle.
quotes.name: G K Chesterton

quotes.message: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: A brave man struggling in the storms of fate, And greatly falling with a falling state.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man. . . . It is more powerful than external circumstances.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Fortune and love favor the brave.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man. . . . It is more powerful than external circumstances.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: It is a healthy approach not to expect persons to turn out precisely how you would have wished.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Better to know the quick pain of truth than the ongoing pain of a long-held false hope.
quotes.name: Trudi Canavan

quotes.message: And as far as false hope, there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope - nothing else.
quotes.name: Patti Davis

quotes.message: False hope really makes you cynical.
quotes.name: Bill Maher

quotes.message: It is always the false that makes you suffer, the false desires and fears, the false values and ideas, the false relationships between people. Abandon the false and you are free of pain; truth makes you happy, truth liberates.
quotes.name: Nisardagatta Maharaj

quotes.message: Hope is a word that can kill as well as save. A double-sided knife onto whose handle we all cling. If hope is our dreams, it takes courage to strive for those dreams; to not abandon hope as one of folly. A person lost can have hope of being found, but false hope, a hope that can torture a soul with promises never delivered, that is a hope we can all live without.
quotes.name: Paul Howsley

quotes.message: False hope is clung to with all one's might and main, till a day comes when it has sucked the heart dry and it forcibly breaks through its bonds and departs. After that comes the misery of awakening, and then once again, the longing to get back into the maze of the same mistakes.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: To keep false hopes is to prolong misery.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: Sugar coating things makes people feel better, but it also gives them false hope, and it keeps them holding onto the wrong people.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Because sometimes people who seem good end up being not as good as you might have hoped.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: Hope itself is always genuine. It's only what it's placed in that can prove to be false.
quotes.name: Karen Maitland

quotes.message: That would be the death of anyone - to recognize false hopes with a certainty. One mustn't know that.
quotes.name: Jesse Ball

quotes.message: What is false about hope?
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: False hope is sometimes mistaken for true love. Don't rush into something until you're sure it actually exists.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: False hope is sometimes much worse and sometimes much better than no hope.
quotes.name: Mike Caro

quotes.message: If you expect nothing, you can never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Tonya Hurley

quotes.message: False hope can lead to intemperate choices and flawed decision making. True hope takes into account the real threats that exist and seeks to navigate the best path around them.
quotes.name: Jerome Groopman

quotes.message: Harsh reality is always better than false hope.
quotes.name: Julian Fellowes

quotes.message: A false hope gives only false comfort.
quotes.name: Gene Brewer

quotes.message: False hope is the bread - and - butter of my existence, the only thing that keeps me going.
quotes.name: Rob Payne

quotes.message: Hope is such a tenuous quality. To feel it and then to be denied what one most longs for. Better, surely, not to hope at all, than to open the heart to a hope that is impossible.
quotes.name: Juliet Marillier

quotes.message: There is something truly restorative, finally comforting, in coming to the end of an illusion - a false hope.
quotes.name: Sue Miller

quotes.message: False hopes are more dangerous than fears.
quotes.name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: False hope is nicer than no hope at all.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: False hope is worse than despair.
quotes.name: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.message: A clear rejection is better than a fake promise.
quotes.name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.message: If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
quotes.name: Pravinee Hurbungs

quotes.message: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
quotes.name: Frederick Smith

quotes.message: Don't face the fear, and you'll be its slave. Face the fear, and now you are its master. The death of fear is then certain.
quotes.name: Giovanni Dienstmann

quotes.message: There is no impossibility to him who stands prepared to conquer every hazard. The fearful are the failing.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Hale

quotes.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: The men who try to do something and fail are infinitely better than those who try to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.name: Lloyd Jones

quotes.message: Fear of failure is a ticket to mediocrity. If you're not failing from time to time, you're not pushing yourself. And if you're not pushing yourself, you're coasting.
quotes.name: Eric Zorn

quotes.message: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
quotes.name: Ken Robinson

quotes.message: If you don't try at anything, you can't fail, it takes back bone to lead the life you want.
quotes.name: Richard Yates

quotes.message: Don't fear failure. Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
quotes.name: George Herman

quotes.message: To overcome the fear of failure, do what makes you fearful.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Giving up is the only sure way to fail.
quotes.name: Gena Showalter

quotes.message: You cannot reach the pinnacle of success without overcoming the fear of failure just like you can't reach space without overcoming the attraction of gravity.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: They fail, and they alone, who have not striven.
quotes.name: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.message: Don't fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
quotes.name: Louis E. Boone

quotes.message: We learn wisdom from failure much more than success. We often discover what we will do, by finding out what we will not do.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: We shouldn't be fearful of failure because is not a monster as we think it is. It's just a training ground for those who are really striving for excellence in life.
quotes.name: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Those who are acquainted with failure acquire the unique ability to dare without fear of it.
quotes.name: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.message: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Failure isn't fatal, but failure to change might be.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Let the fear of failure be the background noise of your success.
quotes.name: Giovanni Dienstmann

quotes.message: Our greatest fear should not be of failure, but of succeeding at something that doesn't really matter.
quotes.name: D.L. Moody

quotes.message: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: One who fears failure limits his activities.Failure is only the opportunity to more intelligently begin again.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Fear of failure is fiction, face this fact and fear will fall.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: If it's what you do and you can do it, then you do it.
quotes.name: Van Morrison

quotes.message: Have a robust mindset; dare to move any mountain!
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: It ain't bragging if you can do it.
quotes.name: Dizzy Dean

quotes.message: If you can do it better than me, then you do it.
quotes.name: Kanye West

quotes.message: The most important thing for success is self belief and confidence. Believing you deserve it, believing you can do it, and you will get it.

quotes.message: Do the thing and you will have the power.

quotes.message: By stepping outside your comfort zone to do something peculiar, you confirm that you can do more than you've done.

quotes.message: What happened yesterday, no longer matters. Today is another day. Get back on the right track and move closer to your dreams. Yes you can do it.

quotes.message: If you think you can do it, you can.

quotes.message: When you do something bad and you know you can do it, only you know you can do it. And do it while it's hot, man.

quotes.message: You want to climb the mountain because it's there and you know you can do it.

quotes.message: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

quotes.message: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.

quotes.message: It's so important to believe in yourself. Believe that you can do it, under any circumstances. Because if you believe you can, then you really will. That belief just keeps you searching for the answers, and then pretty soon you get it.

quotes.message: I want to show that you dont have to be older to live your dreams, you can do it at any age.

quotes.message: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

quotes.message: Dare to accomplish the things you've only dreamed about doing. If you can dream it, you can do it.

quotes.message: If you do not believe you can do it then you have no chance at all.

quotes.message: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.message: You just have to have the guidance to lead you in the direction until you can do it yourself.

quotes.message: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.

quotes.message: By the power of the Holy Spirit, we can do what needs to be done.

quotes.message: But if others can do it, so can I.

quotes.message: You can do it, you're the one to write something suitable.

quotes.message: You can do nothing without prayer and everything with it. Anything worth worrying about is something worth praying about.

quotes.message: Just get it right, “it is not too late to dream”.

quotes.message: If you believe you can, you probably can.

quotes.message: Whatever you can conceive and believe, you can achieve.

quotes.message: It is what a man thinks of himself that really determines his faith.

quotes.message: There is no limit to what you can do,when you focus on your strength.

quotes.message: You can accomplish almost anything.

quotes.message: You must participate in your vision to retrieve your treasure. By pushing vision in overdrive, you can do anything treasure. Never let anybody tell you otherwise.

quotes.message: You must continue to focus no matter what.With effort and hard work done consistently, you can accomplish anything.

quotes.message: Internal feelings are priceless and filled with passion. With your full potential, you can accomplish anything.
quotes.name: Michael Gunner

quotes.message: Always remember you can do anything you put your mind to.

quotes.message: To dream anything that you want to dream. That's the beauty of the human mind. To do anything that you want to do.

quotes.message: You can do what you want. If you don't think you can't, so don't think you can't think you can.

quotes.message: Panic implies that there is no rational thought taking place. That we are frozen and incapable of adjusting. Powerless to logic, and subject to seemingly unthinkable behavior.

quotes.message: If you panic that's a good way to lose. You have to stay in control.

quotes.message: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination.

quotes.message: Panic is not an effective long-term organizing strategy.

quotes.message: Panic is an incredibly catalyzing creative force. And almost out of sheer necessity, I found I had to talk about myself and my real life as it is effectively lived by me.

quotes.message: There's no panic like the panic you momentarily feel when your hand or head is stuck in something.

quotes.message: Panic is the sudden realization that everything around you is alive.

quotes.message: Panic is the great access of creativity because that's the only way to get rid of your mind.

quotes.message: Panic is highly contagious, especially in situations when nothing is known and everything is in flux.

quotes.message: If you're tearing around in a panic about something, then it puts everyone else in a panic as well.

quotes.message: Panic, a deep abiding, free-floating anxiety, often without any reason or logical basis.

quotes.message: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.

quotes.message: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.

quotes.message: Fears are educated into us, and can, if we wish, be educated out.

quotes.message: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.

quotes.message: Fear is only as deep as the mind allows.

quotes.message: Go back a little to leap further.

quotes.message: I failed my way to success.

quotes.message: Don't obsess about the failures. Instead, investigate and close the successes.

quotes.message: I will not die an unlived life. I will not live in fear of falling or catching fire. I choose to inhabit my days, to allow my living to open me, to make me less afraid, more accessible, to loosen my heart until it becomes a wing, a torch, a promise. I choose to risk my significance; to live so that which comes to me as seed goes to the next as blossom and that which comes to me as blossom, goes on as fruit.

quotes.message: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something else is more important than fear.

quotes.message: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smile at you is your best friend.

quotes.message: An honest enemy is better than a best friend who lies.

quotes.message: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.

quotes.message: Pretend to be poor in reality and you'll notice a decrease in your friends list and request.

quotes.message: Fake friends are like autumn leaves, they're scattered everywhere.

quotes.message: You always knew after sh— things happened, who your friends really were.

quotes.message: Better an honest enemy than a false friend.

quotes.message: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after y'all not friends anymore.

quotes.message: Keep talking about me behind my back, and watch God keep blessing me in front of your face.

quotes.message: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.

quotes.message: I used to think enemies were the worst people in the world, but that was until I met fake friends and realized that they're a lot worse.

quotes.message: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.

quotes.message: Better to have an enemy who slaps you in the face than a friend who stabs you in the back.

quotes.message: An enemy, who is honest and shows his.her hate openly is better than a friend who is liar and putting you down secretly.

quotes.message: A false friend, a friendly fraud: both are like thieves.

quotes.message: A false friend is like the shadow of a sundial.

quotes.message: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find a good one, you must a hundred try.

quotes.message: To betray you must first belong. I never belonged.

quotes.message: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.

quotes.message: Brother, even by our mother’s dust, I charge you, do not betray me to your mirth or hate.

quotes.message: In one respect indeed, our employment may be reckoned dishonest, because, like great Statesmen, we encourage those who betray their friends.

quotes.message: Is it possible to succeed without any act of betrayal?

quotes.message: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A friendship founded on business is good deal better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: A lot of problems in the world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A person's character is shown through their actions in life NOT where they sit on Sunday.
quotes.name: Navonne Johns

quotes.message: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.name: Walter Winchell

quotes.message: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.

quotes.message: Be yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Betray a friend and you’ll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don’t fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fake friends are like shadows: they follow you in the sun, but leave your side when in gets dark.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It’s also about mutual help, not about exploitation.

quotes.message: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.name: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.message: I hate two faced people, it makes it harder for me to decide which side to slap first.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If it comes, let it come. If it goes, it’s ok, let it go. Let things come and go. Stay calm, don’t let anything disturb your peace, and carry on.

quotes.message: In fact a lot of problems in this world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In life, you have a choice: Bitter or Better? Choose better, forget bitter.

quotes.message: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.

quotes.message: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.

quotes.message: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, can never know what true friendship means.

quotes.message: It’s hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it…

quotes.message: Knowledge planted in truth grows in truth. Strength born of peace loses nothing to hate.

quotes.message: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.

quotes.message: Letting go of toxic people in your life is a big step in loving yourself.

quotes.message: Lovers have a right to betray you, friends don’t.
