quotes.message: Many people would be scared if they saw in the mirror, not their faces..but their character.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.name: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.message: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Once they stop talking to you, they start talking about you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It’ll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called 'perfection,' which will open the doors to the most important relationships you’ll ever be a part of.
quotes.name: Dan Pearce

quotes.message: Some people are going to leave, but that’s not the end your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Some people think that the truth can be hidden with a little cover-up and decoration. But as time goes by, what is true is revealed, and what is fake fades away.
quotes.name: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.message: Sometimes, you have to give up on people. Not because you don’t care but because they don’t.
quotes.name: Jennifer Green

quotes.message: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.name: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.message: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: The strong-minded rise to the challenge of their goals and dreams. The weak-minded become haters.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The worst part about success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.name: Bette Midler

quotes.message: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: This is what happens. You tell your friends your most personal secrets, and they use them against you.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: What’s the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you’re so ugly on the inside?
quotes.name: Jess C. Scott

quotes.message: You cannot always trust what you see. Even salt looks like sugar.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You don’t lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends, and you’re better for it.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Giving is the highest expression of potency...Giving is more joyous than receiving, not because it is a deprivation, but because in the act of giving lies the expression of my aliveness.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.message: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Give yourself entirely to those around you. Be generous with your blessings. A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Happiness doesn't result from what we get, but from what we give.
quotes.name: Ben Carson

quotes.message: Presents are made for the pleasure of who gives them, not the merits of who receives them.
quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.message: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I don't think you ever stop giving. I really don't. I think it's an on-going process. And it's not just about being able to write a check. It's being able to touch somebody's life.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Give cheerfully and freely. It is the energy behind the giving that matters so do not give grudgingly. The law of cause and effect guarantees that you shall receive plenty for what you give.
quotes.name: David Cameron Gikandi

quotes.message: If you have much, give of your wealth; If you have little, give of your heart.
quotes.name: Arab Proverb

quotes.message: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Giving back is something that comes from the heart to me. It's not that I do it because it's the right thing: I do it because I want do it.
quotes.name: Henry Kravis

quotes.message: When you're in a position to have gotten so much, the gift at this point is giving back.
quotes.name: Paul Stanley

quotes.message: Hope and purpose in this world is living as best as you can and maybe having life that gives back. But simply giving back isn't purpose; it's a branch of purpose, but it is not the trunk or root of the tree.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back.
quotes.name: Adrian Grenier

quotes.message: That's what I consider true generosity. You give your all, and yet you always feel as if it costs you nothing.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: It is more blessed to give than to receive.
quotes.name: Acts 20: 35

quotes.message: Social advance depends quite as much upon an increase in moral sensibility as it does upon a sense of duty.
quotes.name: Jane Addams

quotes.message: I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Every charitable act is a stepping stone towards heaven.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Life engenders life. Energy creates energy. It is by spending oneself that one becomes rich.
quotes.name: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.message: I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I do know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who have sought and found how to serve.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Everyone can be great, because everyone can serve.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: We are not put on this earth for ourselves, but are placed here for each other. If you are there always for others, then in time of need, someone will be there for you.
quotes.name: Jeff Warner

quotes.message: Caring has the gift of making the ordinary special.
quotes.name: George R. Bach

quotes.message: Love cannot remain by itself it has no meaning. Love has to be put into action and that action is service.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.name: Bob Hope

quotes.message: Giving with glad and generous hearts has a way of routing out the tough old miser within us. Even the poor need to know that they can give. Just the very act of letting go of money, or some other treasure, does something within us. It destroys the demon greed.
quotes.name: Richard J. Foster

quotes.message: One man gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty.
quotes.name: Prov. 11:24

quotes.message: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.
quotes.name: Luke 6:37-38

quotes.message: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.name: Albert Pike

quotes.message: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.name: John Bunyon

quotes.message: When you become detached mentally from yourself and concentrate on helping other people with their difficulties, you will be able to cope with your own more effectively. Somehow, the act of self-giving is a personal power-releasing factor.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Unless we think of others and do something for them, we miss one of the greatest sources of happiness.
quotes.name: Ray Lyman Wilbur

quotes.message: It is normal to give away a little of one's life in order not to lose it all.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: When you give yourself, you receive more than you give.
quotes.name: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.message: There is no delight in owning anything unshared.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: It is like the seed put in the soil -- the more one sows, the greater the harvest.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: If you have zest and enthusiasm you attract zest and enthusiasm. Life does give back in kind.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Love life. Engage in it. Give it all you've got. Love it with a passion because life truly does give back, many times over, what you put into it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I believe that as much as you take, you have to give back. It's important not to focus on yourself too much.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: From what we get, we can make a living. What we give, however, makes a life.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: He who cannot give anything away cannot feel anything either.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Your mind will give back to you exactly what you put into it.
quotes.name: James Joyce

quotes.message: hater is a person whose jealousy of another person success or achievements makes them verbally nit-pick any flaws no matter how small or just make up flaws in order to somehow try and belittle the successful person.
quotes.name: Rai M. Teves

quotes.message: A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24.7. So, if you're expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: And these haters try to knock me but they can't knock me off the hinges.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
quotes.name: Gloria Tesch

quotes.message: Don't doubt yourself, that's what haters are for.
quotes.name: Turcois Ominek

quotes.message: Don't try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
quotes.name: Scylar Tyberius

quotes.message: Haters are my favorite. I've built an empire with the bricks they've thrown at me. Keep on hating.
quotes.name: C.M. Punk

quotes.message: Haters don't hate you. They hate themselves because you're a reflection of what they wish to be.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Haters keep on hating, cause somebody's gotta do it.
quotes.name: Chris Brown

quotes.message: Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end.
quotes.name: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.message: Haters teach you to be grateful for the people you love, hard times teach to you be grateful for the times that are good, and God, well God teaches you everything you need to know.
quotes.name: Carniel Dunlop

quotes.message: I don't worry about the haters? They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I only feel sorry for weak people. And mostly what I've come to find is that the weak people are the ones that are the haters.
quotes.name: R. Kelly

quotes.message: I think people are just haters. When they see people doing well, some people, if there's something wrong, they'll pick at that.
quotes.name: Alana Blanchard

quotes.message: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
quotes.name: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.message: Just be you. I've learned the hard way and in the end, some people are just so full of hate that no matter what you say or do, they'll always have something to say.
quotes.name: Megan Fox

quotes.message: My haters are my motivators.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: My whole thing is, haters are gonna hate, but haters are also going to click on your YouTube video just to watch it, so I don't really care. You helped me break the record. Even if you were watching just to hate on me, and now I hold the record, so I win.
quotes.name: Miley Cyrus

quotes.message: People who hate you because of a mere jealousy over your success hurt themselves in disguise. This is because you carry an image of who they wish they had become. Don't hate them back because they may also become like you one day and it will mean hurting that image you carry.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Respect your haters they're the only ones who think you're better than them.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There's nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
quotes.name: Karina Barton

quotes.message: They're [haters] just building you up to knock you down. But for me, they haven't.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: To all the haters out there I wish you the best. You can't bring me down. I wake up everyday grateful for the opportunity and grateful to the fans.
quotes.name: Justin Bieber

quotes.message: You can't hate.love others without loving.hating yourself first.
quotes.name: Tyga

quotes.message: Women initiate most domestic violence.
quotes.name: Dov Charney

quotes.message: At the beginning, I wasn't aware of some of the stuff that goes on. Now, I have a heightened awareness of domestic violence and how to spot it.
quotes.name: Danielle Jones

quotes.message: The time when domestic violence is the most lethal is when the person is trying to leave the situation.
quotes.name: Julie Johnston

quotes.message: Even child abuse specialists do not routinely screen for domestic violence. This shows how much more education we need to do, even among experts, to understand the known links between violence of the child and the parent.
quotes.name: Jocelyn Brown

quotes.message: Domestic abuse is wrong, but domestic retribution is okay.
quotes.name: Dov Davidoff

quotes.message: Nobody believes that domestic violence kills and nobody believes it is detrimental to children. This world has got to wake up. To me, if there is domestic violence, if the children see it or hear it, that to me is detrimental. Batterers should not have rights to children.
quotes.name: Denise Brown

quotes.message: Domestic violence can be so easy for people to ignore, as it often happens without any witnesses and it is sometimes easier not to get involved. Yet, by publicly speaking out against domestic violence, together we can challenge attitudes towards violence in the home and show that domestic violence is a crime and not merely unacceptable.
quotes.name: Honor Blackman

quotes.message: An abuser isn't abusive 24.7. They usually demonstrate positive character traits most of the time. That's what makes the abuse so confusing when it happens, and what makes leaving so much more difficult.
quotes.name: Miya Yamanouchi

quotes.message: If the numbers we see in domestic violence were applied to terrorism or gang violence, the entire country would be up in arms, and it would be the lead story on the news every night.
quotes.name: Rep. Mark Green

quotes.message: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: Nearly one in four women will experience domestic violence during her lifetime. And slightly more than half of female victims of domestic violence live in households with children under age 12.
quotes.name: Lucille Roybal-Allard

quotes.message: There is a subconscious way of taking violence as a way of expression, as a normality, and it has a lot of effects in the youth in the way they absorb education and what they hope to get out of life.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: A lot of people think that domestic violence is if someone hits, kicks, or punches you.
quotes.name: Robin McGraw

quotes.message: From what I've been told, the scariest part of being part of a domestic abuse relationship is the idea that you cannot escape and you cannot get help, that feeling of being stuck.
quotes.name: Kerry Washington

quotes.message: Hairdressers know a lot about the personal lives of their clients. They come in contact on a day-to-day basis with women dealing with domestic violence.
quotes.name: Gordon Miller

quotes.message: Domestic violence is the front line of the war against women.
quotes.name: Pearl Cleage

quotes.message: Sexual, racial, gender violence and other forms of discrimination and violence in a culture cannot be eliminated without changing culture.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.message: A domestic violence advocate can help you discern your level of risk from your abuser and whether you should get a civil restraining order.
quotes.name: Caroline Abbott

quotes.message: The main reason they were homeless and in crisis was because of domestic violence.
quotes.name: Connie Phillips

quotes.message: One in three women may suffer from abuse and violence in her lifetime. This is an appalling human rights violation, yet it remains one of the invisible and under-recognized pandemics of our time.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: Domestic violence does not only happen to adults. Forty percent of girls age 14 to 17 report knowing someone their age who has been hit or beaten by a boyfriend, and approximately one in five female high school students reports being physically and.or sexually abused by a dating partner.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: All violence consists in some people forcing others, under threat of suffering or death, to do what they do not want to do.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Victims of domestic violence need assistance and deserve justice, I commend the crime unit's efforts to put offenders behind bars and reach out to victims.
quotes.name: Bob Riley

quotes.message: Society has seldom considered the vicarious effects of domestic violence between partners on the lives of children.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is any type of abuse that is not physical in nature. It can include everything from verbal abuse to the silent treatment, domination to subtle manipulation.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: We're number one in domestic violence homicides. We also have a high rate of alcohol abuse and drug abuse and there's a high lethality rate when you get those factors involved, so the shelter has 52 beds, certainly it is never empty.
quotes.name: Diana Burch

quotes.message: Domestic violence is any behavior involving physical, psychological, emotional, sexual or verbal abuse. It is any form of aggression intended to hurt, damage, or kill an intimate person.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: It's incredibly dangerous to leave an abuser, because the final step in the domestic violence pattern is: kill her.
quotes.name: Leslie Morgan Steiner

quotes.message: Long term domestic violence: Being abused in this manner is like being kidnapped and tortured for ransom but you will never have enough to pay off the kidnapper.
quotes.name: Rebecca J. Burns

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a criminal matter and needs to stay in criminal court, Too often, judges see charges of domestic violence as a ploy to get custody and send the case to family court.
quotes.name: Catherine Campbell

quotes.message: Domestic violence is frequently excused when alcohol and other substances are involved.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: I am living in hell from one day to the next. But there is nothing I can do to escape. I don't know where I would go if I did. I feel utterly powerless, and that feeling is my prision. I entered of my own free will, I locked the door, and I threw away the key.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Women trapped in violent relationships need to know that there's no shame in talking out and walking out on their abusive partners.
quotes.name: Kate Thornton

quotes.message: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return. It is estimated that approximately 3 million incidents of domestic violence are reported each year in the United States.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: Women initiate most domestic violence, yet out of a thousand cases of domestic violence, maybe one is involving a man. And this has made a victim of culture out of women.
quotes.name: Dov Charney

quotes.message: Few people who are hit once by someone they love respond in the way they might to a singular physical assault by a stranger.
quotes.name: Bell Hooks

quotes.message: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: Domestic violence occurs because of social power structures where the roles of men and women are predefined, and domestic violence is how that power is played out.
quotes.name: Inhe Choi

quotes.message: Where is the political prisoner movement for those women who are imprisoned for retaliating against abusive father, unless, lovers, and others? I think the absence of these types of campaigns speaks volumes about our movement's gender politics.
quotes.name: Kai Lumumba Barrow

quotes.message: We cannot to the police for protection against domestic violence and then rally against them from brutality as if they are two different institutions.
quotes.name: Anannya Bhattacharjee

quotes.message: If a child is confronted with murder, rape, domestic violence, and other kinds of destructive aggression in daily life, it doesn't surprise me if that child 'turns off' careful looking and listening.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: There is now a wider recognition that domestic violence is about perpetrator's power and control over women and involves not only physical and sexual violence but can include a number of behaviours such as intimidation and threats, isolation and humiliation, behaviour often named as psychological coercion or violence.
quotes.name: Lynne Harne

quotes.message: Domestic violence can occur in any intimate or familial relationship, irrespective of whether the parties are living together or not, whether they are married or cohabiting or living in three-generational extended families.
quotes.name: Lynne Harne

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a breach of human rights as well as major public health and clinical problem.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence and abuse is threatening behaviour, violence or abuse between adults who are relatives, partners or ex-partners. It includes abuse from adult children and from parents of adult children.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence has been shown to be associated with a range of mental health problems.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence is not at all unusual. It is a serious and far-reaching social problem.
quotes.name: Michael P. Johnson

quotes.message: It's violence from someone you know, someone who claims to love you.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: It is most often hidden from even one's closest confidantes, and on many occasions the physical violence is far less damaging than the emotional and verbal violence.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a pattern of emotional and.or physical abuse perpetrated by a romantic partner, the term can also include abuse perpetrated by a family member against another family member.
quotes.name: Stacey Freudenberg PsyD

quotes.message: It is fine to commiserate with a man about his bad experience with a previous partner, but the instant he uses her as an excuse to mistreat you, stop believing anything he tells you about that relationship and instead recognize it as a sign that he has problems with relating to women.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: Never let a man put his hands on you without your permission.
quotes.name: Melda Beaty

quotes.message: Domestic abuse is a form of communication fueled by personal insecurities, temperament, economic, educational or lack therein, physical and psychological conditions.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: Domestic violence has often gone unnamed and unblamed in my society. It is the norm for men to teach their wives a lesson, and for the women to bear that beating and teaching with no complaints.
quotes.name: Fatima Mohammed

quotes.message: The very fact that intimate partner violence is so often addressed in civil court, rather than criminal court, gives insight into how we as a society still view it.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: Leaving an abusive partner is a very difficult thing to do. It frequently feels like you are failing, or destroying your family, or not trying to work things out, or not giving your partner a second chance.
quotes.name: Blaine Nelson

quotes.message: I realize now I am a survivor. I am a stronger woman for opening my eyes and stepping away from someone who didn't respect themselves and would never respect me.
quotes.name: Lori

quotes.message: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.name: Aisha Mirza

quotes.message: You are not the darkness you endured. You are the light that refused to surrender.
quotes.name: John Mark Green

quotes.message: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: A real man wouldn't lay a finger on a woman. He treats his partner with respect, love and support. Men are physically stronger and have no place abusing that power. Everyone has problems, and arguments happen, but that's when a real man uses his intelligence to talk it out.
quotes.name: Matt Lanter

quotes.message: ... you don't have to wait for someone to treat you bad repeatedly. All it takes is once, and if they get away with it that once, if they know they can treat you like that, then it sets the pattern for the future.
quotes.name: Jane Green

quotes.message: Please don't drown into his fears, his concrete fists don´t let him again, break the bridge of your nose with his cruel born hits. Then disappear into that mask of misery.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
quotes.name: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: I have no regrets because I know I did my best -- all I could do.
quotes.name: Midori Ito

quotes.message: I've no regrets. You take responsibility for your actions.
quotes.name: Ron Moody

quotes.message: Work hard, do your best, live the truth, trust yourself, have some fun...and you'll have no regrets.
quotes.name: Byrd Bagget

quotes.message: I have no regrets. Regrets are meaningless. You can't change yesterday or tomorrow. You can change only this present moment.
quotes.name: Richey Edwards

quotes.message: There's no point in regretting things. If you can't do the time, don't do the crime. Life's too short to worry about things I've said.
quotes.name: Robbie Williams

quotes.message: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only good for wallowing in.
quotes.name: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.message: No regrets. No looking back. Just hold onto life and move forward. We have no way of knowing what lies ahead...and that is what makes the journey even more exciting.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: I have no regrets. I will never regret loving someone because the feeling of love for five minutes is greater than an eternity of hurt.
quotes.name: Kurt Langner

quotes.message: Never regret. IF IT'S GOOD, It's wonderful. IF IT'S BAD, IT'S experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: At the end of the day let their be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
quotes.name: Noel Dejesus

quotes.message: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.name: Rita Mero

quotes.message: Never look back and regret, look back and smile at what you have learned.
quotes.name: Michelle C. Ustaszeski

quotes.message: I don't dwell in the past; I don't wallow in old events and emotions. I don't waste time on regret. No use going over and over the details of what already happened.
quotes.name: Yanni

quotes.message: I don't have time for regrets, only fun.
quotes.name: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.message: I have no regrets. I don't believe in looking back. What I am proudest of? Working really hard... and achieving as much as I could.
quotes.name: Elena Kagan

quotes.message: I already gave my best. I have no regrets at all.
quotes.name: William Hung

quotes.message: Accept everything about yourself - I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.name: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.message: I never regret anything. Because every little detail of your life is what made you into who you are in the end.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
quotes.name: Montel

quotes.message: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: We should have no regrets. ... The past is finished. There is nothing to be gained by going over it. Whatever it gave us in the experiences it brought us was something we had to know.
quotes.name: Rebecca Beard

quotes.message: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.name: Jonathan Larson

quotes.message: Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: In looking back, I see nothing to regret and little to correct.
quotes.name: John C. Calhoun

quotes.message: Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.
quotes.name: Armand Hammer

quotes.message: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.name: George Halas

quotes.message: Regret for wasted time is more wasted time.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: If I should die tomorrow, I will have no regrets. I did what I wanted to do. You can't expect more from life.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never regret anything you have done with a sincere affection; nothing is lost that is born of the heart.
quotes.name: Basil Rathbone

quotes.message: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
quotes.name: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.message: Regrets are just expired Dreams.. Throw them out.
quotes.name: Kinyo

quotes.message: If I'm sincere today, what does it matter if I regret it tomorrow?
quotes.name: Jos Saramago

quotes.message: In a world where death is the hunter, my friend, there is no time for regrets or doubts. There is only time for decisions.
quotes.name: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.message: Living in the moment, without attaching yourself to regrets about yesterday or worries about tomorrow, goes a long way toward cutting through the chaos of everyday life.
quotes.name: Eve Adamson

quotes.message: Do it right, regret nothing.
quotes.name: Vanna Bonta

quotes.message: Do not anxiously expect what is not yet come; do not vainly regret what is already past.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: You'd think, 'What if I make a mistake today, I'll regret it'. I don't believe in regret, I feel everything leads us to where we are and we have to just jump forward, mean well, commit and just see what happens.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Has this world been so kind to you that you should leave with regret? There are better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: I want to live my life so that my nights are not full of regrets.
quotes.name: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.message: Don't waste today regretting yesterday instead of making a memory for tomorrow.
quotes.name: Laura Palmer

quotes.message: This day is all that is good and fair. It is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: You must never regret what might have been. The past that did not happen is as hidden from us as the future we cannot see.
quotes.name: Richard Martin Stern

quotes.message: Were it not better to forget than to remember and regret?
quotes.name: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.message: We can't afford to waste tears on might-have-beens. We need to turn the tears into sweat that can take us to what can be.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: We must not weep for what might have been. There is still time.
quotes.name: Edward Matchett

quotes.message: Our biggest regrets are not for the things we have done but for the things we haven't done.
quotes.name: Chad Michael Murray

quotes.message: Be wise today so you don’t cry tomorrow.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: The only regret I will have in dying is if it is not for love.
quotes.name: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.message: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.name: George Sand

quotes.message: Unfortunately, the clock is ticking, the hours are going by. The past increases, the future recedes. Possibilities decreasing, regrets mounting.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.name: Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.message: One of my main regrets in life is giving considerable thought to inconsiderate people.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: You can't regret the life you didn't lead.
quotes.name: Junot Díaz

quotes.message: Of all the words of mice and men, the saddest are, It might have been.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: Speak when you are angry – and you’ll make the best speech you’ll ever regret.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: There’s always failure. And there’s always disappointment. And there’s always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.name: Michael J. Fox

quotes.message: Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: I'm done with those; regrets are an excuse for people who have failed.
quotes.name: Ned Vizzini

quotes.message: You’re not living if you’re not regretting.
quotes.name: Nicola Yoon

quotes.message: The past could always be annihilated. Regret, denial, or forgetfulness could do that. But the future was inevitable.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde.

quotes.message: When you find your path, you must not be afraid. You need to have sufficient courage to make mistakes. Disappointment, defeat, and despair are the tools God uses to show us the way.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you’re useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
quotes.name: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.message: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: One day, perhaps, you will see for yourself that regrets are as nothing. The value lies in how they are answered.
quotes.name: Steven Erikson

quotes.message: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: I trust in God, and His ways are not our ways. So we have to go with that, and there's nothing I can do about that.
quotes.name: Cissy Houston

quotes.message: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Faith in God is an opening up, a letting go, a deep trust, a free act of love but sometimes it was so hard to love.
quotes.name: Yann Martel

quotes.message: Hold fast to your faith. Keep your hope in the Lord. Embrace the love of God.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Faith is all about trusting God even when you don't understand His plan.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
quotes.name: David Brainerd

quotes.message: Faith is not the belief that everything will be all right tomorrow, but the belief that I possess the strength to make everything all right today.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: Put up your guards, keep faith in God, I promise you all the world will be ours.
quotes.name: Puff Daddy

quotes.message: God doesn't change his word, if He has promised you something;you better believe that is done before it's existence.
quotes.name: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.message: He knows that as long as a man keeps his faith in God and in himself nothing can permanently defeat him.
quotes.name: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.message: Faith in God includes faith in God's timing.
quotes.name: Neal A Maxwell

quotes.message: Through faith in the Lord Jesus alone can we obtain forgiveness of our sins, and be at peace with God; but, believing in Jesus, we become, through this very faith, the children of God; have God as our Father, and may come to Him for all the temporal and spiritual blessings which we need.
quotes.name: George Muller

quotes.message: Faith in God necessarily implies a lack of faith in humanity.
quotes.name: Barbara G. Walker

quotes.message: Build a strong faith in God through daily commitment in reading and obeying God's word.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: A living faith in God means acceptance of the brotherhood of mankind.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You can believe in God without believing in immortality, but it is hard to see how anyone can believe in immortality and not believe in God.
quotes.name: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.message: Trusting God means looking beyond what we can see to what God sees.
quotes.name: Charles Stanley

quotes.message: If you need all the answers to trust God, you are not really trusting God.
quotes.name: David McGee

quotes.message: The danger of loss of faith in God is not that one will believe in nothing, but rather that one will believe in anything.
quotes.name: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.message: The great thing about faith in God is that it keeps a man undisturbed in the midst of disturbance.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: You don't have any problems, all you need is faith in God.
quotes.name: R. W. Schambach

quotes.message: Faith in God is the instrument which enables men and women to remove the hills of difficulty which block their path.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: The grace,faith,love and power of God will uplift you to greater heights.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Keep the faith. The vision is always for the appointed time. Be patient, prayerful and wait for the fulfillment of your visions.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The word hope I take for faith; and indeed hope is nothing else but the constancy of faith.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: If our faith in God is not the veriest sham, it demands, and will produce, the abandonment sometimes, the subordination always, of eternal helps and material good.
quotes.name: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.message: This is true faith, a living confidence in the goodness of God.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Having faith in God means trusting in Him even when everything inside of you wants to take control.
quotes.name: Dan Ellis

quotes.message: Faith in God life can never take you by surprise again.
quotes.name: James Dobson

quotes.message: As believers in Jesus Christ, our work is to believe while God works on our behalf.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Faith in God means believing absolutely in something with no proof whatsoever. Faith in humanity means believing absolutely in something with a huge amount of proof to the contrary. We are the true believers.
quotes.name: Joss Whedon

quotes.message: Having faith doesn't mean I have all the answers. It means trusting God especially in the midst of uncertainty.
quotes.name: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.message: To be a strong and empathetic person always requires us to trust that God will send angels to the people's heart we tried to reach, but couldn't.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: His faith was like the radar of a bat, it took him through the darkness that surrounded him. It would guide him through everything that evil would throw at him. When his body gave up, God's powers lifted him up and kept his heart thumping.
quotes.name: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.message: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Many things are possible for the person who has hope. Even more is possible for the person who has faith. And still more is possible for the person who knows how to love. But everything is possible for the person who practices all three virtues.
quotes.name: Brother Lawrence

quotes.message: Everyone who believes in God at all believes that he knows what you and I are going to do tomorrow.
quotes.name: C S Lewis

quotes.message: To have faith in Christ means more than simply despising the delights of this life. It means we should bear all our daily trials that may bring us sorrow, distress, or unhappiness, and bear them patiently for as long as God wishes and until He comes to visit us. For it is said, I waited on the Lord and He came to me.
quotes.name: Symeon the New Theologian

quotes.message: Having faith in God did not mean sitting back and doing nothing. It meant believing you would find success if you did your best honestly and energetically.
quotes.name: Ken Follett

quotes.message: Only faith in God and trust in Him give us the strength to endure and obtain victory.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: There is never a moment when God is not in control. Relax! He's got you covered.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Even faith in God is only a stage on the way. Ultimately you abandon all, for you come to something so simple that there are no words to express it.
quotes.name: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.message: Let your life reflect the faith you have in God. Fear nothing and pray about everything. Be strong, trust God's word, and trust the process.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: Don’t be scared of anything. Trust in the Lord and face the battle of life. There is no power on earth that can lay you low.
quotes.name: Dada J.P. Vaswani

quotes.message: When gloomy clouds across the sky . Cast shadows o'er the land, . Bright rays of hope illumine my path, . For Jesus holds my hand.
quotes.name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.message: The will of God wouldn’t take you, where His grace wouldn’t protect you.
quotes.name: Gloria Shalom

quotes.message: The situations that will stretch your faith most will be those times when life falls apart and God is nowhere to be found.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: So keep your faith in the God above, and faith in the righteous truth, . it shall bring you back to the absent love, and the joys of a vanished youth.
quotes.name: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.message: Prayer will change a heartache into a cheerful song, . If in faith you ask it, the answer will soon come 'long.
quotes.name: Eldred Herbert

quotes.message: My faith didn't remove the pain, but it got me through the pain. Trusting God didn't diminish or vanquish the anguish, but it enabled me to endure it.
quotes.name: Robert Rogers

quotes.message: Faith is not only daring to believe, it is also daring to act. When I believe in myself as a son of God, I attribute to all men the same quality. This goes for men of every class, creed and color. The proof that I believe this way will be measured by the way I act towards others.
quotes.name: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.message: God is capable of discerning the thoughts and intents of the heart, and answers prayers of faith both spoken and unspoken. It's all about faith.
quotes.name: Luis Ranzolin

quotes.message: The beginning of anxiety is the end of faith, and the beginning of faith is the end of anxiety.
quotes.name: George Miller

quotes.message: A tree is shown by its fruits, and in the same way those who profess to belong to Christ will be seen by what they do. For what is needed is not mere present professions, but perseverance to the end in the power of faith.
quotes.name: Ignatius of Antioch

quotes.message: What greater rebellion, impiety, or insult to God can there be than not to believe his promises?
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: When principles that run against your deepest convictions begin to win the day, then battle is your calling, and peace has become sin; you must, at the price of dearest peace, lay your convictions bare before friend and enemy, with all the fire of your faith.
quotes.name: Abraham Kuyper

quotes.message: If anyone cannot set his mind at rest by disregarding death, that man should know that he has not yet gone far enough in the faith of Christ.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: Catch on fire with enthusiasm and people will come for miles to watch you burn.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: Faith enables the believing soul to treat the future as present and the invisible as seen.
quotes.name: J. Oswald Sanders

quotes.message: Probabilities are the big temptation when it comes to exercising faith.
quotes.name: Miles Stanford

quotes.message: Firstly I believe in the reality of God as the centre of human aspiration and history. What I believe about man, made in the image of God, derives first and foremost from what I believe about God.
quotes.name: David Sheppard

quotes.message: I believe in Jesus Christ, in whom I get a picture of God within the limits of my comprehension. Upon Him rests the whole fabric of my life. He alone holds it together in form and purpose, and without Him it would disintegrate.
quotes.name: Hugh Redwood

quotes.message: When I believe, I am no longer a mere man, I am already a son of God.
quotes.name: Carlo Carretto

quotes.message: He does not believe, that does not live according to his Belief.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: There comes a time when we have to believe where we cannot prove, and to accept where we cannot understand. If, even in the darkest hour, we believe that somehow there is a purpose in life, and that somehow that purpose is love, then even the unbearable becomes bearable, and even in the darkness there is still a glimmer of light.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: I believe in one God, the creator of the universe. That he governs it by his Providence. That he ought to be worshipped. That the most acceptable service we can render to him is doing good to his other children.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Religious faith does not consist in supposing that there is a God. It consists in personal trust in God rising to personal fellowship with God.
quotes.name: William Temple

quotes.message: The only faith that wears well and holds its colour in all weathers is that which is woven of conviction and set with the sharp mordant of experience.
quotes.name: J. R. Lowell

quotes.message: To have faith is to meet the world with the conviction that in spite of all its ambiguities and its downright evils, there can be discerned in it the reality of love and a ground of hope.
quotes.name: John Macquarrie

quotes.message: Proofs are the last thing looked for by a truly religious mind which feels the imaginative fitness of its faith and knows instinctively that, in such a manner, imaginative fitness is all that can be required.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: One in whom persuasion and belief . Had ripened into faith, and faith become . A passionate intuition.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: That man is perfect in faith who can come to God in the utter dearth of his feelings and his desires, without a glow or an inspiration, with the weight of low thoughts, failures, neglects, and wandering forgetfulness, and say to him, 'Thou art my refuge, because thou art my home.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: How do we stand in respect of our use of the watch-tower of Faith? Are we so busy on the ground floor that we take it for granted, and seldom go upstairs? It is true that those stairs are dark and steep; but if we never make the effort, never ascend to the soul's summit, we remain something less than human.
quotes.name: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.message: The creeds are not objects of faith; they are expressions of a faith of which Christ is the object, and in regard to all such personal relationships there is scope for at least a great width of intellectual movement as we seek more and more perfectly to understand and to interpret the character with which we are confronted.
quotes.name: William Temple

quotes.message: Faith literally means to 'give up, surrender, or commit.' Faith is complete confidence.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Faith of our fathers, living still, . In spite of dungeon, fire, and sword; . O how our hearts beat high with joy . When e'er we hear that glorious word! . Faith of our fathers, holy faith! . We will be true to thee until death.
quotes.name: Carolyn Craig Franklin

quotes.message: Busy not yourself in looking forward to the events of to-morrow; but whatever may be those of the days Providence may yet assign you neglect not to turn them to advantage.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Procrastination is like a credit card; it's a lot fun until you get the bill.
quotes.name: Christopher Parker

quotes.message: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.name: Sydney Harris

quotes.message: Stop procrastinating, stop feeling guilty and just do it!
quotes.name: Bastiaan Blikman

quotes.message: Procrastinating does nothing more than add to your do list.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Procrastination can guard against making the wrong choice too soon. Or it could just be mental laziness.
quotes.name: Pepper Hume

quotes.message: Procrastination is my sin. It brings me naught but sorrow. I know that I should stop it.
quotes.name: Gloria Pitzer

quotes.message: Procrastination is something best put off until tomorrow.
quotes.name: Gerald Vaughan

quotes.message: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
quotes.name: Baltasar Graci

quotes.message: Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Don't put off until tomorrow what can be done today. Procrastination is a sign of weak character.
quotes.name: Carol Cox

quotes.message: Procrastination is the soul rebelling against entrapment.
quotes.name: Nassim N. Taleb

quotes.message: He who hesitates is last.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Procrastination is a sign of a perfectionist.
quotes.name: P. J. Kennedy

quotes.message: It's easy to get distracted and procrastinate sometimes, but you can make it happen.
quotes.name: Danny Yann

quotes.message: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
quotes.name: Roy Bennett

quotes.message: The greatest thief this world has ever produced is procrastination, and he is still at large.
quotes.name: Henry Wheelter Shaw

quotes.message: My evil genius Procrastination has whispered me to tarry 'til a more convenient season.
quotes.name: Mary Todd Lincoln

quotes.message: Don't postpone joy until you have learned all of your lessons. Joy is your lesson.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Procrastination is also a subtle act of corruption â€“ it corrupts valuable time
quotes.name: Amit Abraham

quotes.message: Vagueness and procrastination are ever a comfort to the frail in spirit.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Procrastination may not take up a lot of effort physically but without you knowing it, it takes over the mind.
quotes.name: Stephen Hall

quotes.message: You may not be punished for your procrastination, but for sure you will be punished by your procrastination.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: The problem with procrastination is it's been around since the beginning of time it seems.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Procrastination is the foundation of all disasters.
quotes.name: Pandora Poikilos

quotes.message: Doing just a little bit during the time we have available puts you that much further ahead than if you took no action at all.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: The greatest amount of wasted time is the time not getting started.
quotes.name: Dawson Trotman

quotes.message: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday
quotes.name: Don Marquis

quotes.message: Happy soul and a hardcore procrastinator seeking truth.
quotes.name: Pallav Gautam

quotes.message: Procrastination is the thief of time, collar him.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: If you procrastinate when faced with a big difficult problem break the problem into parts, and handle one part at a time.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I can't think about that right now. If I do, I'll go crazy. I'll think about that tomorrow.
quotes.name: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.message: Procrastinate now, don't put it off.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: Procrastination is opportunity's natural assassin.
quotes.name: Victor Kiam

quotes.message: Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no avoidance in delay.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Delay is the deadliest form of denial.
quotes.name: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.message: If you are always saying I'll do it to tomorrow, than your tomorrow will than turn into another day and so on, and so, etc. etc.
quotes.name: Victoria Addino

quotes.message: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: If you put off everything till you're sure of it, you'll never get anything done.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Never postpone until tomorrow what you can postpone until the day after.
quotes.name: Raoul Wallenberg

quotes.message: Procrastinators are the painters of tomorrow.
quotes.name: Rick Rotante

quotes.message: Procrastination is a ring on every man's finger.
quotes.name: Trebonianus Gallus

quotes.message: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: In delay there lies no plenty.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: In the ordinary business of life punctuality is . . . necessary.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Punctuality is the duty of subjects and the politeness of kings.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Punctuality is the first step towards success.
quotes.name: Nishtunishaa

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: Promptitude is not only a duty, but is also a part of good manners; it is favorable to fortune, reputation, influence, and usefulness; a little attention and energy will form the habit, so as to make it easy and delightful.

quotes.message: Punctuality is a quality the need of which is bound up with social co-operation. It has nothing to do with the relation of the soul to God, or with mystic insight, or with any of the matters with which the more elevated and spiritual moralists are concerned.

quotes.message: The most indispensable qualification of a cook is punctuality. The same must be said of guests.

quotes.message: Punctuality is not just limited to arriving at a place at right time, it is also about taking actions at right time.

quotes.message: Arriving late is a way of saying that your own time is more valuable than the time of the person who waited for you.
quotes.name: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.message: Few things tend more to alienate friendship than a want of punctuality in our engagements. I have known the breach of a promise to dine or sup to break up more than one intimacy.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: One good thing about punctuality is that it's a sure way to help you enjoy a few minutes of privacy.
quotes.name: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.message: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no delay, no procrastination; never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

quotes.message: So long as we think of it objectively, time is Fate or Chance, the factor in our lives for which we are not responsible, and about which we can do nothing; but when we begin to think of it subjectively, we feel responsible for our time, and the notion of punctuality arises.

quotes.message: Even if a farmer intends to loaf, he gets up in time to get an early start.
quotes.name: E W Howe

quotes.message: Tardiness often robs us opportunity, and the dispatch of our forces.

quotes.message: Punctuality is the art of guessing how late the other fellow is going to be.
quotes.name: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.message: Punctuality is the thief of adventure.

quotes.message: If you are 15 minutes early, you are on time. If you are on time, you are late and if you are late, you didn't want to be there.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you're there before it's over, you're on time.
quotes.name: James J. Walker

quotes.message: Method and punctuality are so little natural to man that where they exist they are commonly the effect of education or discipline.

quotes.message: Preparedness and punctuality are two of the most important qualities of a leader.

quotes.message: Method is the very hinge of business, and there is no method without punctuality.

quotes.message: It is no use running; to set out betimes is the main point.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Punctuality is the politeness of kings.

quotes.message: Punctuality is one of the cardinal business virtues: always insist on it in your subordinates.

quotes.message: Want of punctuality is a want of virtue.

quotes.message: Punctuality is closely related to faithfulness and dependability. Being tardy can be linked to uninterest, apathy, slothfulness and procrastination...

quotes.message: Punctuality is not about being on time, it's basically about respecting your own commitments.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Punctuality is an essential trait of the teacher. It is a foundation, not an embellishment.

quotes.message: Strict punctuality is perhaps the cheapest virtue which can give force to an otherwise utterly insignificant character.
quotes.name: J. F. Boyes.

quotes.message: Punctuality is the sole of business.
quotes.name: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.message: The habit of being uniformly considerate toward others will bring increased happiness to you. As you put into practice the qualities of patience, punctuality, sincerity and solicitude, you will have a better opinion of the world about you.
quotes.name: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.message: But Time, unfortunately, though it makes animals and vegetables bloom and fade with amazing punctuality has no such simple effect upon the mind of man.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Punctuality is the thief of time.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Punctuality is a compliment you pay to the intelligent and a rebuke you pay to the stupid.

quotes.message: Punctuality is a virtue, if you don't mind being lonely.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: It is difficult to prove yourself reliable when people are required to wait for you.
quotes.name: Wes Fesler

quotes.message: Punctuality is the stern virtue of men of business, and the graceful courtesy of princes.

quotes.message: Perhaps punctuality is a quality made even more valuable because it is found in so few people. Punctuality is not usually thought of in our day as a major virtue.

quotes.message: Unfaithfulness in the keeping of an appointment is an act of clear dishonesty. You may as well borrow a person's money as his time.

quotes.message: To be on time is to be late. To be early is to be on time.

quotes.message: In the tyranny of time, schedules and routines are ministers teaching us punctuality.
quotes.name: Srishti Halder

quotes.message: Punctuality means doing something in an appointed period of time
quotes.name: Noopur Saini

quotes.message: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
quotes.name: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.message: Punctuality: the art of guessing how late the other person is going to be.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: I am believer in punctuality, though it makes me lonely.
quotes.name: E.V Lucas

quotes.message: I have often noticed that the people who are late are often so much jollier than the people who have to wait for them.
quotes.name: E.V Lucas

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that there's nobody there to appreciate it.

quotes.message: If you are there before it is over, you are on time.

quotes.message: Punctuality at work prepares you to face the inevitable and grab opportunities in time.

quotes.message: My motto is: be punctual, or don't be.

quotes.message: Punctuality is the vice of virtuous women.

quotes.message: Beginning of a great day begins a night before.

quotes.message: Self discipline, punctuality and time management are very important - for life is short, and every resource you have must be well utilized so that you find enlightenment and liberation - your ultimate goal.

quotes.message: You come most carefully upon your hour.

quotes.message: The only way of catching a train I have ever discovered is to miss the train before.

quotes.message: An artist must organize his life. Here is the exact timetable of my daily activities. Get up: 7.18 am; be inspired: 10.23 to 11.47 am. I take lunch at 12.11 pm and leave the table at 12.14 pm.

quotes.message: But think how early I go.

quotes.message: We must leave exactly on time... From now on everything must function to perfection.

quotes.message: Punctuality is a great virtue in the school of success.

quotes.message: A fair exchange is no robbery.

quotes.message: A friend's eye is a good mirror.
quotes.name: Gaelic

quotes.message: A loan though old is not a gift.

quotes.message: Caesar's wife must be above suspicion.

quotes.message: Honesty pays, but it doesn't seem to pay enough to suit some people.

quotes.message: Meeting the deadlines is not good enough, beating the deadlines is my expectation.

quotes.message: Today we often use deadlinesâ€”real and imaginaryâ€”to imprison ourselves.

quotes.name: Bill Walsh

quotes.message: Empower your dreams with deadlines.

quotes.message: Deadlines are things that we pass through on the way to finishing.

quotes.message: A goal without a deadline is just a dream.

quotes.message: Deadlines are meant to be broken. And I just keep breaking them.

quotes.message: Inspiration is for amateurs. professionals work everyday. Personally the best inspiration is a deadline.

quotes.message: GOALS are dreams with deadlines, and without those deadlines, our dreams are dead in the water.

quotes.message: I've learned over decades of building that a deadline is a potent tool for problem-solving.
quotes.name: Adam Savage

quotes.message: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.

quotes.message: Esteem cannot be where there is no confidence, and there can be no confidence where there is no respect.

quotes.message: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.

quotes.message: Low self-esteem is no better home to take a refuge.

quotes.message: Sometimes people with low self-esteem will try to punish you for caring about them.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: Most people with low self-esteem have earned it.

quotes.message: I think high self-esteem is overrated. A little low self-esteem is actually quite good. Maybe you're not the best, so you should work a little harder.

quotes.message: Lack of confidence is what makes you want to change somebody else's mind. When you're OK, you don't need to convince anyone else in order to empower yourself.

quotes.message: It's not the lack of ability or opportunity that holds you back; it is only a lack of confidence in yourself.

quotes.message: When you are in the grips of low self-esteem, it's painful, and it certainly doesn't feel like pride. But I believe that this is the dark, quieter side of pride thwarted pride.

quotes.message: There is no such thing as perfect security, only varying levels of insecurity.

quotes.message: Most bad behaviour comes from insecurity.

quotes.message: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.

quotes.message: Of all the traps and pitfalls in life, self-disesteem is the deadliest, and the hardest to overcome, for it is a pit designed and dug by our own hands, summed up in the phrase, 'It's no use - I can't do it.

quotes.message: Diffidence is a sort of false modesty.
quotes.name: Thackeray

quotes.message: Diffidence is not always innocence
quotes.name: Mme. Necker

quotes.message: Mere bashfulness without merit is awkward.

quotes.message: Bashfulness is an ornament to youth, but a reproach to old age.

quotes.message: Bashfulness is a great hindrance to a man, both in uttering his sentiments and in understanding what is proposed to him; 't is therefore good to press forward with discretion, both in discourse and company of the better sort.

quotes.message: Bashfulness may sometimes exclude pleasure, but seldom opens any avenue to sorrow or remorse.

quotes.name: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.message: The distrust of wit is the beginning of tyranny.

quotes.message: Timidity is a fault for which it is dangerous to reprove persons whom we wish to correct of it.

quotes.message: Timidity is a disease of the mind.
quotes.name: Dr. Johnson

quotes.message: Timidity challenges the scorn of women.
quotes.name: Massias

quotes.message: I feel self-doubt whether I'm doing something hard or easy.
quotes.name: Sigourney Weaver

quotes.message: I'm full of self-doubt. I doubt everything I do. Everything I do is a failure.
quotes.name: John Banville

quotes.message: I am incredibly self-deprecating. It stems from self-doubt.
quotes.name: Charlie Cox

quotes.message: Self distrust is good, but only if it leads to trust in God. Otherwise it ends as spiritual paralysis, inability and unwillingness to undertake any course of action.
quotes.name: Alan Cole

quotes.message: Self-doubt kills talent.
quotes.name: Edie McClurg

quotes.message: I know it when I don't know it. Sometimes I know it when I don't think I know it. I need to trust myself in these moments, these rare moments of self-doubt.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Self-doubt inflicts the deepest wounds.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Excessive fear and self-doubt that were the greatest detractors of personal genius.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Diffidence is the right eye of prudence.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I sometimes lack confidence in public, although I am proud enough inwardly.
quotes.name: Robert Schumann

quotes.message: Low self esteem involves imagining the worst that other people can think about you.
quotes.name: Roger Ebert

quotes.message: A college degree is the key to realizing the American dream, well worth the financial sacrifice because it is supposed to open the door to a world of opportunity.
quotes.name: Dan Rather

quotes.message: To me, the American Dream is being able to follow your own personal calling. To be able to do what you want to do is incredible freedom.
quotes.name: Maya Lin

quotes.message: Socialism never took root in America because the poor see themselves not as an exploited proletariat but as temporarily embarrassed millionaires.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: The American Dream is to not have to work, so with unemployment at record levels, you'd think more people would be excited and grateful for the government intervention that got us to this glorious economic point.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: Americans believe that they still live in the land of opportunity - the country that offers the greatest chance of economic advancement. But this is no longer the case.
quotes.name: Erik Brynjolfsson and Andrew McAfee

quotes.message: The American dream is, in part, responsible for a great deal of crime and violence because people feel that the country owes them not only a living but a good living.
quotes.name: David Abrahansen

quotes.message: There are those who will say that the liberation of humanity, the freedom of man and mind is nothing but a dream. They are right. It is the American Dream.
quotes.name: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.message: People are so busy dreaming the American Dream, fantasizing about what they could be or have a right to be, that they're all asleep at the switch. Consequently we are living in the Age of Human Error.
quotes.name: Florence King

quotes.message: It's called the American dream because you have to be asleep to believe it.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: Seeking the invisible through the imagery of the visible, the Americans never can get quite all the way to the end of the American dream.
quotes.name: Lewis H. Lapham

quotes.message: I say to you today, my friends, so even though we face the difficulties of today and tomorrow, I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: 'We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men are created equal.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: The American Dream has run out of gas. The car has stopped. It no longer supplies the world with its images, its dreams, its fantasies. No more. It's over.
quotes.name: J.G. Ballard.

quotes.message: A great wave of oppressive tyranny isn't going to strike, but rather a slow seepage of oppressive laws and regulations from within will sink the American dream of liberty.
quotes.name: George Baumler

quotes.message: If the American dream is for Americans only, it will remain our dream and never be our destiny.
quotes.name: Rene de Visme Williamson

quotes.message: American Dreams are strongest in the hearts of those who have seen America only in their dreams
quotes.name: Pico Iyer

quotes.message: When it comes to the american dream, no one has a corner on the market. All of us have an equal chance to share in that dream.
quotes.name: J C Watts

quotes.message: I am living proof that the american dream still exists. It is still alive and well. There is only one trick, you have to be willing to roll up your sleeves and work very, very hard.
quotes.name: Paula Deen

quotes.message: That's what we do in this country. That's the american dream. That's freedom, and I'll take it any day over the supervision and sanctimony of the central planners.
quotes.name: Paul Ryan

quotes.message: No social system in any country will bring us happiness, health and prosperity unless it is inspired by something greater than materialism.
quotes.name: Clement R. Attlee

quotes.message: We believe that what matters most is not narrow appeals masquerading as values, but the shared values that show the true face of America; not narrow values that divide us, but the shared values that unite us: family, faith, hard work, opportunity and responsibility for all, so that every child, every adult, every parent, every worker in America has an equal shot at living up to their God-given potential. That is the American dream and the American value.
quotes.name: Senator John Kerry

quotes.message: Build up your credit. Build up your self-esteem. Build up your bank account. Moving up in the scene.
quotes.name: Christine Anderson

quotes.message: In this remarkable time for the world, I refuse to believe it's time to stop believing in the possibilities of our remarkable country. I refuse to accept the downsizing of the American Dream. I refuse to bet against American entrepreneurial spirit and American ingenuity.The competition's tough, and it requires us to be tougher - tough-minded, never hard hearted.
