quotes.message: Think positively and masterfully, with confidence and faith, and life become more secure, more fraught with action, richer in experience and achievement.
quotes.name: Edward Rickenbacker

quotes.message: Positive thinking creates ingenuity and originality. Negative thinking cripples imagination and creativity.
quotes.name: T.P.Chia

quotes.message: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.name: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.name: Herm Albright

quotes.message: When you consistently maintain a positive frame of mind, you'll become known as a problem solver rather than a complainer. People avoid complainers. They seek out problem solvers.
quotes.name: Joseph Sommerville

quotes.message: We are responsible for what we are, and whatever we wish ourselves to be, we have the power to make ourselves.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Fill your mind with light, happiness, hope, feelings of security and strength, and soon your life will reflect these qualities.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: With everything that has happened to you, you can either feel sorry for yourself or treat what has happened as a gift. Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose.
quotes.name: Wayne W Dyer

quotes.message: Your positivity can become a castle around you which will protect you from the arrow of negativity.
quotes.name: Gurudev Shree Chitrabhanu

quotes.message: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: You must not allow yourself to dwell for a single moment on any kind of negative thought.
quotes.name: Emmet Fox

quotes.message: Positive thinking is powerful thinking. If you want happiness, fulfillment, success and inner peace, start thinking you have the power to achieve those things. Focus on the bright side of life and expect positive results.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: The power of positive thinking is like a car with a powerful engine that can take you to the summit of a mountain.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: What is the difference between an obstacle and an opportunity? Our attitude toward it.
quotes.name: J. Sidlow Baxter

quotes.message: Live as if your prayers are to be answered.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Positive anything is better than negative thinking.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Being in a positive state of mind is more important than you might think as the mind cannot be creative in a negative state. New ideas,thoughts and inspiration will only take place when the mind is positive.
quotes.name: Joe Hinchliffe

quotes.message: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: Positive thinking means expecting, believing, and visualizing what you want to achieve. It means seeing in your mind's eye the thing you want, as an accomplished fact.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: The difference between can and cannot are only three letters. Three letters that determine your life's direction.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
quotes.name: LeBron James

quotes.message: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Failure is the foundation of success, and the means by which it is achieved.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.name: James Joyce

quotes.message: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.name: H.G. Wells

quotes.message: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fail.
quotes.name: Confucious

quotes.message: Negative results are just what I want. They're just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don't.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
quotes.name: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.message: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: There's always failure. And there's always disappointment. And there's always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.name: Michael J. Fox

quotes.message: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.name: Truman Capote

quotes.message: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With positive mental attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: If you try to be anyone but yourself, you will fail; if you are not true to your own heart, you will fail. Then again, there's no success like failure.
quotes.name: Bob Dylan

quotes.message: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you're good at.
quotes.name: Louis C.K.

quotes.message: Any man can make mistakes, but only an idiot persists in his error.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Failure after long perseverance is much grander than never to have a striving good enough to be called a failure.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.name: Johnny Cash

quotes.message: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
quotes.name: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.message: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: You have committed a double mistake, firstly by not keeping the engagement yesterday and secondly, by coming when you were not expected.
quotes.name: Visvesvaraya

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: If at first you don't succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.
quotes.name: Steven Wright

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to fail. Don't waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It's ok to fail. If you're not failing, you're not growing.
quotes.name: H. Stanley Judd

quotes.message: My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them.
quotes.name: Jack Kerouac

quotes.message: I thank God for my failures. Maybe not at the time but after some reflection. I never feel like a failure just because something I tried has failed.
quotes.name: Dolly Parton

quotes.message: Life is full of screwups. You're supposed to fail sometimes. It's a required part of the human existance.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of a greater or equal benefit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The wise say that our failure is to form habits: for habit is the mark of a stereotyped world.
quotes.name: Anthony C. Grayling

quotes.message: Why do I talk about the benefits of failure? Simply because failure meant a stripping away of the inessential. I stopped pretending to myself that I was anything other than what I was and began to direct all my energy into finishing the only work that mattered to me.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Failing to prepare is preparing to fail.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Far better is it to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure... than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy nor suffer much, because they live in a gray twilight that knows not victory nor defeat.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
quotes.name: Anne Roiphe

quotes.message: Grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.name: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.message: Grief is perhaps an unknown territory for you. You might feel both helpless and hopeless without a sense of a 'map' for the journey. Confusion is the hallmark of a transition. To rebuild both your inner and outer world is a major project.
quotes.name: Anne Grant

quotes.message: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: In times of grief and sorrow I will hold you and rock you and take your grief and make it my own. When you cry I cry and when you hurt I hurt.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: They say time heals all wounds, but that presumes the source of the grief is finite.
quotes.name: Cassandra Clare

quotes.message: Grief is not as heavy as guilt, but it takes more away from you.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: Grieving is a journey that teaches us how to love in a new way now that our loved one is no longer with us. Consciously remembering those who have died is the key that opens the hearts, that allows us to love them in new ways.
quotes.name: Tom Attig

quotes.message: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak.
quotes.name: Henry Wordsworth

quotes.message: Grief is not a disorder, a disease or a sign of weakness. It is an emotional, physical and spiritual necessity, the price you pay for love. The only cure for grief is to grieve.
quotes.name: Earl Grollman

quotes.message: All things grow with time -- except grief.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: Grief is light that is capable of counsel.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Mourning is not forgetting... It is an undoing. Every minute tie has to be untied and something permanent and valuable recovered and assimilated from the dust. The end is gain, of course. Blessed are they that mourn, for theyshall be made strong, in fact. But the process is like all other human births, painful and long and dangerous.
quotes.name: Margery Allingham

quotes.message: Grief is hard on friendships, but it doesn't have to be. Sometimes, all it takes is a little honesty between friends. If we gently and lovingly explain what we need from the relationship during our time of grief, and what we are willing to do in return, we can turn even a lukewarm friendship into something special.
quotes.name: Margaret Brownley

quotes.message: One often calms one's grief by recounting it.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: Tears are the silent language of grief.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Grief makes one hour ten.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.name: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.message: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: We all want to do something to mitigate the pain of loss or to turn grief into something positive, to find a silver lining in the clouds. But I believe there is real value in just standing there, being still, being sad.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: But grieving people are selfish. They won't let you comfort them and they say you don't understand and they make you feel useless when all your life you've been functional to them.
quotes.name: Melina Marchetta

quotes.message: That was the hard thing about grief, and the grieving. They spoke another language, and the words we knew always fell short of what we wanted them to say.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: Grieving, like being blind, is a strange business; you have to learn how to do it. We seek company in mourning, but after the early bursts of tears, after the praises have been spoken, and the good days remembered, and the lament cried, and the grave closed, there is no company in grief. It is a burden borne alone.
quotes.name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.message: Deep grief sometimes is almost like a specific location, a coordinate on a map of time. When you are standing in that forest of sorrow, you cannot imagine that you could ever find your way to a better place. But if someone can assure you that they themselves have stood in that same place, and now have moved on, sometimes this will bring hope.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: It is true that the grief journey is very lonely, but it is also up to you to decide just how lonely you will make it.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Berrien

quotes.message: To spare oneself from grief at all cost can be achieved only at the price of total detachment, which excludes the ability to experience happiness.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: While grief is fresh, every attempt to divert only irritates. You must wait till it be digested, and then amusement will dissipate the remains of it.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The time you spend grieving over a man should never exceed the amount of time you actually spent with him.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Since every death diminishes us a little, we grieve - not so much for the death as for ourselves.
quotes.name: Lynn Caine

quotes.message: He that conceals his grief finds no remedy for it.
quotes.name: Turkish Proverb

quotes.message: Tearless grief bleeds inwardly.
quotes.name: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.message: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: If you suppress grief too much it can well redouble.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: Grief can take care of itself, but to get the full value of joy must have somebody to divide it with.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: In private grief with careless scorn. In public seem to triumph and not to mourn.
quotes.name: John C. Granville

quotes.message: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always be.
quotes.name: Nigella Lawson

quotes.message: There's a general impulse to distract the grieving person - as if you could.
quotes.name: Joan Didion

quotes.message: The littlest thing can have the strongest connection when you're grieving. Your proustian, poetic nerve is turned up to ten.
quotes.name: Mike Mills

quotes.message: I think grieving is the same for everybody that lost someone you love deeply. It's the same. You know, you're really no different than anybody else who's lost somebody they adored.
quotes.name: Lee Radziwill

quotes.message: When people are grieving, it's kind of like a storm, and you need something to grab onto, but often you have to brave it on your own.
quotes.name: Clare Bowen

quotes.message: Grief is not a disorder, a disease or sign of weakness. It is an emotional, physical and spiritual necessity, the price you pay for love. The only cure for grief is to grieve.
quotes.name: Earl Grollman

quotes.message: Grief is like the ocean; it comes on waves ebbing and flowing. Sometimes the water is calm, and sometimes it is overwhelming. All we can do is learn to swim.
quotes.name: Vicki Harrison

quotes.message: Give sorrow words; the grief that does not speak whispers the o'er~fraught heart and bids it break.
quotes.name: Shakespeare

quotes.message: Emotionally, grief is a mixture of raw feelings such as sorrow, anguish, anger, regret, longing, fear, and deprivation. Grief may be experienced physically as exhaustion, emptiness, tension, sleeplessness, or loss of appetite.
quotes.name: Judy Tatelbaum

quotes.message: Grief is a passage, not a place to stay. Grief is not a sign of weakness, nor a lack of faith...it is the price of love.
quotes.name: Author Unkonwn

quotes.message: Grieving is not a short-term process; it's not even a long-term process; it's a lifelong process. 'Having a future' now means that although your life will flow again, it will flow differently as a result of the loss. Your grief will become incorporated into your life history, become a part of your identity. And you will continue now, and forever, to redefine your relationship with your deceased loved one. Death doesn't end the relationship, it simply forges a new type of relationship - one based not on physical presence but on memory, spirit, and love.
quotes.name: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.message: Don't let money run your life, let money help you run your life better.
quotes.name: John Rampton

quotes.message: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.name: Andy Warhol

quotes.message: Making money is certainly the one addiction I cannot shake.
quotes.name: Felix Dennis

quotes.message: The safest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it in your pocket.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: The money you make is a symbol of the value you create.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: The key to making money is to stay invested.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Never depend on single income. Make investments to create a second source.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Making money isn't hard in itself. What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.
quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.message: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.
quotes.name: Christopher Rice

quotes.message: Today, the concept of business is to make money. Making money is the name of the business.
quotes.name: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.message: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: To acquire money requires valor, to keep money requires prudence, and to spend money well is an art.
quotes.name: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.message: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The longer you're not taking action the more money you're losing.
quotes.name: Carrie Wilkerson

quotes.message: Making money isn't hard in itself. What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.
quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.message: Investing is simple, but not easy.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.message: Life started getting good when I started making money.
quotes.name: Balthazar Getty

quotes.message: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
quotes.name: P.T. Barnum

quotes.message: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget rule No.1.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go.
quotes.name: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.message: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: Money is like a sixth sense and you can't make use of the other five without it.
quotes.name: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: The more you learn, the more you earn.
quotes.name: Frank Clark

quotes.message: Money is always eager and ready to work for anyone who is ready to employ it.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep.
quotes.name: David Bailey

quotes.message: If all you're doing is making money, you have a luxurious but empty life.
quotes.name: Amanda Donohoe

quotes.message: Making money is easy. It is. The difficult thing in life is not making it, it's keeping it.
quotes.name: John McAfee

quotes.message: When money realizes that it is in good hands, it wants to stay and multiply in those hands.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: Balancing your money is the key to having enough.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.message: It is better to have a permanent income than to be fascinating.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The more your money works for you, the less you have to work for money.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your back pocket.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: To measure the man, measure his heart.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: The true test of character is not how much we know how to do, but how we behave when we don't know what to do.
quotes.name: John Holt

quotes.message: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: It's good to shut up sometimes.
quotes.name: Marcel Marceau

quotes.message: Character is like a tree and reputation like its shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
quotes.name: James A Froude

quotes.message: A person reveals his character by nothing so clearly as the joke he resents.
quotes.name: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Men show their characters in nothing more clearly than in what they think laughable.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: I take it as a man's duty to restrain himself.
quotes.name: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.message: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
quotes.name: Eschylus

quotes.message: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.name: Sam Ewig

quotes.message: You can tell the character of every man when you see how he receives praise.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
quotes.name: Solon

quotes.message: Sow an act...reap a habit; Sow a habit...reap a character; Sow a character...reap a destiny.
quotes.name: George Dana Boardman

quotes.message: Of all the properties which belong to honorable men, not one is so highly prized as that of character.
quotes.name: Henry Clay

quotes.message: Good government generally begins in the family, and if the moral character of a people once degenerate, their political character must soon follow.
quotes.name: Elias Boudinot

quotes.message: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.name: Matthew Campbell

quotes.message: History is the record of an encounter between character and circumstances.
quotes.name: Donald Creighton

quotes.message: Wealth stays with us a little moment if at all: only our characters are steadfast, not our gold.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Thoughts lead on to purposes; purposes go forth in action; actions form habits; habits decide character; and character fixes our destiny.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Talent develops in tranquillity, character in the full current of human life.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: It seems to me that perfection of means and confusion of goals seems to characterize our age.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: It is part of the American character to consider nothing as desperate - to surmount every difficulty by resolution and contrivance.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: To bear failure with courage is the best proof of character that anyone can give.
quotes.name: Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Don't worry so much about your self-esteem. Worry more about your character. Integrity is its own reward?
quotes.name: Dr Laura Schlessinger

quotes.message: Leadership is a potent combination of strategy and character. But if you must be without one, be without the strategy.
quotes.name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.message: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Good breeding consists in concealing how much we think of ourselves and how little we think of the other person.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.
quotes.name: Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.message: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.name: Andy Rooney

quotes.message: People often say that this or that person has not yet found himself. But the self is not something one finds, it is something one creates.
quotes.name: Thomas Szasz

quotes.message: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Know yourself. Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Know thyself? If I knew myself, I'd run away.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: The only journey is the journey within.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: One must know oneself. If this does not serve to discover truth, it at least serves as a rule of life, and there is nothing better.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: I think that somehow, we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Should we say the self, once perceived, becomes the soul?
quotes.name: Theodore Roethke

quotes.message: Resolve to be thyself: and know, that he who finds himself, loses his misery.
quotes.name: Matthew Arnold

quotes.message: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: If a man happens to find himself, he has a mansion which he can inhabit with dignity all the days of his life.
quotes.name: James A. Michener

quotes.message: In the end you don't so much find yourself as you find someone who knows who you are.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Don't spend all of your time trying to FIND yourself. Spend your time CREATING yourself into a person that you'll be proud of.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.name: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

quotes.message: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Don't worry about finding your soul mate. Find yourself.
quotes.name: Jason Evert

quotes.message: Whatever it takes to find the real you, don't be daunted if the rest of the world looks on in shock.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: When you fight yourself to discover the real you, there is only one winner.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Someday, somewhere – anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life.
quotes.name: Pablo Neruda

quotes.message: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Each man's life represents a road toward himself.
quotes.name: Herman Hesse

quotes.message: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.
quotes.name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: Lose yourself wholly; and the more you lose, the more you will find.
quotes.name: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.message: You've got to know yourself so you can at last be yourself.
quotes.name: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.message: Be who you are, and find yourself so you can be your own person and enjoy life with no regret.
quotes.name: Bonnie Zackson Koury

quotes.message: Your real self may be hiding somewhere, look for it within, when you find yourself, you can freely be what you want to be.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Find yourself first-like yourself first-love yourself FIRST & friendship & love will naturally find YOU.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Finding oneself and one's path is like waking up on a foggy day. Be patient, and presently the fog will clear and that which has always been there can be seen. The path is already there to follow.
quotes.name: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.message: Find the love you seek, by first finding the love within yourself. Learn to rest in that place within you that is your true home.
quotes.name: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.message: You can always find the sun within yourself if you will only search.
quotes.name: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.message: If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
quotes.name: Lykke Li

quotes.message: It's a life's journey of finding ourselves, finding our power, and living for yourself, not for everyone else.
quotes.name: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.message: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.
quotes.name: Mariah Carey

quotes.message: You've got to find yourself first. Everything else'll follow.
quotes.name: Charles De Lint

quotes.message: You never find yourself until you face the truth.
quotes.name: Pearl Bailey

quotes.message: Sometimes when you lose your way, you find YOURSELF.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: The only way to find yourself is when you start being true to everyone around you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We lose ourselves in things we love. We find ourselves there, too.
quotes.name: Kristin Martz

quotes.message: All the wonders you seek are within yourself.
quotes.name: Thomas Browne

quotes.message: Sometimes we must lose ourselves to find ourselves.
quotes.name: Sonny Long

quotes.message: Know thyself means this, that you get acquainted with what you know, and what you can do.
quotes.name: Menander

quotes.message: It's not about finding a home so much as finding yourself.
quotes.name: Jason Behr

quotes.message: Go find yourself first So you can also find me.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
quotes.name: Dolly Parton

quotes.message: Committing yourself is a way of finding out who you are. A man finds his identity by identifying.
quotes.name: Robert Terwilliger

quotes.message: One does not 'find oneself' by pursuing one's self, but on the contrary by pursuing something else and learning through discipline or routine... who one is and wants to be.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Somehow, we'll find it. The balance between whom we wish to be and whom we need to be. But for now, we simply have to be satisfied with who we are.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: I think you travel to search and you come back home to find yourself there.
quotes.name: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.message: Don’t ask yourself what the world needs. Ask yourself what makes you come alive and then go do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.name: Dr. Howard Thurman

quotes.message: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Our greatest fear in life shouldn’t be of failure, but of succeeding at things that don’t really matter.
quotes.name: Francis Chan

quotes.message: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; and just so you learn to love… by loving.
quotes.name: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.message: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t… You’re right.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: One’s destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: When we find a purpose that is bigger than ourselves, we become more powerful in our ability to create.
quotes.name: Jack Delosa

quotes.message: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: If you don’t design your own life plan, chances are you’ll fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Learn how to separate the majors and the minors. A lot of people don’t do well simply because they major in minor things.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.name: Jimmy Dean

quotes.message: Knowledge comes by taking things apart: analysis. But wisdom comes by putting things together.
quotes.name: John A. Morrison

quotes.message: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment and I told them they didn’t understand life.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Follow your bliss and don’t be afraid, and doors will open where you didn’t know they were going to be.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: A year from now you will wish you had started today.
quotes.name: Karen Lamb

quotes.message: When you’re committed to something you accept no excuses only results!
quotes.name: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.message: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.name: Lolly Daskal

quotes.message: Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers. Your dream is the key to your future.
quotes.name: Mark Gorman

quotes.message: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it… The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: When I discover who I am, I’ll be free.
quotes.name: Ralph Ellison

quotes.message: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: The very nature of creativity is coming up with things that have never been tried before.
quotes.name: Shelly Lazarus

quotes.message: You combine hard work, creativity, and self-determination things start to happen.
quotes.name: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.message: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Live out of your imagination, not your history.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Remember to muster up your courage and silence your fear.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Doubt kills more Dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: The pessimists are usually right, but it’s the optimists that change the world.
quotes.name: Thomas Friedman

quotes.message: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: If you don’t build your dream, someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.name: Tony Gaskins

quotes.message: The one who says it’s not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.
quotes.name: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.message: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: I will tell you the secret of getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful and you try to be very fearful when others are greedy.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing–that’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.name: Gen George Patton

quotes.message: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating the problem in a way that will allow a solution.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Time on its back bears all things far away - Full many a challenge is wrought by many a day - Shape, fortune, name, and nature all decay.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Reality challenges and rewards. I believe our best days are yet to come.
quotes.name: George W Bush

quotes.message: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Don't be a cynic and disconsolate preacher. Don't bewail and moan. Omit the negative propositions. Challenge us with incessant affirmatives.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Leadership is the challenge to be something more than average.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: These are times in which a genius would wish to live. It is not in the still calm of life, or in the repose of a pacific station, that great challenges are formed. . . . Great necessities call out great virtues.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: There's a level of immaturity to people who just can't clean up after themselves.
quotes.name: Jann Wenner

quotes.message: For many, immaturity is an ideal, not a defect.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Comb your immaturity if you want to grow.
quotes.name: Kishore Bansal

quotes.message: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.name: John Lydon

quotes.message: A childish mind griped to unexpected changes.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: He's like a child, but without a child's capacity for joy.
quotes.name: Eva Heller

quotes.message: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: I was very immature when I was young, and for me there was no balance. Everything was just all or nothing.
quotes.name: Mickey Rourke

quotes.message: Most people grow old, but not everybody grows up.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: If you keep playing games you're going to be playing them alone.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: As long as people believe in absurdities they will continue to commit atrocities.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Some people are like trees, they take forever to grow up.
quotes.name: Ana Sandoval

quotes.message: ... Nine-year-old boys usually turn ten at some point. It's the nineteen-year-olds who have difficulty turning twenty.
quotes.name: John Boyne

quotes.message: We're kind of like the smoking section in high school. We're immature, keep to ourselves.
quotes.name: Matt Stone

quotes.message: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: Our element is unending immaturity.
quotes.name: Witold Gombrowicz

quotes.message: Inconsistencies in men are generally testimony to their immaturity
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: There were times my immaturity kept me from being all I wanted to be.
quotes.name: Len Elmore

quotes.message: This weekend showed our immaturity. We're not the team that we thought we were.
quotes.name: Ben Lamanna

quotes.message: To the immature, other people are not real.
quotes.name: Harry Overstreet

quotes.message: To resolve problems through negotiation is a very childish approach.
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: Making bad decisions is a part of life. Blaming others for your bad decisions is immature.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Immature is the love of the youth, and immature his hatred of man and earth. His mind and the wings of his spirit are still tied down and heavy.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: People who have no hold over their process of thinking are likely to be ruined by liberty of thought. If thought is immature, liberty of thought becomes a method of converting men into animals.
quotes.name: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.message: Some people need to stop being immature. Seriously grow up.
quotes.name: Mahmoud El Hallab

quotes.message: Immature is aword boring people use to describe fun people.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: Just because your pain is understandable, doesn't mean your behavior is acceptable.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: An adult can correctly tell a kid, ‘what you are I was and what I am you will be’. And unlike a child he cannot misplace priority due to purity and immaturity.
quotes.name: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.message: Immaturity exists in every human; however, it becomes the prisoner of the maturity force, whether it is real or pretended; it naturally escapes on many occasions.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Man’s growth is held back by his surrender to other people’s expectation that he remain the person he was when they met him.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: In short, immaturity is spoiled. And what is spoiled doesn’t ripen. It goes bad early, gets bitter and withers on the vine.
quotes.name: Gina Barreca

quotes.message: Continuously feeling superior is a characteristic of immaturity.
quotes.name: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.message: The young have all the same flaws adults do. Plus one: immaturity.
quotes.name: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.message: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: Immaturity means self-centeredness, inability to compromise, to rise above hurt feelings, to postpone immediate pleasures in favor of future benefits, or to do unpleasant chores when they need to be done.
quotes.name: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.message: So far in the history of the world, there have never been enough mature people in the right places.
quotes.name: G. B. Chisholm

quotes.message: The most dangerous members of our society are those grownups whose powers of influence are adult but whose motives and responses are infantile.
quotes.name: Harry Allen Overstreet

quotes.message: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.message: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: You are physically and socially mature. You are, of course, intellectually immature. So are we, on the staff; so is everybody. In the intellectual world the only mature people are those who are willing to admit their immaturity.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: An immature ear of corn appears first.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Politics are usually the executive expression of human immaturity.
quotes.name: Vera Brittain

quotes.message: Imagination: the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature.
quotes.name: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.message: The first sign of maturity is not reacting to others' immaturity.
quotes.name: D. Muthukrishnan

quotes.message: Maturity does not match, with immaturity.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Longing for the ideal, while criticizing the real is evidence of immaturity.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.name: John Holmes

quotes.message: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
quotes.name: Danny Thomas

quotes.message: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts us above ourselves.
quotes.name: Lydia M. Child

quotes.message: Let me do all the good I can, to all the people I can, as often as I can, for I shall not pass this way again.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: Never worry about numbers. Help one person at a time, and always start with the person nearest you.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
quotes.name: Nelson Henderson

quotes.message: Dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light.
quotes.name: Norman B. Rice

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
quotes.name: Napolean Hill

quotes.message: To ease another's heartache is to forget one's own.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Love is not patronizing and charity isn't about pity, it is about love. Charity and love are the same - with charity you give love, so don't just give money but reach out your hand instead.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Criticism, like rain, should be gentle enough to nourish a man's growth without destroying his roots.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams

quotes.message: If you light a lamp for someone else it will also brighten your path.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Never look down on anybody unless you're helping him up.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: There is no use whatever trying to help people who do not help themselves. You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he is willing to climb himself.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Help others and give something back. I guarantee you will discover that while public service improves the lives and the world around you, its greatest reward is the enrichment and new meaning it will bring your own life.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Every single time you help somebody stand up, you are helping humanity rise.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Your purpose in life is to use your gifts and talents to help other people. Your journey in life teaches you how to do that.
quotes.name: Tom Krause

quotes.message: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: If you want your life to get better, sometimes the best thing you can do is to help improve somebody else's life.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: A single generosity enlarges the world.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Condemn none: if you can stretch out a helping hand, do so. If you cannot, fold your hands, bless your brothers, and let them go their own way.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: If you have some respect for people as they are, you can be more effective in helping them to become better than they are.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: Those who are happiest are those who do the most for others.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: The best antidote I know for worry is work. The best cure for weariness is the challenge of helping someone who is even more tired. One of the great ironies of life is this: He or she who serves almost always benefits more than he or she who is served.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Give yourself entirely to those around you. Be generous with your blessings. A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: When you become detached mentally from yourself and concentrate on helping other people with their difficulties, you will be able to cope with your own more effectively. Somehow, the act of self-giving is a personal power-releasing factor.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: To be a revolutionary you have to be a human being. You have to care about people who have no power.
quotes.name: Jane Fonda

quotes.message: I shall not pass this way again: Then let me now relieve some pain, Remove some barrier from the road, Or brighten some one's heavy load.
quotes.name: Eva Rose Park

quotes.message: Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
quotes.name: John MacNaughton

quotes.message: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help somebody.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: In helping others, we shall help ourselves, for whatever good we give out completes the circle and comes back to us.
quotes.name: Flora Edwards

quotes.message: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: All day long we are, in some degree helping each other to one or the other of these destinations. It is in the light of these overwhelming possibilities, it is with the awe and the circumspection proper to them, that we should conduct all of our dealings with one another, all friendships, all loves, all play, all politics.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: the right one does not . stand in your way . they make space for you .
quotes.name: Rupi Kaur

quotes.message: Everything you have is to give.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Learn to light a candle in the darkest moments of someone’s life. Be the light that helps others see; it is what gives life its deepest significance.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Helping others is the secret sauce to a happy life.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: Helping others isn't a chore; it is one of the greatest gifts there is.
quotes.name: Liya Kebede

quotes.message: Meet hostility and suspicion with kindness. Helping others out of love is always the best option.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Seek something outside your nine-to-five job as an additional source of fulfillment and as a way to feel the joy of helping others.
quotes.name: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.message: Forget yourself by becoming interested in others. Do every day a good deed that will put a smile of joy on someone's face.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: We are all like one-winged angels. It is only when we help each other that we can fly.
quotes.name: Luciano De Crescenzo

quotes.message: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Do something for somebody every day for which you do not get paid.
quotes.name: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Even if it is a little thing, do something for those who have need of help, something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it.
quotes.name: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: Doing things for others always pays dividends.
quotes.name: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.message: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: You get the best out of others when you give the best of yourself.
quotes.name: Harry Firestone

quotes.message: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: Every morning when I wake up, I dedicate myself to helping others to find peace of mind. Then, when I meet people, I think of them as long-term friends; I don't regard others as strangers.
quotes.name: 14th Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The journey is not about helping ourselves, but about helping others. We do best when we use our own skills to make a positive difference in the lives of others. When we do this, we bring enjoyment, hope and fulfillment to others, but we also find that we enjoy the journey more than we ever could have imagined.
quotes.name: Dave Lieber

quotes.message: To enjoy the journey is to leap into people’s lives. To enjoy the journey is to give until the stretch is a sacrifice.
quotes.name: Janie Jasin

quotes.message: If I can stop one heart from breaking, . I shall not live in vain. . If I can ease one life the aching, . Or cool one pain, . Or help one fainting robin . Unto his nest again, . I shall not live in vain.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Each of us was placed here for a special purpose. I believe that it is each person's responsibility to determine what he or she can do to make the world a better place—and then go out and do it.
quotes.name: Ross Perot

quotes.message: Service is what life is all about.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: When people are serving, life is no longer meaningless.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: We are here on earth to do good for others. What the others are here for, I don't know.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: When a person is down in the world, an ounce of help is better than a pound of preaching.
quotes.name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Life's most urgent question is: What are you doing for others?
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: To me it seems that to give happiness is a far nobler goal than to attain it: and that what we exist for is much more a matter of relations to others than a matter of individual progress: much more a matter of helping others to heaven than of getting there ourselves.
quotes.name: Lewis Carroll

quotes.message: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
quotes.name: Sally Koch

quotes.message: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.name: Muhammad

quotes.message: The happiest people I have known have been those who gave themselves no concern about their own souls, but did their uttermost to mitigate the miseries of others.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.message: Help publicly. Help privately. Help in your actions by recycling and conserving and protecting, but help also in your attitude. Help make sense where sense has gone missing. Help bring reason and respect to discourse and debate. Help science to solve and faith to soothe. Help law bring justice, until justice is commonplace. Help and you will abolish apathy—the void that is so quickly filled by ignorance and evil.
quotes.name: Tom Hanks

quotes.message: Everybody can be great... because any-body can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and your verb agree to serve... You don't have to know the second theory of thermodynamics in physics to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: The life I touch for good or ill will touch another life, and that in turn another, until who knows where the trembling stops or in what far place my touch will be felt.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.name: Pat Riley

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.message: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: The road to excellence is always under construction.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Superiority -- doing things a little better than anybody else can do them.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Excellence is rarely found, more rarely valued.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Doing common things uncommonly well.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: With regard to excellence, it is not enough to know, but we must try to have and use it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence encourages one about life generally; it shows the spiritual wealth of the world.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it.
quotes.name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.message: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
quotes.name: Shana Alexander

quotes.message: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.name: Rick Pitino

quotes.message: Excellence is about fighting and pursuing something diligently, with a strict and determined approach to doing it right. It's okay if there are flaws in the process - it makes it more interesting.
quotes.name: Charlie Trotter

quotes.message: There is no real excellence in all of this world which can be separated from right living.
quotes.name: David Starr Jordan

quotes.message: Excellence always sells.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Excellence means when a man or woman asks of himself more than others do.
quotes.name: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.message: Those who attain any excellence, commonly spend life in one pursuit; for excellence is not often gained upon easier terms.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The pursuit of excellence is less profitable than the pursuit of bigness, but it can be more satisfying.
quotes.name: David Ogilvy

quotes.message: All human excellence is but comparative. There may be persons who excel us, as much as we fancy we excel the meanest.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Excellence is a process that should occupy all our days.
quotes.name: Theodore Wilhelm Engstrom

quotes.message: He who does it first may do well, but he who does it best will do better.
quotes.name: Scott Allen

quotes.message: The desire of excellence is the necessary attribute of those who excel. We work little for a thing unless we wish for it.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Excellence in any department can be attained only by the labor of a lifetime; it is not to be purchased at a lesser price.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Many people can reach for and achieve excellence. To do this consistently is what separates masters and geniuses from everyone else.
quotes.name: Paul Russo

quotes.message: Hunger for excellence. Continuously seek inspiration to make your work better.
quotes.name: Cory Trepanier

quotes.message: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: True greatness consists in being great in little things.
quotes.name: Charles Simmons

quotes.message: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
quotes.name: Dorothy Height

quotes.message: Greatness is a road leading towards the unknown.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: There is no excellence without labor. One cannot dream oneself into either usefulness or happiness.
quotes.name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quotes.message: Whatever you do, don't do it halfway.
quotes.name: Bob Beamon

quotes.message: You do not merely want to be considered just the best of the best. You want to be considered the only ones who do what you do.
quotes.name: Jerry Garcia

quotes.message: Our goal, simply stated, is to be the best.
quotes.name: James H. Robinson

quotes.message: Do more than you're supposed to do and you can have or be or do anything you want.
quotes.name: Bill Sands

quotes.message: We must do the best we can with what we have.
quotes.name: Edward Rowland Sill

quotes.message: The best is the enemy of the good.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Pursue excellence and success will follow.
quotes.name: Rancho

quotes.message: Excellence requires discomfort.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: The extent of your impact on the world depends on the size of your devotion to excellence.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Demand excellence.
quotes.name: Emmitt Smith

quotes.message: Excellence is not a gift, but a skill that takes practice. We do not act rightly because we are excellent in fact we achieve excellence by acting rightly.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: The secret of living a life of excellence is merely a matter of thinking thoughts of excellence. Really, it’s a matter of programming our minds with the kind of information that will set us free.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less than excellent work.
quotes.name: Thomas J Watson

quotes.message: Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should be really excellent. Because this is our life.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Excellence is not an exception; it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: We must get to the point in our lives. What is the point? To become a new kind of man or woman, having inner command and outer excellence.
quotes.name: Vernon Howard

quotes.message: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word―excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: If you deliver excellence right now, that gives you the best shot at the best future you’ve got coming.
quotes.name: Robert Forster

quotes.message: If you don’t do it with excellence, don’t do it at all! Because if it’s not excellent, it won’t be profitable or fun.
quotes.name: Robert Townsend

quotes.message: People of excellence go the extra mile to do what's right.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Be driven with purpose. Be relentless in your alignment with excellence. Pay no mind to the disimpassioned impotent haters.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Wealth does not bring about excellence, but excellence makes wealth and everything else good for men, both individually and collectively.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: The price of excellence is discipline.
quotes.name: William Ward

quotes.message: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.name: Jack Kinder

quotes.message: The greatest enemy of excellence is good.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Stick to the basics, hold on to your family and friends - they will never go out of fashion.
quotes.name: Niki Taylor

quotes.message: Nothing purchased can come close to the renewed sense of gratitude for having family and friends.
quotes.name: Courtland Milloy

quotes.message: The length of one's days matters less than the love of one's family and friends.
quotes.name: Gerald Ford

quotes.message: I've learned that all a person has in life is family and friends. If you lose those, you have nothing, so friends are to be treasured more than anything else in the world.
quotes.name: Trey Parker And Matt Stone

quotes.message: Present your family and friends with their eulogies now - they won't be able to hear how much you love them and appreciate them from the grave.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
quotes.name: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.message: Inspiring passion in family and friends has more enduring value than just staying alive for them.
quotes.name: Alex Lowe

quotes.message: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
quotes.name: Julia Barr

quotes.message: We don't have the luxury of time. We spend more because of how we live, but it's important to be with our family and friends.
quotes.name: Sara Blakely

quotes.message: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: Talking with my friends and family every day helps keep me grounded and connected to home. They are the most important things to me.
quotes.name: Colbie Caillat

quotes.message: Love overflows and joy never ends in a home that is blessed with family and friends.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I like to be judged by my family and friends because they know me.
quotes.name: Leighton Meester

quotes.message: Of course my family and friends are incredibly valuable to me. They keep me sane, they teach me things and I love spending time with them. I think that ranking what you value is a sort of western and linear way of looking at things.
quotes.name: Julia Stiles

quotes.message: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.name: Willie Stargell

quotes.message: If you want to really know what your friends and family think of you die broke, and then see who shows up for the funeral.
quotes.name: Gregory Nunn

quotes.message: I have friends and family that are filled with massive amounts of integrity. And it shouldn't be an oddity.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: I've learned...
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.name: Philip Green

quotes.message: When I do get the chance I just love to hang around at home with friends and family.
quotes.name: Delta Goodrem

quotes.message: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
quotes.name: Emma Roberts

quotes.message: My friends and family always thought I was pretty funny, but I don't know if they thought I was get-my-own-show funny.
quotes.name: Nick Kroll

quotes.message: Keep playing games. Make time to play games with your friends and family, because it's surprisingly heartbreaking to wipe a thin layer of dust off a game you love, before you put it back on the shelf because the real world is calling you.
quotes.name: Wil Wheaton

quotes.message: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
quotes.name: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.message: I love being at home, being with friends and family. I'm of European stock, brought up in Australia. I'm a passionate guy. I just love life.
quotes.name: Eric Bana

quotes.message: Indeed, I was so afraid to dishonour my friends and family by my indiscreet actions, that I rather chose to be accounted a fool, than to be thought rude or wanton.
quotes.name: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.message: I feel only my friends and family need to know what is happening in my personal life.
quotes.name: Virat Kohli

quotes.message: Some of my friends and family have tried to challenge me to do jokes that aren't as self-deprecating, where I genuinely express my own opinion in my own voice.
quotes.name: Maria Bamford

quotes.message: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.name: Jane Howard

quotes.message: The books, along with family and friends, and sometimes even against family and friends, molded their characters.
quotes.name: Vick S

quotes.message: What you need to understand when you choose specific friends and family members to help you with your depression is that they have lives too.
quotes.name: Joanna Jackson

quotes.message: The real success of our personal lives and careers can best be measured by the relationships we have with the people most dear to us - our family, friends, and co-workers.
quotes.name: Mary Kay

quotes.message: Families are the crucibles that transform infants into mature human beings. No matter how hard things are in your family right now, it is possible to create a home where differences are resolved amicably, and to raise children who are friends for life.
quotes.name: Laura Markham

quotes.message: In case you feel quite low, try your best to not sit alone. Rather, go to a family member or a friend who you can trust. Everyone has that person in the life, who understands him. her.
quotes.name: Ryan Michaelson

quotes.message: Family, friends and the typical attitudes of society will, at different stages, try to tell you what you 'should' be doing with your life.
quotes.name: Philip West
